story:
An unique Roleplaying Server with fully custom codes and a full custom map!

  • To make this idea happen we need atleast 150 pounds for the server hosting but getting 500pounds would be our goal to make this as we really want it to be!
  • All donators will get there benefits once the server launches or once the beta/alfa comes!
  • Alpha should be there in a few weeks and beta in less then 2 months

Buildings:

Here will be some of the city's/builds we made:

One of our small towns named Forthwind. it is located on the main island


The heroes need food... Right?


A small but nice lake.


A little cavy passway trough a mountain.


Our first worldedits in the orc's island.


The watchtower at one of the seaports at the main island.


A little dungeon we are building


Lore:

Settled in a world of war the Heroes of exorath will define glory and victory to there allies and enemies. The god Exorath, friend of all 4 races, once created an island so big that it could contain all the races. But peace didn't last. It only took a few misunderstandings once the races wanted to expand their land rule over the other races. But Exorath knew this was going to happen, and he already planned on how to minimize the damage of this war: He broke 4 parts of the main island creating places for the races to live on! Now the races live in peace on their own islands but the war continues in the chaotic main island.

Races,Classes and Skills: 

There will be 4 main races with each a bonus in something: Elves(movement speed),Orcs(attack damage), Humans (health) and Dwarves (Skill speed).
When the heroes chose a race they get the option to become an archer, a warrior or a mage (more classes will be coming). These classes all have their own abilities (about 9 each) and their own bonusses! So that means your players basic stats will be based on your race and your class.

Leveling: 

Like in any mmorpg Leveling is a main aspect of the game, it will become progressively harder and but will give big rewards: You can spend skill points that you get from leveling in the skilltree to unlock new skills or upgrade old ones, This will allow peaple to make their own builds! By leveling up your stats also increase:your plain health, base attack damage... Levels are also required to equip certain gear, enter certain dungeons and do certain quests

Dynamic events:  

We will implement dynamic events into quests,dungeons and boss fights. What this means is that it wont be just running from a to b, killing these mobs, fighting that mob... No, In dungeons walls can collapse or mobs can dig into the dungeon, there will be quests where you have to light certain outposts to notice the ally's that enemies are on there way!
Dynamic events will be a really complicated system but we will open a forum for suggestions etc.

Transportation: 

Our members will be able to transport trough islands and other stuff by using our orc helicopters, balloons and ships! There will also be scroll teleportation (these scrolls will teleport you to towns and randomly drop by mobs

Mobs: 

There will be 4 Types of mobs: Normals, Champions, Uniques and bosses:
Normals: These mobs are the most common and are rather easy to kill. They dont have special attacks and have low chanse of dropping good gear.

Champions: We want champions to spawn in small groups and be harder to kill then normals, they also deal more damage. The drop chanses are alot higher to get unique and magic drops.

Uniques: These mobs will spawn solo that means no other mobs around and they are sort of small bosses. They are really strong but rewards are high. Can you sustain their strong and unique sets of abilities?

Bosses: The bosses will spawn in a boss chamber in dungeons or quest arenas. These arenas will include dynamic events like The boss destroying stuff in it, blocking the entrance and deploying certain aoe blocks where if you walk close they explode or slow you down.

Items:

The items will be split up in 5 categories: Common, Unique, Magic, Rare and Legendary.
These categories represent how much identify buffs they will get(identifying will cost the player some money and time to do, we are not sure how we are gonna do this to make it the most enjoyable for the players so make sure to tell us what you would want out of this).

All of our items will have random stats but are limited to a max and min stat, for example: Sword of the fallen knight will drop by mobs of lvl7 and has 10-25dmg

Why you should support the server:

We really need the money for our servers so they can be dedicated and have the best stats possible, we also need money to hire art designers, coders, and website developers! We here at Heroes Of Exorath would really appreciate it if you would give a pound or two to our project. Every bit counts!

Alpha and Beta access:

As soon as we have something that is worth showing we will setup a server for the members who have the alpha reward. Our closed beta will only be going live in 1-2 months. I hope you will enjoy them!

You can also help us with: 

-Helping us code plugins
-Helping us build the world
-Helping us host the server
-Helping with the site development


If you are interested in any of the above positions please email me on: twan123@live.be with your application, Thanks.

story:
Welcome to DruCon 2016!

Chances are if you're here, you've already heard about us. But just in case you haven't…

Background

Once upon a time, there was a St. Louis-based podcast called Fear the Boot. Along with putting out a consistently high-quality podcast, Fear the Boot fostered a massive online community. This community grew so large and varied that the hosts of Fear the Boot decided to throw an annual gaming convention, lovingly called Fear the Con. Fear the Con came back again and again, eight years in a row! And then the hosts of Fear the Boot decided to take a well deserved rest, and decided to postpone Fear the Con 9 for a year.

But the community that had grown up around Fear the Boot wanted more! Instead of demanding more from the hosts, however, several members of that community took it upon themselves to run their OWN convention, right around the same time as Fear the Con, but with its own flavor and personality. Thus, DruCon was born!

DruCon is really a labor of love. We decided we can't go a whole 730 days without seeing our Fear the Boot family, so we are putting this together so we don't have to!

What We Plan to Do

Didn’t you read the last section? We’re putting on a convention! We’ve named it DruCon in honor of the Drury Inn, our home away from home in Maryland Heights. True, the convention won’t be at that particular Drury Inn (see our Facebook page for more details), but the Drury we’ll be at is larger, with plenty of meeting rooms and no pesky drive at the end of the night. It’ll be two days of gaming, morning until evening, with the same folks you know and love from Fear the Cons past.


Which folks? Well, there’s your erstwhile organizers, Adam (more Alpha than Chad), Bob (runs ScoobyThulhu), and Derek (Mr. Fear the Charity). There’s YOU, the community. Veteran artist and designer Ruben Smith-Zempel will be designing a poster and t-shirt for the event. And Fear the Con regular Mikey Mason will be there to BLOW OUR MINDS.

What We Need and Why We Are Crowdfunding To Get It

The fact of the matter is, using the meeting rooms at the Drury is not free. By the same token, we understand that the hotel is not free on YOUR end. So no matter how much we raise, the convention is happening, and we'll make up the difference, but we would rather not have to.

We ask that you donate only what you think you can reasonably afford. Do not break the bank, just put in what you can! If we get more than we need, we will put the overages right back into the convention! More money raised means stretch goals, more gaming room, saving for a gaming convention next year, etc.

Stretch Goals!

$2100:  A DruCon merchandise table will be available at the convention.

  • $5: DruCon polyhedrals (style to be determined)

  • $10: DruCon dice cup

  • $20: T-shirt with Ruben's gorgeous art

  • $25: DruCon shoulder bag with Ruben's gorgeous art

$2150: All attendees get a pair of DruCon dice.

$2250: A GM panel, topics and GMs to be chosen by vote on Facebook. Short discussion plus Q&A.

$2400: A convention suite with snacks and soda available to all!

$2500: Our design team (mostly Ruben) will get paid for their good work.

$2600: All attendees get a set of DruCon polyhedrals (replaces pair of dice).

$3000: Our design team (mostly Ruben) will get paid more for their good work.

$3500: All attendees get a DruCon dice cup.


Detail on Captain's Level Perks

Boxes

Martian Bob may be an amateur woodworker, but his work speaks for itself. If you choose this reward, Bob will work with you to design a unique woodcraft of heirloom quality from native or exotic woods to your specifications. It could be a set of cherry and maple boxes for your gaming supplies, a massive mahogany Banhammer, a Wyrmwood knockoff, or just some really neat stuff for your kitchen. Check out the gallery for some examples, or click here for an album.

story:
The story so far...

Hi! Weâ€™re Starchaser Studios, a small group of game making enthusiasts spread across both the EU and the US. For us, what started out as a a simple hobby has gradually evolved into a full grown passion.

In a nutshell, after some early experiments, we decided that our dream of making professional games should come to life. Although we already had full time jobs, a team consisting of a game designer, a programmer and a project manager gathered. In other words, back in June 2011, three friends decided to break the routine. They were soon joined by others, such as an enthusiastic financial manager, a 2D artist and a 3D modeler.

Although the core development team has been constant for the past few months, we also have a fair number of collaborators who contribute depending on their spare time, commitment and skills. Because of our community driven nature, we believe that itâ€™s mainly the community that should benefit from games developed this way. Therefore, our first release will be completely FREE for everyone: no paid features, no commercials, just clean, simple fun.


However, this new passion has been taking a lot of our time and funds. While we did manage to acquire some of the needed software and pay a part of our collaborators, we still need to acquire a couple of more licenses and additional materials. But...weâ€™ll talk about that later. For the moment, allow us to present our first creation.

We've got Uplift!

For the moment, we're busy working on our first title. Uplift is a fantasy themed game for both iOS and Android, with a pinch of steampunk flavour. At its roots, Uplift is a combination between a platformer and a puzzle game, although weâ€™d like to believe the game created its own path.

The game follows the adventures of professor Flugen, renowned zeppelin specialist, his nephew Zack and his pet robot. Desperate to help their home city, one of the many floating cities of their world, the three embark on a quest to find the precious heltrogen gas. Obviously, this scarce resource does not grow on trees, but lays hidden deep within a savage mountain range. A small airship, a difficult task and dangers lurking around each corner. Guess who the main pilot is going to be?

You may notice our story is not the hardcore steampunk novel some might expect. Donâ€™t worry, our extensive Lore Book will more than make up for it. Based on hybrid mechanics, our game tries to find a balance between easy to understand controls and spontaneous challenges. No complicated schemes, no crippling bugs and no unfinished levels.

While the graphics and mechanics have evolved since our first video, so did the expectations. You may find more screenshots and information on our web-site: www.starchaserstudios.com


Our desired launch date would be the 1st quarter of 2012 (Q1 2012). The game will initially be launched on Android and soon after, depending on the raised funds, on the iOS. Other platforms will follow, if the game is successful. No matter what platform you will choose to play it on, the bottom line is that you will receive a FREE, quality title.

What will the money be used for?

As weâ€™ve said earlier, weâ€™ve already managed to get a small team to work together, so we wonâ€™t ask for any money to accomplish any programming or creative tasks. This is our job, and we will give our best to accomplish it. 

Weâ€™ve also paid our bills on web activities and the additional tools we use on the game. As a primary tool however, weâ€™re using the world famous Unity. This is why, we still need money for professional licenses which will not only help us finish our first game, but will also help us develop future titles:

  • When it comes to licenses, they donâ€™t make any special offers for dreamers. A Unity Pro along with an Android Pro license would be perfect in order to properly integrate some of the more advanced features weâ€™ve prepared for you. Most of custom shaders and custom features canâ€™t be truly appreciated in the current version of the game, since the free version of Unity will not render them properly. According to the Unity website, each of these items are priced at around $1500.
  • Obviously, the next logical step would be the iOS Pro package priced at $1500.

But letâ€™s not get carried away by numbers here. We donâ€™t really want to sound greedy, so weâ€™ll just wrap things up to a few basic thresholds:

  • $2900 for the basic licenses (we will support all additional taxes and the price difference)
  • $4400 to speed up the iOS release (wishful thinking, we know)

Honestly, weâ€™ll be more than happy if we manage to reach our first threshold, so just pitch in, if you feel like it. If you canâ€™t, donâ€™t worry. Youâ€™ll help by just spreading the word!

The rewards will be given in the second half of the campaign or at the end. The reason is we want the beta test keys to be a nice addition to your rewards, rather than a way of just previewing the product.

If we can't get the funding, we won't give up. We do plan to take a loan in order to push things further, although it would put additional strain on the team. This is why it would would be great to reach our goals through IndieGoGo.

If you help us go beyond that, none of your donations will be wasted. Your money will be carefully invested in founding a dream and making sure the mobile game world will be richer by at least a quality title.

story:
Abstract

This wargame is set in the same science fantasy setting as my novels.  It's currently a promotional website.

By June 7, 2014, I want to implement:

  • A proper guest demo mode, to allow trying out the game without a proper account.  The first scenario in each of the three examples should be playable on or before June 7, 2014. 
  • Two of these scenarios are space combat; one is intantry combat.  The game is turn-based with planned moves.
  • A minimal "base command management" screen.
  • The non-playable factions need cameo pictures.  The site itself needs a proper HTML design.  Final-release artwork will not be attempted.

Fully storyboarding the two example campaigns would take months; that's not going to happen by June 7, 2014.  It is extremely unlikely that the game UI would be close to final form then.

Schedule for Deliverables

I plan to work on this part-time from the start of fundraising, to June 7 2014.  It should take that long (~3 weeks) to get a playable demo of the game up, and do minimal playtesting.

The game site does live on a leased, unmanaged, dedicated server.

story:
Goal Is to Open Summer 2014

   

  My business plan will include old school arcade games combined with gaming tournaments and modern day consoles like Xbox One and PS4 . I also plan on adding an indie game section that would grasp a growing trend in many gaming communities. We want to bring the new school back to the old school. We want to use tournaments so that it will add an edge to next gen gaming. I am looking to open up an adult arcade here in Baltimore city and I need support. Legendz will also host fantasy football on a reguler bases.  I have been involved with games and comics since I was five and this has always been a dream of mine.  I know it’s definitely something a lot of people can relate to growing up in the 80s and 90s.  I will also be adding in a beer and wine bar which will add a unique environment with its funky colors and retro feel. The bar will be laminated with comic books and all kinds of cool character art to really help give it an arcade feel. This will be a great place for every kind of gaming fan. My ultimate  goal is I want to open up a Legendz in three Major Cities over the next 5 years. The following is our basic business plan and cost estimates for Legendz Gaming. 

           My brother John Harris is in charge of the construction and contracting for this Project. He is a master plumber and gas fitter. He has twenty years experience and is perfectly qualified for the job. One he is family and two he is an avid gamer just like me. He is putting in some work helping with the creative process of this project as well.

                  The main image is the floor layout. We are looking to have an open kitchen which will have windows so that you can see all the magic happening while everything is being made. We wanted to keep the layout simple and fun for everyone. We wanted to put in some seating but not a ton or else it would take up space for the games.

                       

     Right now the project will be from the ground up. We are investigating locations in Baltimore city around various colleges and universities.

     The total cost is estimated at $200,000. This is for everything including the hardware, furniture, and interior decoration.

        We are planning to finance the entire $200,000 

       Right now we have $15,000 and we need $10,000 more to reach our goal of $25,000. This will qualify us for financing.

                                         The Price Break Down

      Gaming consoles cost $500 per console and we are planning to get 4 of each = $4,000

      TVs are estimated at $800 each and we require a total of 12 = $9,600

      We are also purchasing 20 smaller arcades costing $1,000= $20,000

      We will buy about 30 arcade games including Street Fighter, Mortal Kombat , Pacman, Time Crisis, Galactic, and many more. Each will cost about $2,500=$75,000

      The cost of kitchen equipment to include stoves, ovens, and cook wear is estimated at $25,000 

        The total comes to $133,600 that leaves $66,400 for everything else such as the wall art comic books , food stock, and the beer and wine stock along with the required licenses. 

    

  

      Everyone would enjoy Legendz Gaming. It is a place where any gamer of all types can hangout and socialize. Its unique designs and fun environment will create the perfect ambiance for you and your to friends to have fun playing games and drinking a few.

               

 Here are a few of the different perks that you will receive with a contribution. Every Perk is made to give you something in return that is fun and unique. Hope you enjoy them as much as i did coming up with them.

             

                                audio speaker for the Dance Dance perk

Some specs-    
  • Play audio from tablets, phones, MP3 players, laptops, handheld gaming consoles, and other devices using a 3.5mm audio connection OR use the MP3 playback controls with SD / SDHC memory cards and USB flash drives
  Perk for The Big Bang- A amazing Mini arcade cabinet.  With 485 of the best arcade games ever made, this bad boy will make your dreams come true.  It has a smooth flat screen and amazing craftsmanship. 

Link's Hyrule Crest Shield Perk 


Star Wars Luke Skywalker Stunt Lightsaber Everything Star Wars Perk

SNES Emulator in a Controller 





Canvas painted collectible of your favorite game art here is a simple from Perk-Game Legendz 


Our Legendz shirts

  




                 Our shirts will come in Small, Medium, or Large



                       

Legendz will be a credit based system we will be using plastic debit cards so that way we can keep it simple and fun. We are currently planning on using center edge software for our card readers. This will prevent customers from being required to carry around money. For every $1 dollar you will get 100 credits. For every $5 dollars you add after $10 dollars you will get an extra 200 credits. I will make sure to update on everything going on throughout this project.  I am excited and I hope you are as well. Please include $15 on all perks over $100 if international shipping is required

    Thank you for sharing or contributing. Your assistance is greatly appreciated

 If you are unable to contribute but would like to support the campaign please share our link to spread the word through Facebook, blogs, Twitter, and Instagram. Support us in anyway you can, thanks!
story_txt: Goal Is to Open Summer 2014     My business plan will include old school arcade games combined with gaming tournaments and modern day consoles like Xbox One and PS4 . I also plan on adding an indie game section that would grasp a growing trend in many gaming communities. We want to bring the new school back to the old school. We want to use tournaments so that it will add an edge to next gen gaming. I am looking to open up an adult arcade  here in Baltimore city and I need support. Legendz will also host fantasy football on a reguler bases.  I have been involved with games and comics since I was five and this has always been a dream of mine.  I know it’s definitely something a lot of people can relate to growing up in the 80s and 90s.  I will also be adding in a beer and wine bar which will add a unique environment with its funky colors and retro feel. The bar will be laminated with comic books and all kinds of cool character art to really help give it an arcade feel. This will be a great place for every kind of gaming fan. story:
Hello IndieGoGo Users,

 

Who am I?

My name is Jordan Hart, I am the founder of PurpleHatch Games. PurpleHatch Games is an independent studio in North-West England. This is my first commercial game although I have worked on 2 games previously. I am a programmer and work in C#, C++ and Java.

What is the Game About?

Twist is a 3D platformer following the story of a nano-biological experiment named 'Twist'. The gameplay follows him infiltrating various organisations to steal intel wanted by the government. The story is a loose parody of pop culture spy films with lashigns of dry humour.

Where Twist is different is in its gameplay mechanics. The player has the ability to controls the player's rotation as well as jumping. This makes for an intriguing cross between Bit Trip Runner and Fez, both are games that I admire very much.

When will it be Released?

The game is slated for a release in late October. This will just be an Alpha release followed by several updated releases before the final build goes public. IndieGoGo contributors will gain access to every single one of those releases.

Where can I play the Demo?

I recently released the demo for Twist and it clearly lacks some things. this is where you come in. I need funds to help tap the hidden potential of the game. You can download the demo for Windows here:

And the Mac Demo here:

 

What will you do with my Hard-Earned Cash?

With the extra funds, I will hire a freelancer that is waiting and ready to produce a large selection of assets for the game's backgrounds and props, as well as obstacles and a complete revamp of all the textures and graphics. This will leave me free to work on more features of the game and the storyline without needing to worry about graphics. The extra funds will also go towards alpha testing the game and improving the overall user experience.

In summary, this is where all your hard-earned monies will go:

  • Graphics Overhaul

  • A Bunch of New Art Assets

  • Contracting Freelance Musician

  • Hiring Professional Testers

  • Freelancing the Story Writing

  • Purchasing a Couple of Unity Packages to speed up Game Development

  • Promoting and Marketing the Game

Why?

If we can all raise enough money to get this project looking, playing and sounding great, I can realise my dream of developing a video game that people enjoy playing.

What If I can't Contribute?

There's no such thing as can't contribute. If you can't spare a dime, we really appreciate the support nonetheless, so be sure to share this page with your friends and try to spread the game by word of mouth, any support at all is thoroughly appreciated.

Thank you so much for the support,

Jordan,

Founder of PurpleHatch Games

story:
“Traders of Valhalla” is an adventure for brave Vikings daring to seek fortune in distant lands, but their treasure is in danger on the high seas. Each band of Vikings hails forth from Norway, Sweden, Denmark, and the Isles to trade for riches as far east as Kiev and west as the New World.

Using strategy and cunning, each Viking thang (lord) moves his band of Vikings from one emporium (trade city) to another emporium, collecting different sorts of wealth to complete trade sets. All of their movements are under the control of the Tools of the Norns, who can be fickle...

Goal

Each Viking Thang leads a band of Viking men via ship via four different trade routes to various famous medieval emporia (trade cities), collecting different sorts of wealth from the trade items of each city. Extra points are awarded for complete sets of all items, as well as sets of trade route good (I.e. the New World set has rich commodities such as fur, seals, ivory, timber, and victuals). When the last land is collected, the game ends and the Viking band with the most points wins.

What is in the box?

  • 1 Viking map game board
  • 4 sets of 3 (12) Viking Thangs (lords)
  • Tools of the Norns (dice)
  • Replica Viking coin
  • 12 silver Viking torcs
  • Start tokens: 3 raid tokens and 3 trade tokens for each player (12 +12)
  • Board tokens: 1 Midgard Serpent, 1 Loki, 2 Ravens, 2 Freya's Fortune, 3 Baldur's Odds, 2 Dragonships , 3 Silver Torc
  • Trade Goods (flobs)*

Playing the Game

The oldest player begins. He declares which nation his Viking band is from (chosen from Norway, the Isles, Denmark, or Sweden). Thereafter, the Vikings take turns in clockwise order. In the first round, the Viking players each place one of their men on the board as described below:

The first Viking player, having chosen Norway, takes the Tools of the Norns and feeds them to the dragonhead prow to see his fortune in movement: (the dice show 2 and 3). He selects one of his men, moves him through his own home port in Norway, Trondheim (the seat of the king's power), two spaces toward Bergen. As Norway, in history, his ally would have been the Isles so he chooses to have his second Viking man enter at the port of the Isle of Man, the King’s seat of the Isles, and move to Dublin, flip the token there and take a slave.

The second Viking player chooses the Isles and becomes his ally in history, though they can act as allies in game (if four players) or not act allies, the ports will remain open entry for start sequence (what happens during game play is up to players). Sweden and Denmark are allies: Sweden with a home port at Uppsala and Denmark at Jelling.

The game now continues and all following turns are played as follows: The Viking player feeds the Tools of the Norns to the dragonhead prow to devise his fortune in movement. He can then move 2 of his 3 men each turn, possibly taking trade goods, trading, or raiding as described below.

TURNS

Each Vikings turn consists of 2-4 phases.

1. Movement

The Viking takes the Tools of the Norns and feeds it through the dragonhead prow to devise his fortune in movement (he rolls 2 dice). He uses one tool to show him how much he is allotted to move one of his Viking band along the trade routes, and the other tool to move another man. If the man ends his movement in an emporium, the Viking may collect a trade good. The rules below govern movement.

2. Obtaining Trade Goods

Sailing the trade routes, the Viking players gather trade goods of common, rare, and exceptional value at far flung emporia.

Trade Goods: (Prime, Rare, Common)

Using Tokens

Tokens are all designed differently and many are used at different times of game play. Baldur's Odds may only be used after seeing the results of a dismal fate from the Tools of the Norns to reweave a different fate. Thor's Dragonships and Odin's Ravens may only be used in movement phrase.Freya's Fortune and Silver Torc may only be active during the gather trade goods phase. Midgard Serpent and Loki are constants once turned.

Trade or Raid

This action will probably come up mid-game for trading and raiding towards the very end. (Advice!) Each Viking has the option of raiding with each of the other Viking players once per game and raiding the other players once per game. Just remember, no one will feel too kindly towards you after a raid (and don't think about trading with that person after).

The game ends immediately when a Viking player settles (takes) the last land unit.

A full set of all trade items is worth 25 points. Individual trade sets are worth 3 points for all three beverages; 4 points per route for the Baltic and Isles routes; and 5 points for the Far East and New World routes. Any set may be collected more than once. Left over trade goods only get normal modifier.

Click here to read the rules.

PERK STAGES

If we are able to meet certain percentages of our goal, we will be able to offer more with the basic game.

25% Funded: Once we reach 25% funded we will include 4 heavy free score cards with a shield protector to hide your goods

50% Funded: We will include a new fantasy variation on the game: the Ironborn

75% Funded: We will upgrade the game pieces to Viking men

100% Funded: We will give you an option of more Viking coins and include a wooden Viking ship dice tower

 

PERKS

 

Who we Are? (About Us)

DR. VALERIE HAMPTON

Dr. Hampton holds a PhD in History dissertation from Western Michigan University; especially Viking history. 

K'ALLEN SPRAUE-WILLIAMS

K'allen is a 30 year veteran gamer with the desire to design historical games that provide entertainment and help to educate.

KRIS GALLARDO

Kris is not only a member of our Dev team, but also our in-house Illustrator and went to college for graphic arts.

TODD RISEDORF (The Chipmunk)

Todd is a 15 year gaming vet, and retired Naval Nuclear specialist, who loves RPG and strategy games.

Why we need funding?

We need to have this Indiegogo for start up funding as this is the first run on our first conceptualized game. We will also need some adverting, and much better graphics, as well as hiring a game cartographer to amalgamate all our historical maps into a boardgame playable map. Even if we don't meet our goal, we are realistic in our ideal for this being a first printing and to get graphics so we will still be able to continue will fulfilling our project, just without the deluxe perks.

Breaking it all down:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • We have unique perks all based around our game and Viking gaming in history. Please take a look.
  • No matter what, we will be able to fulfill our project, just without the deluxe perks: so feel safe to order the basic game.

The Impact

We are aware we are new to the gaming market. Getting good quality and educational games to our buyers is our goal. For months and the next several months that will be our main focus.We have been testing the most effective way to manufacture a quality strategic and historical Viking boardgame to be able to deliver the best game.  We will be transparent with you  for any issue the might occur and how we are resolving them. We have invested our money into Antiquarian Boardgames to launch this Indiegogo for Traders of Valhalla but, we now need you help to made the game successful. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word about the campaign.

  • Like us on Facebook: Antiquarian Boardgames
  • Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AB_Games_
  • Follow us on Google+: https://plus.google.com/u/0/114117075345607544320
  • Subscribe to our newsletter: http://www.antiquarianboardgames.com/about
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Please support us!

Doctor tested; Chipmunk approved!

story:
Vandalis is a Lewd Fantasy Action RPG created by Shadow Fenrir, and his team.
In it, you'll play through a Zelda-like series of dungeons, fight a variety of foes, and be rewarded with sultry cut scenes.


You'll be able to Change Genders to use different magic spells, and explore how different NPCs interact with your Boy form and your Girl form!


With your help, it's our hope that we can create a game with fun, tight action based gameplay, that rewards success and exploration with a variety of fun, sexy and compelling story elements.

Shadow Fenrir (That's me!) is a published Manga artist, and primarily makes Hentai Comics, like Midnight Movie Night, and BDSM.EXE.
He also hosts the Youtube series Lewd Plays, in which he plays and critiques various Hentai games. He is lead character artist, writer and game designer for Vandalis.

Somehow, he managed to bring the following talented people along for the ride:

  • Terryble -  UI, Cutscenes, Environment, Misc. Programming
  • Kosokosone - Physics, Combat and AI Programming
  • Disco Lotus - Our awesome environment artist, and part time level designer!
  • Brixton Chuck - Dedicated Animator for sprites (and maybe more!)
  • Angry Pants Man - Fantastic musician, and our sole composer!
  • Draw Panther - Super UI expert, Graphic Designer and sometimes SFX artist!

The design we're working on allows the possibility of 4 different quests, each with a 'Damsel' to rescue, Monsters to fight (or seduce?) culminating in the hero saving the entire kingdom!
Our basic goal is to fund the first one of these quests.

We've been working on this game voluntarily, on zero budget, and so far, we've gotten a really good response from people who've played it. Unfortunately, the way it looks right now, the team may not be able to continue developing it, as spare time becomes harder to find, and development slows to a crawl.
We would love the opportunity to complete even just one quest line, and show what we're capable of with the support of the game loving community! (That's you!)

There's a lot of great hentai games out there, it can be hard to make something unique.
We're confident that our game has some appealing features:

  • A gender changing system, allowing the player to choose how to interact with the world
  • Tight controls and finely tuned combat, for a great action based experience
  • Dungeons and puzzles to amuse and intrigue
  • Unlock H scenes through exploration, monster hunting and questing, rather than waiting for a game over screen

Share the video and the campaign page with your friends!
Every little bit counts, and hopefully in time, everyone will get a chance to play it.
 

Stretch Goals

Our base goal helps us solidify our pipeline, and develop our first quest.
After that, the journey begins to expand the project, and even develop whole new quests!
story_txt:
Vandalis is a Lewd Fantasy Action RPG created by Shadow Fenrir, and his team.In it, you'll play through a Zelda-like series of dungeons, fight a variety of foes, and be rewarded with sultry cut scenes.
You'll be able to Change Genders to use different magic spells, and explore how different NPCs interact with your Boy form and your Girl form!
With your help, it's our hope that we can create a game with fun, tight action based gameplay, that rewards success and exploration with a variety of fun, sexy and compelling story elements.


Shadow Fenrir (That's me!) is a published Manga artist, and primarily makes Hentai Comics, like Midnight Movie Night, and BDSM.EXE.He also hosts the Youtube series Lewd Plays, in which he plays and critiques various Hentai games. He is lead character artist, writer and game designer for Vandalis.Somehow, he managed to bring the following talented people along for the ride:


Terryble -  UI, Cutscenes, Environment, Misc. Programming

Kosokosone - Physics, Combat and AI Programming

Disco Lotus - Our awesome environment artist, and part time level designer!

Brixton Chuck - Dedicated Animator for sprites (and maybe more!)

Angry Pants Man - Fantastic musician, and our sole composer!

Draw Panther - Super UI expert, Graphic Designer and sometimes SFX artist!

(That's you!)

story: .

Well Hold up, don't go away. I just want to thank you for stopping by:-) Hope you enjoy.

The Whole Objective

   I'd love to be the king of games. What better feeling is there than to sit among a crowded room of suckers you just smashed in Madden or Call of Duty? Doing it while getting an awesome prize and helping spur the growth of the community AND helping out 3 local charities! We at Black Theory want to provide the only real arcade and competitive gaming experience in Columbus. NO ARCADES??? Wow, and this is amazing because there are 2 HUGE schools here and a large diverse community. This is a project that I can prove projects at over 400k 1st year profit. Can you imagine 40k a year helping out local charities and organizing community events? Adding a youth football and basketball league are our 2013 goals if we can get this going!
 
   My goal is to become the central hub for every teenagers in the city, every competitive sports or shooting game player, and even those casual gamers that just love the thrill of competition. Come play the hottest games on Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3, tournament style with prizes.
 
Whoa, I got some facts for you...
Sharing games with your friends and buying used games are being taken away from us!! The new systems are making it where you can only play your game on YOUR system. Im combating that with a competitve gaming arcade for current and future Gen consoles.
 
Are you aware that the average gamer is 35? How about the fact that %65 of world plays video games. About %20 percent of those pay to play online. Even more so, %77 play with friends. Kids spend their whole allowance at the arcades with good games. So there are 780k people in Columbus and over %70 percent are under 36, 85,000 college students and ZERO arcades in Columbus!!!
 
 How do we Profit?

   Entry is $1 per day for non members. You will receive a tag upon payment.
 
   Membership is $15 a month, 25 for 6 months and 35 for the year.. Membership is transferable once. Members get in free and are allowed 2 buddies. They also receive half off all tournament entries.
 
   Tournaments are held in which prizes and cash are given to the winner or winning team. Prizes range from $50-500 depending upon size of tournament and sponsor. Tournaments entry is $10 for single player tournaments and $8 per person in team games. A minimum of 30 players or teams are in each tournament. We host tournaments in 6 different games, 3 events per evening and we are swinging open to close all weekend.
 
   We have a very experienced B2b team to help us engage with sponsors for the events we hold.
 
   There is a Void in the video game repair industry and local PC repair is very expensive. We have A+ certified PC techs on hand to handle any PC issue at a very affordable flat rate price to do repair of virus and malware, and would also make all other repairs affordable to the average person. I won’t charge anyone $100 to remove virus from a PC I will have your PC, Xbox 360, Ps3, Wii or PSP repaired and returned in 24-48hr. Many will be same day depending on volume.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down in more detail:

We are seeking $35,000 in funding for various reasons. We need to purchase Large HD TV, lease of the building, Very light building maintenance, office stationary, a ton of games and game peripherals. Also needed are Vinyl cutters and heat press, pool tables and arcades. The initial launch market campaign is estimated at $3000 for assurance that we have optimum impact immediately(massive street campaign).

We offer cash prizes and offer systems to winners of tournaments and to members based on a unique point ranking system based off the collective amount of games you play at the arcade. Prizes for tournament range from $50 to $500 based on event. T-shirt and other prizes from us and sponsors

If our goal is not met, we will continue to work towards our goal to get funded through all means necessary. All our commitments will stand as promised. These are or company pledges. All contributing members will be give a huge thank you personally. I can call you, skype you, email, write a letter, you just let me know:-). Also, you will be given a space on the Black Theory Website and be placed upon of Wall of Game Fame. Forever, no takey backies.

The Impact

My goal is to build a vibrate youth community where many positives can be brought about. I want to teach cohesion instead of the volatile time we are experiencing now. I experienced the arcade growing up and I witnessed it die because it didn't evolve. There was one place us kids could go and not have a problem. The Arcade. We bought candy and played street fighter till our thumbs were numb. Video games are great as a point of social interaction. The revenue would would be put into the community towards getting kids more involved in sport(I am a ex football and basketball coach) and of course the goodwill and the 2 charities that I allow my pledge to pick. Im not trying to get rich. This is meant to create a wonderful environment for all age of game player and give the community a positive beat and a little boost.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm not mad if you can't help. So don't think twice about it, you can still help!! Do me a favor and add my links to you Twitter or Facebook, tell about us in your blog. Just get the word out any way you can.

story:
English Version There!

Discover & test with us our new Gozu Zone products there !
Découvrez et testez avec nous nos nouveaux produits sur Gozu Zone!

Une nouvelle génération de tokens 3D compatibles avec X Wing* est née !

** MISE A JOUR 1 ** 21/01/15

Nous venons d'ajouter une nouvelle fonctionnalité au rangement en nid d'abeille : il est désormais possible de sortir les tokens un à un !


Devenez pionnier en participant au financement de la première génération de tokens en relief compatibles avec X Wing  !

S'appuyant sur la technologie d'impression 3D, ces tokens bénéficient à la fois d'une esthétique léchée encore plus immersive et aussi d'une forme qui facilite leur rangement !

Le Format Starter !

Il contient les 35 tokens de base discutés avec la communauté + 1 rangement en forme de nid d'abeille, soit :

- 10 tokens SHIELD

- 10 tokens LOCK (pairs de A à E)

- 5  tokens EVADE

- 5 tokens FOCUS

- 5 tokens STRESS

Les Blisters** !

* Ceci n'est pas le packaging final (il manque encore la cartonnette produit dans chaque blister)
Ce sont les joueurs qui choisissent leur blister. Chacun d'entre eux contient 8 tokens. Un premier choix:
8 EVADE
8 LOCKS (F/F, G/G, H/H, I/I)
8 STRESS
8 FOCUS
8 SHIELDS

Selon les niveaux d'objectif atteints sur ce financement participatif, il sera possible de débloquer de nouveaux blisters, dont le design sera aussi soumis à la communauté!

DE NOUVEAUX TOKENS A DEBLOQUER:

Le Packaging: il contient les membres de la communauté ayant participé à certaines face du développement du produit (discussion sur le starter de base, remarque sur l'esthétique du produit, test des tokens...). 


Gozu Zone, un concepteur et fabricant d'accessoires de jeux ayant déjà fait ses preuves.

Grâce à son utilisation des avantages de l'impression 3D, Gozu zone est le plus local et innovant des fabricants d'accessoires pour les jeux ! Nous en avons démontré la preuve avec la création et la fabrication du set d'astéroïdes compatible X Wing qui cartonne dans les boutiques de jeux ! Cela nous a permis d'acquérir une première solide expérience du travail avec les boutiques de jeux et de la maîtrise de notre production.

Une participation efficace de la communauté autour des tokens 3D !

Les membres de la communauté ont pu donner leur avis sur la composition du starter de base, afin d'avoir un consensus sur une répartition équilibrée de tokens. Les joueurs ont aussi présenté des innovations et évolutions possibles pour les améliorer.

Un financement participatif pour passer à la vitesse supérieure!

Nous faisons appel au financement participatif pour ce projet afin de déverrouiller nos capacités de production, aujourd'hui limitées, à avancer nos dépenses de packaging, qui sont importantes et à faire plus parler de nous, et à faciliter notre installation dans de nouveaux locaux qui nous permettront de répondre aux besoins des joueurs!

Un projet qui aura d'importantes répercussions sur le monde de jeu

Ces tokens marquent un tournant dans le gameplay des joueurs: il est maintenant possible de développer toute une gamme de pièces avec des formes plus complexes et s'adressant aux besoins spécifiques des joueurs (immersivité des pièces, pièces plus faciles à saisir, à ranger, à identifier sur le tapis de jeu...)

Des boutiques partenaires qui nous soutiennent !

De nombreuses boutiques se prêtent au jeu de ce financement participatif ! Les joueurs qui passent commande en boutique économiseront sur les frais de port et seront livrés en même temps que les lots "lève-tôt" !
Vous pourrez aussi regarder et toucher le token Shield qui se trouve sur le support du teaser !
Si vous souhaitez que votre boutique se joigne à ce financement participatif, n'hésitez pas à nous écrire afin que nous puissions la contacter !

Liste non définitive et susceptible d'évoluer pendant la campagne




Les autres boutiques dans lesquelles vous pouvez venir examiner un échantillon de token !

GRENOBLE:
Hobbyshop

LILLE:
Hobby Max
Rocambole

LYON:
Descartes Lyon
Ukronium 1828

MARSEILLE:
Role Games

METZ:
Petit Peuple

VERSAILLES:
Appel du dé





Risques et défis

Une production déjà éprouvée et prête à tourner !

Les risques de retard peuvent être entraînés par la réalisation du packaging final, la livraison de nouvelles machines et leur préparation et l'installation d'une nouvelle ligne de production.

S'agissant du premier point, nous avons déjà l'habitude de travailler avec des prestataires locaux assez réactifs qui devraient pouvoir réagir en quelques jours. Les machines devraient être livrées dans le temps car la période de clôture du financement participatif correspond à un nouveau réassort. Enfin, la plupart des tokens ont déjà été profilés et testés pour notre nouvelle ligne de production.

Dans tous les cas, si un retard se produit, nous garderons l'ordre de priorité de livraison (LEVE-TÔT + boutiques) et celui-ci devrait être raisonnable, compte tenu de notre expérience déjà accumulée sur une petite série.

Comment nous aider!

Faites passer le mot auprès de votre communauté ! Les organisateurs de tournoi d'X Wing pourront se voir offrir un blister de shields à offrir en prix à leurs joueurs.

* Les tokens 3D de Gozu Zone ont été créé pour être compatible avec le jeu de plateau X Wing, édité par Edge en France. Gozu Zone n'est pas affilié avec Edge et ils ne cautionnent pas nos produits.
** Ceci n'est pas le packaging final des blisters : nous allons ajouter une cartonnette mentionnant le nom du produit et ajoutant les informations légales demandées.



A NEW GENERATION OF X WING* 3D TOKENS IS BORN !

** UPDATE 1 ** 01/21/2015

We just added a new feature on the honey comb storage box: the ability to move out tokens one by one !



Pioneer this crowdfunding campaign of the first 3D tokens compatible with X Wing ! These 3D tokens enjoy enhanced design and a new hexagon shape for better stacking in their storage box !


The Starter
It contains 35 Hexagon shape tokens as discussed with the X Wing community + 1 Sexy Honey Comb shape storage box!

- 10 tokens "SHIELD"

- 10 tokens "LOCK" (couple of A Letter to E)

- 5  tokens "EVADE"

- 5 tokens "STRESS"

- 5 token "FOCUS"


The Blisters* !

You choose the type of blister you need. Each of the blister contains 8 tokens. At first, you can pick a blister of:
8 EVADE or
8 LOCKS (F/F, G/G, H/H, I/I) or
8 STRESS or
8 FOCUS or
8 SHIELDS or

According to the different stretch goals, it might be possible for you to unlock new blisters with different tokens! If it is the case, the design will be discussed and approved by the community !

NEW TOKENS TO UNLOCK :

The packaging: it contains the name of the members who contributed to the different steps of the Token development (content of the starter, the design of the tokens, testings, comments on the products...)

Gozu Zone, the new designer and game accessories manufacturer with a already proven track records!
Thanks to 3D Printing technology, Gozu Zone is a able to innovate and bring to the light a new gaming experience. We prove it with a Asteroids 3D Sets with a removable base system which was a hit in game boards & figurines shops! This empowered us to get an experience working with the shops and get into our production process.

Effective help of the X Wing community on the 3D token development !
The community members gave their opinion on the mix of token in the base starter, on the token of the token, the stacking system...

A crowdfunding campaign to move up another gear !
We need this crowdfunding campaign to unlock our production capabilities, today somewhat limited, pay the packaging of the product (boxes and designed paper), be refunded for the 3D sculpt, and facilitate our move to a new Headquarter to respond to the growing demands of the players!

A project with an impact on the gaming world!
These small tokens mark a turning point in the history of the gameplay: now a brand new generation of tokens and game accessories are unleashed : more relevant shapes easier to grasp, more accuracy and much better immersion in your game !

BRICK AND MORTARS SHOPS BACK US
Many shops joined in for the show of this crowdfunding campaign and are willing to advertise in their shop !

Provisory list of shops backing the campaign !

Limited risks & Challenges

A proven production method almost ready to rock !

Delays in shipping could be caused by the release of the final packaging (1), the new shippment of the machines (2) and to install new machines, as well as the production line (3).

Final packaging (1) : almost done
we have already selected the blister and starter shape, and we finished the design of the paper inside the box. We have a very responsive contractor to deliver it who could do it in a few days.

New shippment of machines (2) : new availability at the end of february
The new machines are in stock and could be delivered within a few days, at the end of february, so we will be able to deal with an unexpected demand.

New machines installation and production line (3) : the first tokens profiles are ready
We are already using the machine for a few tokens (Shield) and we are setting up the process to produce also the other tokens. So we believe we can make it !

How could I help you?
As we are very new, we have a extremly limited international awareness (almost zero), so if you like to talk about us in your country community, it would be very helpful ! We would be very happy to thank you by offering a blister of your choice to make it a prize for a tournament you organize.

*Gozu Zone 3D tokens designed for use with the X-Wing board game by Fantasy Flight Publishing, Inc. , Gozu. Zone is not affiliated with Fantasy Flight Publishing, Inc. and they do not endorse these products.

** This is not the final packaging of the blisters : We are going to add a paper mentionning the name of product inside.

We just added a new feature on the honey comb storage box: the ability to move out tokens one by one !


Pioneer this crowdfunding campaign of the first 3D tokens compatible with X Wing ! These 3D tokens enjoy enhanced design and a new hexagon shape for better stacking in their storage box !
The Starter It contains 35 Hexagon shape tokens as discussed with the X Wing community + 1 Sexy Honey Comb shape storage box! 
- 10 tokens "SHIELD"- 10 tokens "LOCK" (couple of A Letter to E)
- 5  tokens "EVADE"
- 5 tokens "STRESS"
- 5 token "FOCUS"

The Blisters* !


You choose the type of blister you need. Each of the blister contains 8 tokens. At first, you can pick a blister of:8 EVADE or8 LOCKS (F/F, G/G, H/H, I/I) or8 STRESS or8 FOCUS or8 SHIELDS orAccording to the different stretch goals, it might be possible for you to unlock new blisters with different tokens! If it is the case, the design will be discussed and approved by the community !NEW TOKENS TO UNLOCK :The packaging: it contains the name of the members who contributed to the different steps of the Token development (content of the starter, the design of the tokens, testings, comments on the products...)Gozu Zone, the new designer and game accessories manufacturer with a already proven track records!Thanks to 3D Printing technology, Gozu Zone is a able to innovate and bring to the light a new gaming experience. We prove it with a Asteroids 3D Sets with a removable base system which was a hit in game boards & figurines shops! This empowered us to get an experience working with the shops and get into our production process.Effective help of the X Wing community on the 3D token development !The community members gave their opinion on the mix of token in the base starter, on the token of the token, the stacking system...A crowdfunding campaign to move up another gear !We need this crowdfunding campaign to unlock our production capabilities, today somewhat limited, pay the packaging of the product (boxes and designed paper), be refunded for the 3D sculpt, and facilitate our move to a new Headquarter to respond to the growing demands of the players!A project with an impact on the gaming world!These small tokens mark a turning point in the history of the gameplay: now a brand new generation of tokens and game accessories are unleashed : more relevant shapes easier to grasp, more accuracy and much better immersion in your game !BRICK AND MORTARS SHOPS BACK USMany shops joined in for the show of this crowdfunding campaign and are willing to advertise in their shop ! Provisory list of shops backing the campaign !

Limited risks & Challenges

A proven production method almost ready to rock !

Delays in shipping could be caused by the release of the final packaging (1), the new shippment of the machines (2) and to install new machines, as well as the production line (3).
Final packaging (1) : almost donewe have already selected the blister and starter shape, and we finished the design of the paper inside the box. We have a very responsive contractor to deliver it who could do it in a few days.New shippment of machines (2) : new availability at the end of februaryThe new machines are in stock and could be delivered within a few days, at the end of february, so we will be able to deal with an unexpected demand.New machines installation and production line (3) : the first tokens profiles are readyWe are already using the machine for a few tokens (Shield) and we are setting up the process to produce also the other tokens. So we believe we can make it !How could I help you?As we are very new, we have a extremly limited international awareness (almost zero), so if you like to talk about us in your country community, it would be very helpful ! We would be very happy to thank you by offering a blister of your choice to make it a prize for a tournament you organize. *Gozu Zone 3D tokens designed for use with the X-Wing board game by Fantasy Flight Publishing, Inc. , Gozu. Zone is not affiliated with Fantasy Flight Publishing, Inc. and they do not endorse these products.** This is not the final packaging of the blisters : We are going to add a paper mentionning the name of product inside.

story:
Hi!

Short Summary


Hey, My name's Isaac. I am working with a friend to bring a cool, cheap FPS game to the masses. It's called Worlds Apart, and I think I should tell you a bit about it:  

  • Worlds Apart is a survival game set in 2060, after a nuclear war has driven all surviving humans out of the northen hemisphere. 
  • You take the place of Soldier 26-80 (Maybe, haven't decided the name yet), whose mission it is to inspect a small city in America and decide if it is safe for human inhabitance. 
  • However, there is no intel. A small militia controls the city, which is teeming with zombies. It is your mission to cleanse the city, and return it to order!
I would also like to tell you about me and my friend. We work under the pseudonym of Critical Interactive, and are in the process of making a couple of games right now. 

  •  My area of expertise is level design and programming. I have about 2 years of experience with Unity, and this is my first big project. 
  • I am working with Jeremy Davis, who is an artist who works on some of our 2d projects. He has been responsible for some 2d art ingame. 

What We Need & What You Get 

Here is where the funds are going: 

  •  About $200 is going towards level designing and new 3d models. 
  • Another $100 is going towards AI 
  • Another $100 is going towards GUI 
  • Another $50 is going towards Advertising and Distribution 
  • Another $100 goes toward Jeremy for helping out. I am recieving no personal profit for this game. 
  • Another $150 goes to a license for Mixamo 
  • The final $150 dollars goes towards perks and fees on IndieGogo, because they arent free to create 
NB: Any money over the $850 is going towards Charity:Water because they are great guys and we don't really need any more money than that. 

The Impact 

This is really important to me for personal reasons. Being able to publish my game is a dream I have had for a long time, but unfortunately, I dont have the funds to do so. By donating you are getting a cool game, but also you are helping me complete my dream.

Other Ways You Can Help 

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help: Just get the word out and make some noise about this campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools! And that’s all there is to it.

Thanks so much for considering my campaign, I hope you donate and support my dream.

Where to go

Our Website: http://criticalinteractive.net
Twitter: http://twitter.com/CritInteractive
These sites will help you keep up to date with the project.
Thanks!
~Isaac and Jeremy

story:
The Apeiron Project is a first person surrealistic thriller-horror. You will explore three different main worlds which represent different times of Steven’s Life
- The manor. This is the first one and represent Steven’s childhood.
- The ruined city. This is the second level and represent Steven’s teenage. This level is also the bigger one because you will be able to explore a full ruined city, a forest and a mysterious town...
- The lab. Nothing to say about this level -secret- ;)

Other feature?
- More than 10 nightmares to explore. A nightmare is a surrealistic world where Steven's deepest fears become real.
- More than 100 lost memories to collect.
- Huge worlds to explore
- Variety of environment
- Around 50 NPC to talk with
- Variety of gameplay


In The Apeiron Project you will face with Steven's past, present and even his future...in a world where time is nothing more than a word.

 

The game born as a little project for mobile platform but while we were working on the plot something happened and we decided to turn it into a bigger project and this is why we're here.

 

We're working on The Apeiron Project full time, as you can see we made a lot of improvements since we started working on it

 

 

but there are a lots of things left to do. With your support and donations you will help us in many different ways:

- Allow us to live until the game will be out

- Pay contractors

- Accelerating the production process

- Pay physicals rewards (like CD, posters, DVD and stuff like that)

- Help us to make the mobile version look as good as the PC version!

- As you have seen we're using flash-like animation for our cinematics, with your help we will add hand animated animations!

- Better graphics, better gameplay, more environments and new characters!

- Gameplay and design improvements for nightmares sessions.

- Oculus VR & Razer Hydra support.

 

 


We offer digital download, digital artwork, digital wallpaper and other “digital” stuff but we know that what you really want are physical reward!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

IMPORTANT: When you buy physical reward stuff like posters or postcards will be shipped as soon as the campaign will be over but the game and the CD Soundtrack will be shipped as soon as the game will be ready. Shipping cost are not included.

story:
Who we are…

First of all, we’d like to introduce ourselves. Yes, we’re 7D Studio but, more than that, we’re people with dreams, we’re a family literally. One of our greatest passions in life has to do with videogames. Back in time, when we were kids, we used to play different games for hours. Once, our youngest brother, amused by the powerful game console at that time, the PSX 1, said while we were playing Metal Gear Solid: “when I grow up, I’ll create my own games”. We didn’t stop laughing. In fact, those were big words. Although we never believed, it finally happened.

We have regular jobs but in the nights, on weekends and “vacations” we work as hard as we can in this field. Sometimes we sleep little because of the commitment to our cause.
Tired of looking for publishers, we started to look for another alternative such as this community to raise the money that our projects require.  7D Studio is looking for passionate people who love videogames as well. We got a ton of ideas; in fact, we’ve created some games already (please check our website) but it’s still so expensive and time consuming. All the money raised, regardless of the amount, will be invested only on this project.

7D Studio is an open-minded company that wants to listen to all of you, so that we can create new games together for free!
The dream we have will only be possible if you support our passionate work, ideas and endless enthusiasm.

About Monkey in Space Project...

The game we’re developing now is named Monkey in Space Project. This is a 3D game with state-of-the-art mobile graphics designed for iOS and Android operating systems. However, we’re planning to release a special version for PC and Mac. Monkey in Space Project intends to be a TPS (third person shooter) but there will be a lot of puzzles to solve before moving on within the game. It’s going to be fun.

What we need…

To finish this videogame in particular (Monkey in Space Project) we need to get USD 35000 to pay salaries (4 modelers, 2 animators, 5 graphic artists, 2 programmers, 1 musician, a bunch of licenses and rendering farm services).  

What you get…

Well, you’ll get a high quality game totally free to download. Your name will also appear in both the credits list and the game itself! (it could be on a wall, a puzzle, a picture, an item. Get ready to be surprised!)  You’re gonna love this: We’re going to provide a secret code to our contributors to access to secrets on the game

And last but not least, you’ll have supported this dream we have.

To keep in mind…

We sincerely want to thank you for taking your time to listen to us. Please remember that there are  thousands of ways to help. By sharing this campaign you’ll help us so much as well. We’re also interested in any volunteer contribution. Please visit our website. And thanks again.

Sincerely;

7D Studio team.

story:
*Archived*

This campaign was financially not a success, but I am very happy I made this experience. After years of work I finally published "The Piano" to Steam Greenlight. Hopefully it will get voted enough and if it should get on Steam I will give all the funders of this campaign a Steam-Code for the game. Thank you for your trust!

Please vote, share and greenlight!

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=779365013

The campaign is over - unfortunetly we didn't get it fully funded. We got about 140 USD from the campaign and about 200 USD from other plattforms directly. Additionally I personally funded about 800 USD apart from indiegogo. This is still not enough to get it funded, but we will continue to develop it anyway! To all funders and supporters: You will get all upcoming information on www.mistaken-visions.com/ .

We will keep you informed! www.facebook.com/MistakenVisionsHamburg

story:
"While most recent MMO's have chased the EQ/WOW models, it's great to see games like Project: Gorgon, pursuing the more open world and sandbox style that I think is underserved to gamers." -Richard (Lord British) Garriott.

 

Crowdfunding Update

In order to properly introduce our Indiegogo Campaign, we thought that it was important to explain to our supporters and all those interested in Project: Gorgon on where we are in the development process and how our previous Kickstarter Campaign and our current Indiegogo Campaign fit into our overall plans. Project: Gorgon is currently in the alpha stage of development and with every update that we roll out we move closer to launching on Stream Early Access. Once we launch on Steam Early Access we will have officially moved from the alpha stage of development to early beta.

Last year we ran a successful Kickstarter Campaign which allowed players from around the world show their interest in Project: Gorgon. Since that time, we’ve made significant progress in setting a solid foundation for Project: Gorgon. We’ve designed, developed and implemented three new zones along with an entirely unique new player experience. We have implemented dozens of new skills and have added a large number of new items. We’ve added a new animal-friendly town for those players who wish to play one of our unique animal experiences. We’ve completely overhauled our power system and equipment bonuses. We completely rewrote our camera system. We’ve made significant changes to the quest system, added NPCS, guilds, guild missions, player vendors, dispensers, work orders, drowning and a lot of other features. In addition, we’ve recently introduced the Knife skill which is a precursor to the Fairy race and we are currently in the process of a complete GUI overhaul! There are countless other changes, but this should give you a solid understanding of the progress we are making since our initial Kickstarter campaign.

We’ve decided to run an Indiegogo Campaign for multiple reasons and in order to be transparent we wanted to share those with everyone. Since our Kickstarter Campaign, we’ve had people from around the world interested in supporting Project: Gorgon but the Kickstarter Campaign only accepted credit card payments. There has always been a high level of interest from those who would like to contribute via PayPal, but until now that hasn’t been an option. Indiegogo will allow interested parties to donate to Project: Gorgon using either a credit or PayPal so it opens that additional avenue of support to players who missed out on the opportunity the first time around. Additionally, Project: Gorgon is currently pre-revenue and since our last Kickstarter Campaign ended we have had no incoming revenue but we continue to incur development costs including server costs, contracted development help, contracted artists, and other costs related to the overall development of Project: Gorgon. Finally, this campaign will allow us to raise additional funds which will be used to implement upon existing, planned, and “wish list” game features.

We are extremely grateful for those who are able to donate to Project: Gorgon, but if you are unable to financially support us at this time it would be extremely valuable if you were able to post about Project: Gorgon on third party websites. Alternatively, mentioning Project: Gorgon on your social media pages is a great way to spread the word. We have a lot of important updates planned, including a complete re-write and graphical overhaul of the User Interface. A lot of exciting changes are on the horizon and we hope that you and your friends will join us in this adventure!

 

Project: Gorgon is a new Massively Multiplayer Online Game brought to you by Eric Heimburg and his wife Sandra Powers. Eric Heimburg, Project: Gorgon creator and lead developer, has over a decade of experience working as a Senior and Lead Engineer, Developer, Designer and Producer on successful games such as Asheron’s Call 1 and 2, Star Trek Online and other successful Massively Multiplayer Online Games. Sandra also has extensive experience working as a Producer on Asheron’s Call 1, Asheron’s Call: Throne of Destiny, EverQuest II, and EverQuest II: Echoes of Faydwer.

Project: Gorgon is a 3D fantasy MMORPG (massively-multiplayer online role-playing game) that features an immersive experience that allows the player to forge their own path through exploration and discovery. We won't be guiding you through a world on rails, and as a result there are many hidden secrets awaiting discovery. Project: Gorgon also features an ambitious skill based leveling system that bucks the current trend of pre-determined classes, thus allowing the player to combine skills in order to create a truly unique playing experience.

When you play Project: Gorgon, we want you to feel as if you’re immersed in a whole new virtual world. Rather than trying to manage this with just graphics and excessive backstory, we’ve designed the game with dozens of gameplay features that make you feel like you’re really there, interacting with the world, such as: 

  • If you are on fire, you can jump into a lake to put it out. This type of mechanic can have subtle effect on your strategies, especially when you are fighting a fire mage! 
  • You can drop items on the ground, and other players can pick them up. What’s so great about that? Imagine laying down a trail of literal (virtual) breadcrumbs to guide your friends (or lure your enemies) into the woods. 
  • Shopkeepers keep inventory, so you can buy items that other players have sold to them. Want to help out new players? Sell your cast-off items to the shopkeeper in the new player zone and watch the new players go to town.
  • Each non-player (NPC) you meet has their own goals and interest, and reward players that choose to be their friend.
  • You can inscribe messages onto items, write books, and even leave notes for other players. Make your name as an in-game poet, or pronounce your greatness to the world!

In Project: Gorgon you will kill monsters, a lot of them, and you will be taking their loot. In order to keep the experience fun and interesting we’ve developed unique combat experiences to keep the fights feeling fresh. The loot is randomly generated, monsters have unique abilities, and dungeons have puzzles, traps and terrifying bosses! The combat skills are entirely free-form. You can learn as many combat skills as you want, and use any two of them at the same time to create your own personal “class.” Project: Gorgon will feature dozens to choose from, but some examples include: 

  • Battle Chemistry: Create huge explosions, inject yourself with mysterious mutagens or program a pet golem, it’s your decision! 
  • Unarmed Combat: Grapple and control enemies using a situational-aware combo system that varies based on where you are and what day it is. 
  • Animal Handling: Tame animals and train them to become ferocious fighters. Then breed your best and sell their offspring to other players.
  • Necromancy: Seek out corpses and graveyards to raise an undead army. No graveyard around? Well, there are always the corpses of your friends. 
  • That’s just a few, there’s also Sword Fighting, Combat Psychology, Staff Fighting, Sigil Scripting, Mentalism, and more.

Player Choices are important in Project: Gorgon. You can learn as many skills as you want, but sometimes power comes with downsides. You can become infected with lycanthropy and gain access to very powerful skill sets. You’ll be able to roam the world in a pack or as a lone wolf. However, when there is a full moon (which is tied to the real world lunar calendar) you’ll be stuck in your beast form. New opportunists come open, but others will be closed. There’s no cure for lycanthropy.

 You can become a Druid, which will give you great power but you have to vow to drop everything when there’s an emergency involving nature. It could be a forest fire, a monster invasion or even a pesky insect. Nature never lets you ignore your duties, ever. 

Can you bear heavy burdens in exchange for greater power?

Community is a critical aspect of Project: Gorgon and we will strive to establish a strong, engaged community and we plan on supporting our players through:

  • Live events with a focus on story.
  • Mechanisms for player-create quest content. 
  • Player housing (limited instanced).
  • Player-managed shops and stalls.
  • In-game communication tools like bulletin boards.
  • Bookshelves where you can write and submit your own books and stories (and players can vote on their favorites).
