Alternatively, mentioning Project: Gorgon on your social media pages is a great way to spread the word. We have a lot of important updates planned, including a complete re-write and graphical overhaul of the User Interface. A lot of exciting changes are on the horizon and we hope that you and your friends will join us in this adventure! Project: Gorgon is a new Massively Multiplayer Online Game brought to you by Eric Heimburg and his wife Sandra Powers. Eric Heimburg, Project: Gorgon creator and lead developer, has over a decade of experience working as a Senior and Lead Engineer, Developer, Designer and Producer on successful games such as Asheron’s Call 1 and 2, Star Trek Online and other successful Massively Multiplayer Online Games. Sandra also has extensive experience working as a Producer on Asheron’s Call 1, Asheron’s Call: Throne of Destiny, EverQuest II, and EverQuest II: Echoes of Faydwer.Project: Gorgon is a 3D fantasy MMORPG (massively-multiplayer online role-playing game) that features an immersive experience that allows the player to forge their own path through exploration and discovery. We won't be guiding you through a world on rails, and as a result there are many hidden secrets awaiting discovery. Project: Gorgon also features an ambitious skill based leveling system that bucks the current trend of pre-determined classes, thus allowing the player to combine skills in order to create a truly unique playing experience.When you play Project: Gorgon, we want you to feel as if you’re immersed in a whole new virtual world. Rather than trying to manage this with just graphics and excessive backstory, we’ve designed the game with dozens of gameplay features that make you feel like you’re really there, interacting with the world, such as: 
If you are on fire, you can jump into a lake to put it out. This type of mechanic can have subtle effect on your strategies, especially when you are fighting a fire mage! 
You can drop items on the ground, and other players can pick them up. What’s so great about that? Imagine laying down a trail of literal (virtual) breadcrumbs to guide your friends (or lure your enemies) into the woods. 
Shopkeepers keep inventory, so you can buy items that other players have sold to them. Want to help out new players? Sell your cast-off items to the shopkeeper in the new player zone and watch the new players go to town.
Each non-player (NPC) you meet has their own goals and interest, and reward players that choose to be their friend.
You can inscribe messages onto items, write books, and even leave notes for other players. Make your name as an in-game poet, or pronounce your greatness to the world!
In Project: Gorgon you will kill monsters, a lot of them, and you will be taking their loot. In order to keep the experience fun and interesting we’ve developed unique combat experiences to keep the fights feeling fresh. The loot is randomly generated, monsters have unique abilities, and dungeons have puzzles, traps and terrifying bosses! The combat skills are entirely free-form. You can learn as many combat skills as you want, and use any two of them at the same time to create your own personal “class.” Project: Gorgon will feature dozens to choose from, but some examples include: 
Battle Chemistry: Create huge explosions, inject yourself with mysterious mutagens or program a pet golem, it’s your decision! 
Unarmed Combat: Grapple and control enemies using a situational-aware combo system that varies based on where you are and what day it is. 
Animal Handling: Tame animals and train them to become ferocious fighters. Then breed your best and sell their offspring to other players.
Necromancy: Seek out corpses and graveyards to raise an undead army. No graveyard around? Well, there are always the corpses of your friends. 
That’s just a few, there’s also Sword Fighting, Combat Psychology, Staff Fighting, Sigil Scripting, Mentalism, and more.
Player Choices are important in Project: Gorgon. You can learn as many skills as you want, but sometimes power comes with downsides. You can become infected with lycanthropy and gain access to very powerful skill sets. You’ll be able to roam the world in a pack or as a lone wolf. However, when there is a full moon (which is tied to the real world lunar calendar) you’ll be stuck in your beast form. New opportunists come open, but others will be closed. There’s no cure for lycanthropy. You can become a Druid, which will give you great power but you have to vow to drop everything when there’s an emergency involving nature. It could be a forest fire, a monster invasion or even a pesky insect. Nature never lets you ignore your duties, ever. Can you bear heavy burdens in exchange for greater power?Community is a critical aspect of Project: Gorgon and we will strive to establish a strong, engaged community and we plan on supporting our players through:
Live events with a focus on story.
Mechanisms for player-create quest content. 
Player housing (limited instanced).
Player-managed shops and stalls.
In-game communication tools like bulletin boards.
Bookshelves where you can write and submit your own books and stories (and players can vote on their favorites).

story:
Update: All who contribute get Mithril and ICE dragon mount within 48 hours (or sooner) from funding time. 

Rest of rewards after funding finishes.

=========================

Help us add COSTUME and HATS system to game. After costume system is in the game it will be possible to dress up any way you want, no matter what actual gear you are wearing.

Check below link with all great Costumes and Hats ideas which could be realized with that sytem.

Submit your own Costume and/or Hat idea too !

Click here to check Costume Ideas

Click here to check Hats Ideas

=========================

 

THE OLD SCHOOL MMO RPG RETURNS

Do you remember Ultima Online, early days of Everquest 1 or other games from that era?

Do you remember the days when MMO Role-Playing Games were actually about RPG, deep immersion in the game world and a community of like minded players?

We teamed up to create a new old-school MMO RPG which brings all that back.

World of Midgard is a multi-platform, old-school 3D MMO RPG core game, the kind you used to enjoy in the past, now about to be brought to your Mac & PC and mobile devices (Android, iOS).

All players will play on the same servers.

How many times you wished to be able to take your PC or Mac game with you? 

Well now you are about to be able to.

Click here to download beta version of the game for Mac & PC, Android & iOS 

Because of long apple approval times iOS beta version has still old user interface. We plan to have Linux beta version next month.

 

 

 

Read what others have said about World of Midgard

"And you've seen a lot of them offering to let you play on both mobile devices and on your desktop...

Wait, that part is kind of new. And if it appeals to you, you should probably take a look at..."

Original article is here

 

"It's crazy what we're starting to see on mobile devices as the performance gap closes more and more with each iteration of mobile technology."

"Back in the day when I was playing EverQuest, Dark Age of Camelot [...] I never thought I'd be playing something that looked even remotely similar on my phone. Enter World of Midgard..."

Original article is here

 

"There are dungeons as well as raid dungeons, PvP arenas, mounts, gear sets, quests, lot and lots of items and pretty much everything you expect to find in an MMORPG. This one is also cross-platform compatible..."

Original article is here

 

Check those fan-made videos and see for yourself how great fun people are already having from the beta version. 

Watch: 8-man guild raid: Open world boss Oughust 

Watch: 2vs1 & 1vs1 PvP (Player vs Player)

Watch: 5-man Dread Basilica Dungeon Guild Run 

Watch: 5-man Hellenic Dungeon Guild Run 

 

World of Midgard offers rich, amazing, full 3D fantasy world, together with full support for factions conflict, factions battleground, rated arenas, 10-man raiding system, and more.

On plot level, World of Midgard focuses on a conflict between the two warring faction, the Alliance and the Fury, the struggle between them, and also their fight against a common enemy, the Swarm.

The game has a deeply immersing lore, which tells the story of the past of World of Midgard’s heroes, the battles they fought, and the tale of the Schism, the Swarm, Survival & Conquest, and the Treaty of the Fallen Oak. Those who want to find out more about the game lore should check the link that enables the download of the book.

Click here to download Lore Book Sample

During your journey through the game’s world you will immerse yourself in a world inspired by Norse mythology. There are 6 playable character races: Human, Elf, and Dwarf belonging to the Alliance, and Orc, Dark Elf, and Blood Drak belonging to the Fury. In addition to selecting a race, you can choose from 5 different classes, which represent a unique style of the particular player.

The classes are: Confessors, Fighter, Mage, Rogues, and Templar. We plan to add a Ranger class next year, but your help can make it possible much faster. The game world is already huge, but it will grow even bigger with each content update -meaning  more quests, more zones, more dungeons, more mounts and more kick-ass gear sets.

And, have I mentioned that while the whole leveling game play is fun, and includes hundreds of quests in open world, solo dungeons and 5-man dungeon leveling system, the game really focuses on end of the game experience? It’s true! Therefore reaching the level cap is just the beginning of the real core game experience, which includes a very unique end-game 5-man dungeons, 10-man raids, battlegrounds, and rated arenas.

Click here to check development videos on our youtube channel

Why do we ask for help?

All players are asking us to add even more fun to the game with Costumes and Hats but we don't have funds to do that. This is where you can help to make it happen.

story:
Hey Indiegogo!  My name is John Caballero, I work as a full time tutor, private consultant, and all of my time otherwise goes into my company and this project.  Welcome!  To the Apocalypse Survival Guide Project!

This project started almost two years ago during the night of Hurricane Sandy.  I laid in bed frustrated because I had no power, no food, and no way to reach any of my loved ones.  I was in a position where I couldn’t help myself, or other people.  The only thing I could really do was use my phone.  That realization is what gave me the idea for the project.  I immediately designed and started creating an app to help people plan for and get through disasters.  At the time a lot of people were freaking out about the Mayan prophecies and 2012.  So… I decided to use that to help get more attention.  Once I did that I quickly added Zombies simply for the entertainment value.  I knew a big issue I had from the start is that people don’t like to plan for disasters.  They like to say “oh it’ll never happen to me”.  Or worse yet, they just plead ignorance because they would rather not think about it.  I figured I could use something entertaining like zombies to get people interested while still giving them the tools to make a real plan and actually be prepared.  Kind of like tricking people into helping themselves.  That’s been the main thought process behind everything we’ve done.  Let me take your through the steps.

Step 1:  The ASG App

So here’s where the whole process starts, the Apocalypse Survival Guide app.  Currently we only have it out for iOS (hopefully you can help with that), and after almost 2 years of work it finally has full functionality.  We’ve divided all disasters you can plan for by using eight different apocalypses.  We know that the word apocalypse can come off as very fictional and silly, but this app is filled with nothing but facts.  I spent over a month on each apocalypse creating the most factual, concise, what you should know description for each one.  Each apocalypse also has tips of what you should do before, during and after disaster strikes.  Along with all this useful information is a GPS that helps you find resources based on different categories specific for the apocalypse you’re looking at.  You can save these locations and they get stored into the app.  If you lose internet for some strange reason, not to worry!  All of these addresses can be seen offline so you can still use them.  Remember, the idea for the app started the night of Hurricane Sandy, so it’s meant to be as applicable as possible.  Along with the GPS there are different kits you can fill out, the ability to add friends, see their plans, and of course make your own plans.  The purpose of the app is so that you can make a plan for yourself in case of any disaster.  Even if you plan with other people, family, friends, whoever, you never know what’s actually going to happen, and heaven forbid you’re all alone, this plan is for you.  Don’t worry though, if you choose to leave your plans public, or visible to your friends, you can all see each other’s plans.  Even if you all lose internet and can’t communicate with each other, you can still see everyone’s plan and find out what they are planning to do.

Step 2:  The Facebook App

I forgot to mention one thing about the app.  Each Apocalypse has a unique analyzer that gives you your chance of surviving alone.  It asks questions about where you’re from, what you know, what you can do, and what you’re willing to do.  It’s actually really fun to do.  After the analyzer tells you your chances, your score is uploaded to the Facebook app.  This took a lot of time and work also, but this part of the process is meant to be a bridge between the ASG app and the ASG website.  With the Facebook App you can see your scores, as well as the scores of all your friends.  You can all compare, brag, make fun, and overall just see where everyone stands.  You can also see everyone’s plans, group plans, and how prepared they are.  The app will suggest people from your friends list that you should make a plan with, based on their scores and how prepared they are.  The Facebook app is all about getting people into the mind set of planning together. 

Step 3:  The ASG Website

Finally, we come to the heart of the project.  The website is filled with all kinds of really cool, helpful, fun and applicable things.  You should definitely check it out when you get the chance!  By far the most important thing in the website is the group plans.  Like I mentioned before, one of the biggest obstacles for this project is the fact that people don’t like to plan for disasters.  We designed and created a way for people to sit down, and without any forethought can just make an entire plan from start to end.  Without any prior planning any person can create a plan for as many people as they want (friends, class, family, etc) that has rendezvous points, policies, supplies, and can assign everyone a role.  Roles are a revolutionary idea we had that we feel is really going to help people get into this.  What would you be?  A hunter?  A scavenger?  A scout, cook, ambassador, farmer, zoo keeper, etc.  The roles help people define where you fit, and it makes sure that everyone can contribute to the group with the best of their abilities. 

What’s Going On Now

We’ve spent the better of two years working on these different steps to make the whole process as easy to use as possible.  It’s been a lot of work but it’s definitely worth it.  I already had someone message me because after a small disaster, she was able to use the app to get gas and help her out.  That in itself already makes this entire project worth it.  We have a huge marketing plan but before we could move forward with that we wanted to make sure the pieces were all done and the functionality part of the project was complete.  The marketing plan was hard to come up with.  When you have a product or service you’re supposed to choose a main demographic and target them.  Our biggest issue was that this project can and is meant to help everyone.  Therefore after a lot of thought we had to stick with everyone as our demographic.  Because of that we decided to create a web series with every demographic, designed to help us reach as many demographics as possible.  We’ve been to a few conventions but that was mostly to collect data and find out how to make things more user friendly.  Right now we’re planning to go to NYCC 2014 with the main focus of showing off the completed project and to get help with the web series.  We need help to get to that point.

What’s Next and How You Can Help

Hopefully you have a full grasp of how we got here, why we got here, and what we’re trying to do.  We have a lot of social medias, (that you should all check out!) as well as contests, blogs, newspapers, etc.  I’ve been funding this all myself up to this point, the app, facebook, website, conventions, marketing.. all of it.  I’ve been working three jobs just to make this happen.  I can’t tell you how happy I am to finally be at this stage and be able to tell you all this.  Unfortunately this is where I could use some serious help.  First of all, I need to make sure all of the functionality of the project is complete: the app, website, fb app, and everything else connected to this project.  That is first and foremost.  If you guys help enough I’ll be able to start the Android version of this app and hopefully get it done before NYCC 2014.  Secondly is NYCC itself.  I was there last year with a few people and we got very positive reviews.  I was not there to make a buck however and it ended up hurting my wallet quite a bit.  Took me like two months to recover from that.  This year we have double the space, more equipment and we plan on doing a lot more.  Last year we had amazing makeup artists paint people up into really gruesome zombies.  Some of those people were chained up and helped us terrorize passersby.  This year the makeup artists are coming back and we not only plan on stepping up the makeup, but we will also be locking our newly made zombies into cages for everyone to see.  It’s going to be a lot of fun.  We will also have a couple of the web series actors in full apocalyptic costume as well as a couple other surprises.  The more funding we can get for this the better.  The booth is expensive enough, as well as the supplies needed. Any additional funding will go into all of the marketing material that we need to bring.  Finally, we have the web series.  This indiegogo campaign is more about the project and how important it is.  We will be creating another crowdfunding campaign during October to show people during the convention.  The web series has a professional composer helping us with the soundtrack, amazing make up, very talented costume designers and a crazy good script.  We’re really pulling out all the stops for this since we need it to get as much attention as possible (to get as much attention as possible to the project).  That said, we are filming some background stuff to show during NYCC before we get the funding needed to shoot the rest of the web series.  Any extra funds we get from you guys will go to helping the success of this campaign and helping us film, create, and shoot whatever we need for it (including the very expensive trailer we need to make). 


Directly where the funding will go:

1.  Finishing the functionality of the project ($15,000):  Finishing the iOS app, the ASG website, the FB app, Group Plans, and anything else needed for the whole process to work.  

2.  NYCC 2014 ($15,000):  Paying for the booth, make up, cage, props, renting a huge monitor, flyers, booklets, t-shirts, etc.

3. Trailer ($10,000):  Even though this is 3rd, this is a big one.  We are making a trailer for the ASG Web Series (main marketing tool) that has to be done by NYCC.  We have original costumes, a lot of actors, a lot of props, an original music score, and a bunch of other stuff going into this series.  The more funding we get for the trailer, the better we'll look at NYCC, and the more support we can get for the web series.  

Extra funding will be dedicated to:

1.  Android ($10,000):  Making the Android version of the app and integrating it with the rest of the project.

2.  Marketing ($5,000):  Getting enough marketing material for NYCC 2014 (We always run out of supplies with the amount of volume we consistently get).

3.  Filming ($$$$):  A film budget can be endless, the more money you have, the better props, make up, clothing, cameras, etc.  If everything else has been dealt with and we get extra revenue.  Meaning that functionality and NYCC have been paid and decked out to their full extreme (which would be crazy awesome), then that extra revenue will go into making the trailer and webseries as amazing as possible.




The End?

That was a lot.  But, we wanted to make sure you guys knew where we were and where we were coming from.  Any help we can get would be greatly appreciated.  One last thing I forgot to mention.  It’s about the website and the group plans.  We are making something called the Apocalypse Survival Notebooks.  Basically, we take your group plans and make a book out of them.  The book will have whatever cover you want, an index, group plans, individual plans, everyone’s emergency contact info, pictures and addresses you’ve saved, and critical information about the roles you have selected to be in your plans.  Overall, it’s the ultimate disaster plan, catered specifically for you. They’ve been really hard to manufacture since they are made individually, but they are the end of a long, productive process.  We’re hoping they catch on and people get them, not just for the entertainment value, but also because of how cool and helpful they can really be.  We are including them in the rewards and will be using you guys to help us make sure they work and can be made like we want them too.  If at any point any of you guys have any questions, comments, thoughts, or whatever else about the project, feel free to hit us up.  All of our social medias are below.  We really appreciate it.  Have a good day!

What’s Going On Now
We’ve spent the better of two years working on these
different steps to make the whole process as easy to use as possible.  It’s been a lot of work but it’s definitely
worth it.  I already had someone message
me because after a small disaster, she was able to use the app to get gas and
help her out.  That in itself already
makes this entire project worth it.  We
have a huge marketing plan but before we could move forward with that we wanted
to make sure the pieces were all done and the functionality part of the project
was complete.  The marketing plan was
hard to come up with.  When you have a
product or service you’re supposed to choose a main demographic and target
them.  Our biggest issue was that this
project can and is meant to help everyone. 
Therefore after a lot of thought we had to stick with everyone as our
demographic.  Because of that we decided
to create a web series with every demographic, designed to help us reach as
many demographics as possible.  We’ve
been to a few conventions but that was mostly to collect data and find out how
to make things more user friendly.  Right
now we’re planning to go to NYCC 2014 with the main focus of showing off the completed
project and to get help with the web series. 
We need help to get to that point.
What’s Next and How You Can Help
Hopefully you have a full grasp of how we got here, why we
got here, and what we’re trying to do. 
We have a lot of social medias, (that you should all check out!) as well
as contests, blogs, newspapers, etc. 
I’ve been funding this all myself up to this point, the app, facebook,
website, conventions, marketing.. all of it. 
I’ve been working three jobs just to make this happen.  I can’t tell you how happy I am to finally be
at this stage and be able to tell you all this. 
Unfortunately this is where I could use some serious help.  First of all, I need to make sure all of the
functionality of the project is complete: the app, website, fb app, and
everything else connected to this project. 
That is first and foremost.  If
you guys help enough I’ll be able to start the Android version of this app and
hopefully get it done before NYCC 2014. 
Secondly is NYCC itself.  I was
there last year with a few people and we got very positive reviews.  I was not there to make a buck however and it
ended up hurting my wallet quite a bit. 
Took me like two months to recover from that.  This year we have double the space, more
equipment and we plan on doing a lot more. 
Last year we had amazing makeup artists paint people up into really
gruesome zombies.  Some of those people
were chained up and helped us terrorize passersby.  This year the makeup artists are coming back
and we not only plan on stepping up the makeup, but we will also be locking our
newly made zombies into cages for everyone to see.  It’s going to be a lot of fun.  We will also have a couple of the web series
actors in full apocalyptic costume as well as a couple other surprises.  The more funding we can get for this the
better.  The booth is expensive enough,
as well as the supplies needed. Any additional funding will go into all of the marketing
material that we need to bring.  Finally,
we have the web series.  This indiegogo
campaign is more about the project and how important it is.  We will be creating another crowdfunding
campaign during October to show people during the convention.  The web series has a professional composer
helping us with the soundtrack, amazing make up, very talented costume designers
and a crazy good script.  We’re really
pulling out all the stops for this since we need it to get as much attention as
possible (to get as much attention as possible to the project).  That said, we are filming some background
stuff to show during NYCC before we get the funding needed to shoot the rest of
the web series.  Any extra funds we get
from you guys will go to helping the success of this campaign and helping us
film, create, and shoot whatever we need for it (including the very expensive
trailer we need to make).  Directly where the funding will go:1.  Finishing the functionality of the project ($15,000):  Finishing the iOS app, the ASG website, the FB app, Group Plans, and anything else needed for the whole process to work.  2.  NYCC 2014 ($15,000):  Paying for the booth, make up, cage, props, renting a huge monitor, flyers, booklets, t-shirts, etc.3. Trailer ($10,000):  Even though this is 3rd, this is a big one.  We are making a trailer for the ASG Web Series (main marketing tool) that has to be done by NYCC.  We have original costumes, a lot of actors, a lot of props, an original music score, and a bunch of other stuff going into this series.  The more funding we get for the trailer, the better we'll look at NYCC, and the more support we can get for the web series.  Extra funding will be dedicated to:1.  Android ($10,000):  Making the Android version of the app and integrating it with the rest of the project.2.  Marketing ($5,000):  Getting enough marketing material for NYCC 2014 (We always run out of supplies with the amount of volume we consistently get).3.  Filming ($$$$):  A film budget can be endless, the more money you have, the better props, make up, clothing, cameras, etc.  If everything else has been dealt with and we get extra revenue.  Meaning that functionality and NYCC have been paid and decked out to their full extreme (which would be crazy awesome), then that extra revenue will go into making the trailer and webseries as amazing as possible.
The End?
That was a lot.  But,
we wanted to make sure you guys knew where we were and where we were coming
from.  Any help we can get would be
greatly appreciated.  One last thing I
forgot to mention.  It’s about the
website and the group plans.  We are
making something called the Apocalypse Survival Notebooks.  Basically, we take your group plans and make
a book out of them.  The book will have
whatever cover you want, an index, group plans, individual plans, everyone’s
emergency contact info, pictures and addresses you’ve saved, and critical
information about the roles you have selected to be in your plans.  Overall, it’s the ultimate disaster plan,
catered specifically for you. They’ve been really hard to manufacture since
they are made individually, but they are the end of a long, productive
process.  We’re hoping they catch on and
people get them, not just for the entertainment value, but also because of how
cool and helpful they can really be.  We
are including them in the rewards and will be using you guys to help us make
sure they work and can be made like we want them too.  If at any point any of you guys have any
questions, comments, thoughts, or whatever else about the project, feel free to
hit us up.  All of our social medias are
below.  We really appreciate it.  Have a good day!

story:
RUNNING WINGS

We had the idea to develop a Jump 'n' Run App with a chicken!
This is our first mobile app. Usually we manage a Minecraft Server :)




The goal of the app is to run as long as you can.
There are enemys and obstacles you have to jump over.
It's a very simple, but hopefully funny and addicting app.

We integrate some:

  • Funny collectables 
  • Maybe a perk-system 
  • User Statistics 
  • Highscores

Controls

  • 1 tap on the screen -> Jump
  • Double-tap -> Jump higher
  • Stay on the screen in the air -> Glide down



Font

I created this custom font for the App.
Maybe i make some variations (thin/normal/bold/some italic)

(I'll paste a download link for the Font and .svg)


What we need & What you get!

We need the Money for:

  • The developer fee's
  • The hosting fee's, so we can make the app totally ad free! i hate ad's in games =)
  • The webspace for the website
  • The Domain
  • Some coffee
  • And some other things...

What you'll get:

  • for 10€ you get a in-game shop item
  • for 25€ you get all the in-game shop items!
  • for 40€ you get the items and a poster (preview coming soon)
  • for 50€ you get the items and a t-shirt (preview coming soon)
  • for 100€ you get the items and a canvas (preview coming soon)
  • for 150€ you get the items + poster + t-shirt
  • from there on you get the same and your name will be seen in the app (only if you want)
  • all funders get noted on the website

with your support we can release our first App for Android and iOS!


Perks:

Sticker:


Magnetic label:


Poster:


Basic T-Shirt:


--> T-Shirt Colors: 


Canvas:


Limited Edition Poster:


Limited Edition T-Shirt:


Limited Edition Canvas:




Other ways to help

You can help us tell the world of our app :)




Made by the TUMS-MC Team

-> TUMS Website
(German)

story: I will use this money to get the equipment I need to make videos and to entertain people that want to watch something funny on YouTube, or if they just want some inspiration on what they would want to build in Minecraft.  I really like playing Minecraft and I want to be able to teach others to play or build, and to inspire on what you can do. I really enjoy Minecraft because it allows me to be creative in a way that is fun, and stay connected with my friends and family!

story:
Law Enforcement Role Play's YouTube Channel

My name is Cory, better known in-game as cdavbar and I am the owner and lead administrator of Law Enforcement Role Play.  Law Enforcement Role Play is a gaming community focused around our namesake, role-playing as law enforcement.  We strive to keep things realistic yet enjoyable for all of our members.  Our members range from members that are also real-life law enforcement/emergency service, to members that are going in that direction, to members that simply enjoy role-playing games as law enforcement/emergency services.

We have always wanted to be able to produce videos of our role-play sessions, however currently the only videos we are able to create are photo compilations.  There is a large demand for law enforcement/police style role-play videos on YouTube which we feel our proposed videos would help to fill.


What We Need to Accomplish Our Goals

At least one, preferably 2 elgato Game Capture HD's

The elgato Game Capture HD's cost $179.95 + tax each.  Based upon multiple reviews it is considered one of the best capture devices for console gaming.
The first elgato Game Capture HD would be kept and used by myself to record our role-plays.  If our campaign raises enough to get a second elgato Game Capture HD it would be shared among other memebers to be able to have recordings from multiple points of view.  
Although not essential, we hope to also raise enough for a 1TB external hard drive from Western Digital.  This would allow more recordings to be stored than can be stored on my computer.  A 1TB external HD from Western Digital like the one pictured below costs $79.99 + tax.



The Impact This Campaign Will Have For Us

This campaign, if successful would allow us to show to the world through our YouTube channel the gaming style we enjoy and is growing in popularity.  In addition, more and more law enforcement agencies look to use role-play scenarios during the interview and hiring process.   Although we cannot replicate real-world situations exactly as they would in real-life, we do strive to keep things as realistic as possible.  The level of realism we strive for would also help to develop decision making skills for viewers who are looking into the field of law enforcement.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Use the share buttons to spread the word to others who may be interested in contributing!

Thank you for your time!

story: Well, my friend Dakota was a gamer, always was, and it's one of the many ways i'll remember him. On April 23rd 2011 he passed away due to complications with Neuroblastoma, a type of cancer. So i'm playing games today in his memory, and raising money for CHaD, The Childrens Hospital at Dartmouth. At the same time! Win win, all money donated here will go straight to them!! Please help us support a great cause and watch me play some games!! Check it out!

At the same time! Win win, all money donated here will go straight to them!! Please help us support a great cause and watch me play some games!! Check it out!

story:
There's a War in the Shadows...

The world of Contagion is a dark and terrifying place. On the surface it is no different than the world you and I live in. Most people go on about their lives never realizing the terrors that walk among them.
Despite humanity’s vast ignorance, the horrors are there. Angels and demons make war in the shadows. Hellspawn serve their demonic masters. Clergy and Slayers rise from the human flock to protect their brethren and work God's will.

There's a war in the shadows. Choose a side.

Contagion is a modern horror/ urban fantasy game that I began publishing back in 2004. Using the Open Game License system, my partners and I created a world of wonder and horror in which players could make fantastic characters and tell unique stories of dark adventure.

Though I had been enjoying the hobby of tabletop gaming for over a decade at the time, I had not had any game design experience when I began work on Contagion. I chose the OGL system to work with, in part due to its massive popularity, but also because it was a tested and developed system that would not require an immense overhaoul on my part. I, along with my partners Darius McCaskkey and Toy Cesar, did make some changes in order to make the system fit the vision we had for the Contagion setting, but we left the core rules of the OGL system largely intact.

Now, nearly a decade later, I feel it is time to revisit the core rules of the Contagion roleplaying game and create a new, better edition. Over the last ten years, I've refined my craft in the field of game design, having put together thousands of pages worth of supplemental material for Contagion as well as creating additional game worlds for other products. When I created Contagion I crafted a world and made it conform to a game system. With Contagion Second Edition I intend to rebuild the game system to better reflect the world of Contagion.

Contagion Second Edition will:

  • Revisit and refine playable races to ensure game balance while preserving the unique modern horror and urban fantasy elements of Contagion.
  • Reconstruct the concepts of character class and occupation to streamline character advancement and place more control of character development in the player's hands.
  • Improve and expand upon the magic system.
  • Incorporate old and new supplemental material in additon to the core system all under one cover.

What We Need & What You Get

The finished Contagion Second Edition book will be a massive undertaking. I anticipate the book to be somewhere in the 400-600 page range when it is completed. System development, layout and proofreading for a tome of this size will be a time-consuming process. I will also need to compile art and generate new fiction to accompany the rules updates. In light of all of those things I have set a basic fundraising goal of $500 which will pay for the proofreading, typesetting and development time as well as getting some new art and covering the cost of a printed proof. But the $500 goal is only the beginning. I have a ton of additional ideas I'd like to see happen with Contagion Second Edition. To reflect this I am announcing some additional benchmark goals in the hopes that you can help me push the world of Contagion to new heights in 2013!

Our goals are:

  • $500 - Basic Goal: I will generate the Contagion Second Edition corebook with updated setting and system information. The book will be available in .pdf, softcover and hardcover black and white print editions. Helping us reach this goal will give you access to these new books as well as some of our classic Contagion products. All .pdfs and print products will be provided through DriveThruRPG.
  • $1000 - Tier 1 Advanced Goal: Rather than Black and White versions of Contagion Second Edition, all print copies will be in full color.
  • $1250 - Tier 2 Advanced Goal: in addition to the Contagion Second Edition corebook, we will produce a 22-page .pdf file of an issue of the Global News Inquisitor, the supermarket tabloid that offers a glimpse behind the scenes in the world of Contagion. This .pdf will be distributed to all contributors at the $5 level or higher in addition to their other perks. This .pdf will be completed by July of 2013.
  • $1500 - Tier 3 Advanced Goal: Plastic Age Productions will produce a short film (of a running time of 5-10 minutes) set in the world of Contagion which will be distributed digitally for free, exlusively to backers at the $30 level or above. The film will be completed by August of 2013.
  • $2000 - Tier 4 Advanced Goal: If we reach this level of funding, we will distribute the short film digitally, for free to all backers at the $5 level or above.
  • $2500 - Tier 5 Advanced Goal: If we reach this level of funding, we will generate a new short fiction anthology set in the world of Contagion, which will be provided free in .pdf format to all backers at a level of $5 or more. This will be delivered by December 2013. We will also open up the short film to all backers.

The Impact

Ten years ago my partners and I took the leap into game development and self-publishing. We all made huge sacrifices of time to try and build a new world we could share with an audience , a world where people could tell stories with their friends and have a great time. Now, ten years later, I intend to refine the ideas set forth in the original Contagion books and take the experience for the player to the next level. Your contribution and support can help make that happen!

Over the past decade Contagion has received critical acclaim, been certified as a Copper Best Seller at DriveThruRPG.com and spawned over twenty supplemental products. I believe with the ideas I have for Contagion Second Edition this will prove to be only the beginning.

You can learn more about Contagion by visiting rpg.drivethrustuff.com/product/11944/Contagion

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that times are rough and you may not be in a position to help financially. We also get that modern horror or urban fantasy gaming just might not be your thing. However, it may very well be someone you know's thing, and sharing a link is free, so there are still several ways that you could lend us a hand:

The biggest obstacle for independent productions of any kind is simply getting the word out. Without access to advertising dollars, our reach is limited to word-of -mouth. With social media YOU can be of immense help by simply sharing the link to this project and telling your friends about it. Ask them to do the same!

Please use the Indiegogo share tools, post links on your Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus and all of your social media sites.
 
Visit the Contagion RPG Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/ContagionRpg Like it and tell your friends to do the same.

Thank you so much for your help and support!

NOTE: All international (Outside the U.S.) backers PLEASE include an additional $10 to your contribution for print products to offset shipping costs.

story:
With your help, our dream becomes a reality ! 

Now on Apple Store : https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/duckyop/id657220512?mt=8

On the Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wenetech.wenetech.duckyopbubbles&hl=en


Your Mission:

Fight your enemy, Soap Bubbles !!
Skip drowning and get your missions done.
Collect enough OPs to obtain a permanent additional life point!
Choose your weapon and find our hero's NAME.

Heads up: someone is trying to make your mission impossible !!


Story Of The Game:

No mercy for the bubbles! Torn apart from his family long before he hatched, our webbed hero, -an amnesiac duckling- finds himself in a bathroom. Your mission -should you accept it- is to help him escape from this cursed bathtub by blowing up the bubbles coming from everywhere. Are you a super genius villain? Or maybe just an average Joe?

Good news though, you will help our hero find his name ... But don’t waste too much time or you might end up swamped under water.
Dark Cucker won’t let you tuck your feathers too easily! Beware of his wrath! He's fluffy, he's fearless, he's coming...


 

Who Are We?

We are a group of creative individuals from different fields (management, computer engineering, marketing, international business, NGOs). Our after-work time is devoted to voluntary multicultural work and human causes.  

Our Company, WeneTech, and its team started 3 years ago in website development and informatics. One year ago, we decided to take on mobile game development.  Now it is time to bring our first game to life. We have faith in our project, and with your help, it will become true!

 

Why Us?

When we started this project it was just a dream. We wanted to invent an animated world that is both beautiful and entertaining. So we created a humoristic yellow hero in a very colorful comic environment with radiating visuals.   Then we set off to elaborate a whole gallery of characters and places around the young duckling adventurer- A world for him to blaze through that could have him evolve and turn into the hero he is meant to be.  

We are close to publish DuckOp for mobiles, our very first result of this thrilling world.   Our team believes in this project and is devoted to it, and half of our team helps us as volunteers.

Part of the team (developers and graphic designers) are Syrians, living in Syria or around the world. We are all trying our best to accomplish this project because it gives us hope for a better tomorrow, and it helps our families staying in Syria throughout the current difficult situation.

Up to 22% of your pledge will go to Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) mentioned below to help Syrian civil people and children.

With your help, we hope to develop a platform of games, to thrive and to give proper wages to our talented team. You can make it happen.   Your contribution will affect lives, and will spread hope around the world.

Launch date:

This game will be launched in June 2013

 

What We Can Do With Your Help:

If we reach 8 000 €: DuckyOp game will be made available on the Apple Store and Google Play :)
If we reach 10 000 €: You can challenge your friends (we will add network options).
 

Where Your Funds Go:

Up to 22%: Donation for Non-Governmental Organizations (NGOs) mentioned below, that help Syrian civil people and children.

Our team as for their part, will offer 22% from their working time as volontery work to cover the amount of donation.


30 % The remaining design work.
40%: Coding the game.
10 % Performance Optimization (research and development).
10 % Mobile adaptation.
7% Crowdfunding fees only if we reach the goal !!! Help Us !!!.
3% Creating and Shipping Physical Rewards

   Help us help others

What We Have Accomplished So Far:

- A 3 minutes trailer.
- Most of the graphic and characters design.
- The main algorithm of the game.
 

Our Thanks:

A big thanks to all our supporters and fans. Your help is the main reason we made it this far in the first place, and it is still as important today as we get closer to complete this project.


Other Ways To Support Us:

We are very close to the finish line, but we still need your help for one last push towards the actual game release: The first game of the DuckyOp series.

Like us on facebook:  www.facebook.com/DuckyOp

Follow us on twitter: www.twitter.com/DuckyOp

Visit our site : www.duckyop.com

Like our trailer: www.youtube.com/watch?v=_0424JsJgKs

Spread the word amongst your friends.
Write about us in forums, or maybe newspapers.

# Civil Syrian Organizations:

Up to 22% of the collected funds will go to support the Syrian civil people via these two civil NGOs:

- http://coupdepouce.info/Syria/Home.html

- http://www.afses.fr/

- http://www.syriefrance.com/

 

Contact Us:

Don't hesitate to contact us:
info@duckyop.com

We'll be more than happy to answer all your questions.
story_txt:
With your help, our dream becomes a reality ! Now on Apple Store : https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/duckyop/id657220512?mt=8On the Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wenetech.wenetech.duckyopbubbles&hl=en
Your Mission:
Fight your enemy, Soap Bubbles !!Skip drowning and get your missions done.Collect enough OPs to obtain a permanent additional life point!Choose your weapon and find our hero's NAME.
Heads up: someone is trying to make your mission impossible !!



Story Of The Game:
No mercy for the bubbles! Torn apart from his family long before he hatched, our webbed hero, -an amnesiac duckling- finds himself in a bathroom. Your mission -should you accept it- is to help him escape from this cursed bathtub by blowing up the bubbles coming from everywhere. Are you a super genius villain? Or maybe just an average Joe?
Good news though, you will help our hero find his name ... But don’t waste too much time or you might end up swamped under water.Dark Cucker won’t let you tuck your feathers too easily! Beware of his wrath! He's fluffy, he's fearless, he's coming...

story:
Hey everybody,

It's been a long road since 2014 when Pixel Panzers first began. We had to stop development for a while as I ran out of (self funded) money to continue development of the game. The Indiegogo campaign wasn't advertised well enough and I didn't understand how to market the game 4 years ago. But now I've things are different, I've started up development for the last few months on the art and design of the game so check out our new page description and our new social media links in the sidebar.

I will be posting all our news and updates to twitter (twitter/pixelpanzers) & instagram (panczarone) so follow our links there to see whats going on. Also the design of the game has been upgraded to a turn based action strategy game.

story:
The Chimney Luck

is a classic 2D Jump and Run Platformer in nice retro style, with the particularity that two characters play the levels at different times of the year. As a result, different level structures arise.
Yet both characters have different abilities, with which both can enter their own specific areas.
While the first character brings the luck to the residents by the cleaning of chimneys, the second character brings it in form of gifts.

Although it is possible to finish the game with only one character, but if you want to explore the whole world you have to use the characteristics of both characters.


  


The chimney sweep can reach higher places with his ladder, and with his cleaning tool he can clear out clogged chimneys and more. This makes it possible for him or the second character to enter hidden areas or even otherwise locked houses.

SantaClaus can slip with magic through narrow tubes, can run light as a feather on the clouds and fly with his Christmas sleigh above the cities. Through this combination there is a lot to explore in the big cities. This allows to play the levels several times and finding secret places.
These various cities can be reached via a world map, which one uncover more and more.


  



About me

 I am since 1994 in the games industry and worked at games like “Albion”, “The Settlers”, “Knights And Merchants”, as well as some jump and run platformers as “SantaClaus in Trouble” and “RossoRabbit”.
Career Website: http://www.chimneyluck.eu/career.htm
But classic jump and runs are no longer in demand by the publishers, either there are huge graphical bombs or simple casual games.
Therefore, I decide myself to venture to one.
I hope you will allow me to achieve this with your help.



FAQ

- What platforms the project should appear ?
It will be released for Windows, Mac and Linux.
If there is enough interest, it would be converted for mobile platforms.

- How will the funding be spent?
For the production of new graphics worlds, as well another enemy characters, and the purchase of music and sounds.
For the design and testing of approx 30 large main levels, which is entered through a world map, and other unlockable flight levels and bonus levels.
Buying software and hardware for development and testing.



Stretch Goals

from a donation amounting € 22.000, would two new playable characters be created. These can be unlocked throughout the game.

from € 24.000 a character-changes mode be possible, to switch between the seasons without having to complete the level.

at € 30.000, a two-player co-op mode would be built. For this, a Network engine must be programmed, and the level designs adapted to it, so that both players can support each other.

at € 32.000 more unlockable bonus levels of a new type would be add, These can be reached through the world map.

€ 40.000 would be required to publish the game on other platforms. The code must be implemented in a new engine. There is also hardware and software licenses needed to publish the game on iOS, Android and Ouya.




Your name as a funder in the credits.

Get the limited offer of the game for the platform of your choice.
Only 300 available.
 

Get the game for the platform of your choice and your name in the credits.


You will receive the game for the platform of your choice and extensions that will come out in the future.


You will receive the game and extensions that will come out in the future for you and a friend.


Everything above, plus:
A digital download of the original game soundtrack.


Everything above, plus:
Try the game before anybody else! and give us feedback on it.


Everything above, plus:
Get a very early version and access to a private developer forum, and take influence on the development of the game.
Submit your feedback of new levels, enemies and game mechanics as we begin to experiment with them.


Everything above, plus:
Will get a very early version for you and a friend, and take influence on the development of the game.


Everything above, plus:
Find yourself in the game, be a resident of the cities, a Pixel Character of you with your name. Furthermore this will be one of the accessible in-game Achievements.
And You will receive also a Special Thanks in a special credits section.


Everything above plus:
Your face in the game, as a decorated mural in the game as well as in the credits. You will receive (other than all the above) a special executive producer credit for helping so much in the making of this game.

The portrait is also a to-find in-game Achievement.


Everything above, plus:
Create the overall look and behavior of a Enemy. You describe it and we’ll draw it up, animate it, and code it based on your idea!
Included in the credits as "Enemy Designer"





Official Website: http://www.chimneyluck.eu/
Career Website: http://www.chimneyluck.eu/career.htm
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Chimney-Luck/1401626793426580
Twitter: https://twitter.com/adamsprys

Contact email:
Adam Sprys (creator): chimneyluck@gmail.com

story:
Hi My name is Jerry Butler,

I've recently been asked "when are you going to promote your inventions?" So I got to thinking to myself, self what are you waiting on? Get moving Now! So I decided to reach out to this wonderful universe seeking for  help in making my dreams become a reality. 

Back in 2004 I came up with this concept of a board game that would have peopled on the edge of their chair. It's fun and exciting to play. The name of the game is "THE PIT".  As I watched my family and friends play "The Pit", we saw that it needed a twist. So we decide to add crazy, and fun cards to the game. After a long night of creating cards, designs, layouts, etc... we notice that All families should have this game. However I never moved forward with the project.

At the beginning of 2013, I put together a Vision Board with all the things I wanted to accomplish this year and guess what's on the board. That's right "The Pit". You see this game is not only for me, it will bring families back together from all over the globe for one more night of fun. There is nothing like sitting down with your family playing a good old board game.

Think of the magnitude your contributions who mean and helping me  achieve this goal. Not only me but, the jobs created in making the game board come to life.

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to raise $850 or more to get  this game into production. I spoke with a graphic design company that's willing to help do the layout of this game. Good News: The company is here locate and has a track record of producing good quality content! That's a plus for us. I can be there any given time to make proper adjustments if needed as I watch "The Pit" come to life. The design company also mention they could help me find a company to produce the symbols for the game. Are you excited? YES, I am!

Once you have made a small donation, please let me know so I can personally thank you. Your voice will be heard all over the Net.

The Impact

Not only will this board game create a fun family atmosphere but, it will teach the younger children's how to budget their money. Just imagine how many families would play this game if they had the one. What if you had a chance to seek contributions would you? How many times have you donated or just gave to charities or even a homeless person on the street? How did it make you feel? This is ground breaking so be the first to become part of it. After working the same job for over 20+ years, you think I would know when it's time to make a change.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please spread the word to your friends and family. You never know who's willing to give, and they may be in need. However, if you know you have that extra $1,$5,$10 or more laying around just Give. It's better to give then receive. It will return to you. So give from the heart and be blessed.

You can use this same system (Indiegogo) to run a similar campaign for any need.

Thanks in advance,

Jerry Butler

story:
Intro:

Do you love WordPress? Do you have a MailChimp newsletter? Then read on! AutoChimp (http://www.wandererllc.com/company/plugins/auto...) is a FREE (of course!) plugin for WordPress (http://www.wordpress.org) that lets administrators of WordPress sites to automatically add, remove, and update users to your MailChimp mailing list as users subscribe and unsubscribe to your site. Adminstrators can also create campaigns automatically from blog posts.

AutoChimp 2.0 is the next major release and will include several new features and improvements. It's a big undertaking which requires help from the community. If you're a user of AutoChimp, we'd love to have your support! Please read about the pledges (and pledge rewards!) listed below.

What's Coming:

Support third-party plugins:

CIMY User Extra Fields

Creating MailChimp Campaigns:

Support multiple blog post categories.
Support multiple mailing lists and interest groups.

Synchronizing your WordPress site with MailChimp:

Redesign the UI to be more responsive.
Update sync feature to report progress.

Misc:

Add an option for the “More” feature when creating a MailChimp campaign from AutoChimp.
Honor the WordPress publish schedule when creating campaigns.
Support embedding Youtube videos.

Why AutoChimp Needs You:

AutoChimp is currently the most popular MailChimp plugin of it's kind. AutoChimp has a duty to it's fans to remain current, useful, and reliable. In terms of funds needed, AutoChimp remains a plugin with modest needs, but funds go a long way in keeping developers focused! We've all got really busy schedules.

We also want to help spread the donations to the community at large. Though some are willing to sponsor (and have sponsored) individual features, it's more fair, and likely more effective, to raise resources through a public forum like IndieGogo. If AutoChimp fails to raise funds, well, then we'll think of something else! If AutoChimp fundraising exceeds expectations, then there's a large list of features and improvements to deliver to the community.

story:
Hi! We are a Colombian company focused in the interactive creation, we develop software for mobiles and right now we are in to game development. 

Fuchiball is a project that we started six months ago, when we were still students, and it has been really challenging since we don't have all the equipment that we need to fully acomplish the goal, we only have one device to emulate and test the game; but that have been enough to put the game in the Android market. 

                                              

                                                             Check it!


It has been in the market the last three weeks and we have receive a really good qualification and we are climbing the TOPs categories; but we need your help; 

We want to publish the game in the Apple market too.

With your collaboration we will be able to afford all the costs that implies to develop for Apple: 

  • 1 Mac to compile the app
  • 1 apple device to do the emulations and tests
  • 1 publisher account. 

As simple as it sound, thats all we need.

Lets talk about the Game!

From the marvelous tropical beaches of the Atlantic coast Kicke has arrived!, an amazing character with great talent, willing to show his own dad his great potential with Fuchi ability.

   

The gameplay takes place on the beach, where the player must help Kicke keep your record and make the necessary tricks to beat your friends. 

During the game, the player will encounter challenges and difficulties involved in maintaining the fuchi in the air, once it touches the sand, the game is lost. 

One of the difficulties is the movement control of the fuchi, factors such as wind, hit point on the fuchi and irregularity of tissue can cause unexpected behaviors which will measure your reflexes and agility to avoid losing the game. 


During the game, will appear starfishes, which come through the fascinating sound generated by kicks in the fuchi. 

                        

Players must demonstrate their ability in handling the fuchi, and this requires making a move while the fuchi is in the air. 

Just as there are these stars, which help increase the score, there are characters that influence the score while playing; There are coconuts, octopus, fish balloons and sea urchins. 

Each has a different behavior and it alter the fuchi. 

                        

 Note: All power ups and dangers act for 5 seconds, once this time has passed, the fuchi and the environment returns to normal state. 


The fuchi is controlled by taps on the screen, but these should be directly in the fuchi, preventing it from falling and giving it direction. Tilt the phone will also help in the direction of the fuchi. 

              


There are also tricks, these tricks are performed gestures on the screen, while the fuchi is in the air, and it must be done quickly before it falls.

Cool: You must make a "C" while the fuchi is in the air, and you get 3 points. 

Fresh: You must make a letter "O" as the fuchi is in the air, and you'll get 5 points. 

Zager: You must make a letter "Z" as the fuchi is in the air, and you get 10 points. 


Fuchiball is storing your score to establish a record and place you in the top, so you can see what position you are and how close are your friends to you, or how much you lack to become number one. 

                      

                                                              Try it! it'll be fun!


                                  Andrés Suarez: Designer, Illustrator

                                   Kevin Pérez: Developer
                                   Carlos Navas: CEO
story_txt:
Hi! We are a Colombian company focused in the interactive creation, we develop software for mobiles and right now we are in to game development. Fuchiball is a project that we started six months ago, when we were still students, and it has been really challenging since we don't have all the equipment that we need to fully acomplish the goal, we only have one device to emulate and test the game; but that have been enough to put the game in the Android market.                                                                                                            Check it!It has been in the market the last three weeks and we have receive a really good qualification and we are climbing the TOPs categories; but we need your help; We want to publish the game in the Apple market too.With your collaboration we will be able to afford all the costs that implies to develop for Apple: 
1 Mac to compile the app
1 apple device to do the emulations and tests
1 publisher account. 
As simple as it sound, thats all we need.Lets talk about the Game!From the marvelous tropical beaches of the Atlantic coast Kicke has arrived!, an amazing character with great talent, willing to show his own dad his great potential with Fuchi ability.   The gameplay takes place on the beach, where the player must help Kicke keep your record and make the necessary tricks to beat your friends. During the game, the player will encounter challenges and difficulties involved in maintaining the fuchi in the air, once it touches the sand, the game is lost. One of the difficulties is the movement control of the fuchi, factors such as wind, hit point on the fuchi and irregularity of tissue can cause unexpected behaviors which will measure your reflexes and agility to avoid losing the game. During the game, will appear starfishes, which come through the fascinating sound generated by kicks in the fuchi.                         Players must demonstrate their ability in handling the fuchi, and this requires making a move while the fuchi is in the air. Just as there are these stars, which help increase the score, there are characters that influence the score while playing; There are coconuts, octopus, fish balloons and sea urchins. Each has a different behavior and it alter the fuchi.                          Note: All power ups and dangers act for 5 seconds, once this time has passed, the fuchi and the environment returns to normal state. The fuchi is controlled by taps on the screen, but these should be directly in the fuchi, preventing it from falling and giving it direction. Tilt the phone will also help in the direction of the fuchi.               There are also tricks, these tricks are performed gestures on the screen, while the fuchi is in the air, and it must be done quickly before it falls.Cool: You must make a "C" while the fuchi is in the air, and you get 3 points. Fresh: You must make a letter "O" as the fuchi is in the air, and you'll get 5 points. Zager: You must make a letter "Z" as the fuchi is in the air, and you get 10 points. Fuchiball is storing your score to establish a record and place you in the top, so you can see what position you are and how close are your friends to you, or how much you lack to become number one.                                                                                     Try it! it'll be fun!



                                  Andrés Suarez: Designer, Illustrator
                                   Kevin Pérez: Developer                                   Carlos Navas: CEO

story:
The ETIKONS

Desmond "Etika" Amofah tragically took his own life on June 19th, 2019. The Etikons are a way to honor his legacy while putting a lasting product into the hands of his fans, and raising a ton of money for mental health and suicide prevention awareness.  

 

The Design

The design shown is what we expect the joy-con shells to look like when complete. Please keep in mind these designs are not final and subject to change. This is a hand made mock-up, not factory made, and will likely have variations from a factory produced version. We expect that the factory produced version will not have the black and white lines wrap around the sides, and instead only have them on the front, in a similar fashion to the Smash Bros joy-cons. 

***FACTORY SAMPLES BELOW, DESIGN SUBJECT TO MINOR CHANGES

We can all have an impact

While i've been making custom controllers and joy-cons for many years now, it's simply not feasible for me to take on such a large scale project on my own while donating the proceeds to charity. In order for this project to be a success, it needs to be outsourced to drastically reduce the cost (and my personal workload). 

- The joy-con shells will be manufactured in China - unless we can't find a suitable manufacturer. At this time we are still searching for the best manufacturer for the job. In the event that we are unable to find a reliable manufacturer overseas, we can complete the job right here in the USA, but this will incur additional costs and require additional time.  

 

- Options for pre-assembled joy-cons will be offered post campaign. Campaign backers will only receive joy-con shells to install on their own joy-cons with the campaign, unless they upgrade afterwards.

 

For Charity

We've chosen the JED Foundation as our charity of choice for the following reasons:

-Focus on teens and young adults

 

-Focuses on BOTH suicide prevention awareness and mental health

 

-Located in NY, where Etika was from

 

-Rated 4 stars on Charity Navigator with a 100% accountability & transparency rating 

 

Pledge Options

Joy-Con Shells: 

Every pledge in this campaign is for a single set of joy-con shells. These shells must be self installed on a pair of joy-cons that you already own. Want more than one set of shells? No problem! Once you select your pledge, you'll be able to select additional shell sets as an add-on option at checkout! Each shell set comes with a left and right joy-con shell (one black and one white) 

Full Joy-cons: 

Fully assembled Etika joy-cons ready to use right out of the box! 

If you still have questions please contact before backing the campaign. 

 

Risks & Challenges

In the event that for some reason the project cannot be completed, each and every backer will have the option for a full refund or to have their pledge donated to JED Foundation without a reward. 

 

Pricing and Cost Breakdown

The price of each pledge is $65. This is for one set of joy-con shells, left and right. 

Breakdown per item: 

10% (Approximately $6.50) - Indiegogo and Backerkit Fees

25% (Approximately $16.25) - Production Fees

65% (Approximately $42.25) - Charitable Donation to the JED Foundation

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Let everyone you know, know about the campaign! Every voice matters!

 

You can donate directly to the JED Foundation in Etikas name if you're unable to pledge for a reward!

 

*** NOTE: THIS FUNDRAISING CAMPAIGN IS IN NO WAY AFFILIATED OR ASSOCIATED WITH NINTENDO OF AMERICA OR ANY OF ITS PARTIES, THIS CAMPAIGN DOES NOT SEEK TO INFRINGE ON ANY COPYRIGHTS OR TRADEMARKS HELD BY NINTENDO. NINTENDO CONTINUES TO RESERVE ALL RIGHTS TO ITS PROPERTIES. THE CAMPAIGN REWARDS ARE NOT INFRINGING ON NINTENDO IP AND ONLY SEEK TO RAISE MONEY FOR CHARITY WHILE OFFERING A PRODUCT COMPATIBLE WITH THE NINTENDO SWITCH

story:
Say Goodbye to Identity Theft, Bank Theft and Credit

Card Attacks Forever. The Future of Money is here.

We are Super. A newly formed microelectronics company located in Houston,Tx. You can visit us at www.SteelMoney.com for more information on our product.

  "In the year 2013 more than 40 million people were victims of credit card information and identity theft, resulting in over $10 billion lost." 

       You hear about computer crime in the news every day; Identity theft,  hackers raiding retail stores and stealing millions of customers’ credit card numbers or personal information and other scary news.  In response to this obvious issue that has affected so many American lives, we have created a technological solution to a seemingly unstoppable problem; the Super Steel MoneyCard (patent-pending).The world's first Biometric enabled, Microchip equipped Debit Card, that can work with anyone's bank account. 

What does this mean?

  • Biometric Enabled- One feature that separates Super from your traditional bank card is that Super has a fingerprint sensor built into the actual card. As a safety measure, Super will only be able to make transactions once the owner's fingerprint is swiped and verified. In order to verify fingerprint, the card owner will swipe their finger once at the top of the card. Following the fingerprint's approval a green light will flash, indicating the Super is unlocked for 5 seconds and able to commit transactions.                                       

     

  • Microchip Equipped-  Super is one of the first smart cards integrated with a new form of microchip that gives it the ability to connect with mobile phones, and instantly transfer money between cardholders. In order to make transfers, the cardholder will use a mobile app that accompanies the card to first pair the Super and the mobile phone, (similar to pairing bluetooth but with higher security measures). After pairing the Super with the phone, the user will then select which account of theirs they would like to use for the transfer. Next, the user will input the amount they wish to transfer. Once the transfer details are input into the mobile app, the user will simply swipe their fingerprint on their Super to verify the transfer, and touch it with the Super they are transferring to. 5 seconds later, as quick as a hand shake, money transfer complete. No more making a stop to the ATM. No more writing checks, or waiting 3 to 4 days for bank transfers. With Super, pay or get paid, without the delay.

                                

  • Debit/Credit Card- The reason why we say "Debit/Credit Card" is because Super is a universal mode of payment. When you receive your Super, using the mobile app that accompanies the card, you will have the ability to link any of your financial accounts to your Super. This card will then be able to act as the primary card for your bank account anywhere that accepts traditional cards, including any pay pass, quick pay, or tap to pay terminals. In summary, Super can stand as any of your bank cards, any of your credit cards and for the first time ever, with this new form of technology, it can stand as your physical money.

*Made of Stainless Steel

    Frequently Asked Questions

Can Super only be used when you have a mobile phone? What if your battery dies? 

  • You will need a phone for the initial pairing process between the mobile application and your Super. Once this process is completed, a phone will only be required to input transfer information and to choose which account you would like Super to pay with. In the absence of your mobile phone, Super will still be able to transmit traditional transactions along with verifying for your approved fingerprint. However, it will only be able to stand as the last selected bank account until it gets back to the phone it is paired with.

What if I lose my phone, will I still be able to access my Super?

  • If the unfortunate situation of phone loss occurs,  Super will still be able to transmit traditional transactions along with verifying for your approved fingerprint. However, it will stand as the last selected bank account until you login to your online account and choose a different account and/or pair your card with your new device. In order to pair the new device you will be required to submit a request in your online account. You will then be contacted via email with instructions on how to get your replacement phone connected with your Super.

Is there a usage fee, or some type of interest I have to pay each time I use this card?

  • No, we do not take any percentage of any transaction. Once you purchase your Super it is fully yours, interest free. Hope you enjoy!

When will I receive my Super? 

  • Our goal is to have the first shipment sent out to our customers that pre-ordered by December of this year. Right in time to make to this holiday season a memorable one.

Is my phone compatible with Super?

  • Super is compatible with a range of cell phones already equipped with the software necessary to communicate with Super, primarily Android phones. If you do not have an Android, not to worry. We understand this technology is relatively new and not everyone would have a device equipped with this microchip. Each order will come with a pin sized chipped token that fits into the standard sized headphone port. With this token all phones will have the ability to pair with Super, and take part in all of its' super abilities. 

How will I use Super at a restaurant or a bar?  

  • We have programmed Super with a restaurant mode option that is initiated by swiping your finger 3 times on the finger sensor. Once in restaurant mode your card will be unlocked for 1 transaction. After the card is swiped one time, the card will automatically lock until the card owner's finger is swiped. 

What do we need?

Right now, as many companies in their beginning stages we do not have the neccesary funds to purchase the equipment needed to mass produce our first product, nor a place to call home that adequately accommodates the size of the equipment. With your help we can take Super from being a single prototype to being used worldwide!

What will you get?

25% off Super ($75) - For being apart of our startup, anyone that contributes $75 will automatically receive a Super at that discounted rate. ($100 retail) This payment also guarantees you will receive 1 of the first 10,000 Supers, which are only available to pre-ordering customers

Super Shirt ($45) - For those who support Super and want to physically show it, we are offering an all white high quality cotton t shirt, that has the Super logo printed to the right of the chest. (please add gender and size in comment.)

3 Super cards for 30% off ($195) -If you are looking for Supers for your family or your employees, you will receive each card for 30% off if you purchase 3 or more. ($300 retail). $105 in savings for pre-ordering now.

Every bit helps ($10) - Thank you for believing in Super. Every effort counts to take Super from being a prototype to being produced worldwide! You will receive a Super Creations postcard as a big THANK YOU from us, as well as future updates and offers from Super.

    Thank you for visiting our page, and taking part in making the future, a reality. 

-Team Super


SteelMoney.com

Contact us - inquiries@steelmoney.com

Follow us - Twitter and Instagram @cardofsteel

© 2014 Super Creations LLC, All Rights Reserved.

Super SteelMoney Card-Patent Pending
