story:
Portal is going on leagueofclans.eu where you can look, register, ask some questions and so on.  

 

                    

  Martin Rác   -  Programmer

 Adam Klimo  -  Designer                

  Štefan Jančo  -  Producer                                     

We are three guys from Europe. We have met together one year ago with vision to make a game which can become     revolutionary in the world of browser games and provides new possibilities in cooperation of players, a lot of fun and also provides a lot of competitive events. All right in your webbrowser on all of your devices. We are finishing a developping process right now, all our friends, family are very satisfied with a  game. We would like to fund our project beacuse of starting fees for a game, servers, etc. are so expensive and we are  student without money  for that.

Our guarantee for your money is a perfect game, which we would like to introduce to you below.


Thank you.      

                


ABOUT GAME 

League of Clans is browser game which takes place in the medieval age, where you can play with one of three nations:

  Vikings  

 tions Saracens

  Crusaders

Every  nation have a different economy, army and also graphics. The game will be the right in your webbrowser and is based on a building your own town, conquering enemy towns or creating new towns, stealing resources from enemies, trading, and so much more. In your town you can upgrade buildings that are already built or build new buildings. Increasing level of a building always gives you more and more benefits. Each of the 18 buildings gives you specific advantages.You can also train troops in your town and with them you can attack other towns, stealing resources etc. For building and training troops you need a resources. There are 3 basic resources in the game: 

  Wood  

  Stone  

   Iron

Also in the every town you have a quarries or mines, where the resources are coming from, etc. All this things and more you can do at the worlds with length about 30 days and you really won´t get bored.

IN THE GAME             

Map  

       (Vikings town)         (Saracens town)

 

      (part of forest)

   

       (part of desert)

    (part of forest with stones)

Map is the main coordination tool in the game, you will see there all of towns in the world, you can navigate yourself right there, you can see the distances of other player´s  towns. Map also creates enviroment for giving orders to your army, merchars. Simply, it´s the source of some basic game information.   

Rebels              

                                      

             

It´s something like NPC in the game, players see them on the map, they can steal them resources, conquer their villages and so on. They won´t attack real players but they have some homeguards.              

Monarch    

 

                                                                  

In the game will be the Monarch. Every player will have his own Monarch. We can say that it represents you in game. Rank of the Monarch follows from the player´s current skills. When you have a good ranked Monarch, the game becomes easier for you...Logically, you can afford more things and your word on the world is louder.                                                                                                    

Cities      

                                                                

Cities will be added to the game in a certain phase. In the middle of map is the "Promised Land". Players must conquer this huge city and hold it for 24hours, then the world will be closed and winners announced. Around the "Promised Land", there are another two types of cities, and it´s the "Emperor´s" and "King´s"cities. They are avalaible in the game 10 days sooner than the "Promised Land" and they are much bigger, richer and more useful than classic towns. What is more, when the world ends, owners of Emperor´s and King´s cities are rewarded too. However these cities, should be owned by player, with biggest rank of the Monarch as it´s possible, because with a Monarch with small rank, it won´t be used as well as with big rank.

Buildings     

             

                (Vikings barracks)              (Vikings barrelhouse)

                

                     (Vikings farm)                   (Vikings market)                                                             

             

        (Vikings special barracks)               (Vikings stable)   

                   

               (Vikings storage)                  (Vikings workshop)   

            

            (Saracens barracks)           (Saracens barrelhouse)   

                

                   (Saracens market)            (Saracens smith)   

                  

        (Saracens special barracks)          (Saracens stable)   

                          

               (Saracens wall)               (Saracens church)

                                 more....

There are 18 buildings with a different use. For example in the "Town Hall"you can upgrade all buildings, in the Barracks you can train your infantry, in the Market you can exchange your resources.... In your town u´ll find also Palace, Church, Tavern, Smith, and more... 

Troops      


   

(Vikings troops)

Every nation have a different number of troops, with different strength, speed, hauls and so on. However, there are the special troops, which you are choosing before start of new world. On every world you can choose two of a many special units, which have different strenght, attributes and different usage. Special units picked before server usually show tactics or your role within the team. We will be constatntly working on developing new special units, which u can buy in game store for virtual money or for real money.                                                                              

NATIONS         

                    

 Vikings                                                            

Nation with powerful army but lower economy. Vikings are usually used for offensive and stealing tactics, defeating enemy towns etc. On the other hand, Vikings have less capacity of farm, so they can´t have huge army. 

 Saracens     

Strong economy nation, they have great market and capacity of troops, capacity of Stock etc. It has a fast troops, but at the same that troops are the weakest. Anyway their power is in numbers of army. 

  Crusaders                                                              

Balanced nation, used usualy by the people who like balanced economy with army. Anyway Crusaders rely on the strength of its defense forces.      

    

WORLD TYPES AND ABOUT CLANS              

 Clan    

                                                                  

In the game portal, there is a possibility to create your own clan, or just join an exist one. Capacity of players is unlimited. Players are playing for clan in the Clan Worlds where is a cooperation with a clanmates necessary. They are getting a points for clan and moving clan upper and upper in the rank. 


Classic World   

                                                           

Is a type of a world where the player is not fixed by his clan. Every player can show his individual skill in this world but what is more, new players (but also veterans) can meet other people in game and form new relationships. Players are also gaining points in global rank. In Classic world there is no clan but players can create small communities called Orders. Order is not fixed by game portal like clan, it´s capacity is 30 playes and may include different nations. 


Clan world     


                                                        

The game starts on portal where the clan leader create list of 10 players participating in world. Players must represent thier clan right there. In the begining of the world computer allots a nation to the clan so every player on list has a same nation. Player who is playing in the clan world can´t leave clan during this time. He must wait until the clan world ends.                                                                                                                                          World length       

                                                       

At the begining of the game players are devided on the map. Before the start, player can choose a part of the map where they want to play. In the clan world, clan leader devides players on the map, and choose if the players will be in the nearness, or not, in these parts of map:    

1. Border with first nation

2. Inland                                                                  

3. Border with second nation                                                

4. Border with cities                                             

There will be 12 cities = 3 Emperor´s (1 for each nation) and 9 King´s cities (3 for each nation). Cities will be avalaible in 15th day from the start of the world. Total world length is about 30 days. In 25th day the "Promised Land"become avalaible. Clan which succeed to conquer and hold it for 24 hours will be announced as a winner of the world.


After the end of the world      


                                           

Stats will be saved in the profile of clan and profiles of players (possition, points and for best players we have prepaired cool badges). Points will be devided among the players added to the global ranking.


PORTAL                              

Portal works as a center of a game, you will find there for example:forum,  chat, news, instructions... There are also ranks, world stats, clan section and much more things wich guarantee you a lot of fun.

(PC version)


Responsive design portal   


Game website and whole game is designed responsive. You can play it on all your devices, all resolutions of screens and all screen aspect ratios.

(Tablet version)

                                                                                                                                      (Mobile version)


Because we are students, which are working on the game beside a school, in our free time. Any our incomes can´t cover all of fees, which we need to run the game. We need a lot of money to run it. 

Because of that, we came here on indiegogo. We know that on this page people helped plenty of great projects, which was given a chance to start. So, we would be extremly happy, when you´d give that chance also to us, and we promise, that our game won´t dissapoint you.


Thank you.

                              

Absolutely in no case we don´t want to use your money to fill our wallets. We do it for free, and we do it with pleasure. What is more, we want to do something big and thats our motivation.We decided that we need classic goal 3000 USD. It´s very hard to run the game without that.   

This goal we want to use for: 


THE SERVERS   

Servers, on which will the game run. For the quality and game fluency, we need quality servers which aren´t cheap. With these money we want cover period when the game will be lossy. We hope it won´t take a long time.       

ADVERTISEMENT    

Without an ads, it will be harder. We need to gain more players, so another part of money will be used for advertisement.                                                                 

FEES                                    

Fees connected to start of the game (fee for GBTC etc.).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               In a case that our basic goal will be funded, we have two more which aren´t so   important but we will really happy for them. It would push us much further. 

   

Goal 8500 USD.


OWN COMPANY   

It´s our big dream, because we want to have in the future an own company which creates interesting web content, full of fun and informations. It´d push us again forward and help us to create much better conditions for a running game.

                                                                                                                                                    If the second goal will be funded, we have the last. We don´t believe to it a lot, but we want to give you an information, what would happen with the money if we would recieve more money.

Goal 8500+ USD. 


EQUIPMENT     

When we would have a company, we would use the money for a better  technics and finally our game would gain more quality. For example in graphic, because we would buy new sofware etc. 


P.S.    

Every dollar will be useful. With every dollar we will push game at higher qualitative level.       

Together, for your satisfaction. 

Thank you.


This screenshots are just for imagine, the game will be run firstly in english language version. And the date of open is after finnish this funding. It´s in the July 2014.


The main screen of the game at Viking´s view.


Not completed screen of Viking´s army.


Screenshot of map only with Viking´s towns.

Screen of Viking troop "Raider".



View of the Sarancen´s town.


View of the Viking´s town.


View of the Crusader´s town.


Thank you.

Portal is going on leagueofclans.eu where you can look, register, ask some questions and so on.                         Martin Rác   -  Programmer Adam Klimo  -  Designer                  Štefan Jančo  -  Producer                                     We are three guys from Europe. We have met together one year ago with vision to
make a game which can become     revolutionary in the world of browser
games and provides new possibilities in cooperation of players, a lot
of fun and also provides a lot of competitive events. All right in
your webbrowser on all of your devices. We are finishing a developping process right now, all our friends, family are very
satisfied with a  game. We would like to fund our project beacuse of
starting fees for a game, servers, etc. are so expensive and we
are  student without money  for that.
Our guarantee for your money is a
perfect game, which we would like to introduce to you below.

Thank you.                      ABOUT GAME League of Clans is browser game which takes place in the medieval age, where you can play with one of three nations:  Vikings   tions Saracens  CrusadersEvery  nation have a different
economy, army and also graphics. The game will be the right in your
webbrowser and is based on a building your own town, conquering enemy
towns or creating new towns, stealing resources from enemies, trading,
and so much more. In your town you can upgrade buildings that are
already built or build new buildings. Increasing level of a building
always gives you more and more benefits. Each of the 18 buildings gives you specific advantages.You can also train troops in your town
and with them you can attack other towns, stealing resources etc. For
building and training troops you need a resources. There are 3 basic
resources in the game:   Wood    Stone     IronAlso in the every town
you have a quarries or mines, where the resources are coming from, etc. All this things and more you can do at the worlds with length about 30 days and you really won´t get bored.IN THE GAME             Map         (Vikings town)         (Saracens town)       (part of forest)          (part of desert)    (part of forest with stones)Map is the main coordination tool
in the game, you will see there all of towns in the world, you can
navigate yourself right there, you can see the distances of other
player´s  towns.  Map also creates enviroment for giving orders to
your army, merchars. Simply, it´s the source of some basic game
information.   Rebels                                                                 It´s something like NPC in the game, players see
them on the map, they can steal them resources, conquer their
villages and so on. They won´t attack real players but they have
some homeguards.              Monarch                                                                       In the game will be the Monarch. Every
player will have his own Monarch. We can say that it represents you
in game. Rank of the Monarch follows from the player´s current
skills. When you have a good ranked Monarch, the game becomes easier
for you...Logically, you can afford more things and your word on the
world is louder.                                                                                                    Cities                                                                      Cities will be added to the game in a certain
phase. In the middle of map is the "Promised Land". Players
must conquer this huge city and hold it for 24hours, then the world
will be closed and winners announced. Around the "Promised Land", there are another two types of cities, and it´s the
"Emperor´s" and "King´s"cities. They are
avalaible in the game 10 days sooner than the "Promised Land"
and they are much bigger, richer and more useful than classic towns.
What is more, when the world ends, owners of Emperor´s and King´s cities are rewarded too. However these cities, should be owned by
player, with biggest rank of the Monarch as it´s possible, because
with a Monarch with small rank, it won´t be used as well as with big
rank.Buildings                                  (Vikings barracks)              (Vikings barrelhouse)                                     (Vikings farm)                   (Vikings market)                                                                                  (Vikings special barracks)               (Vikings stable)                                     (Vikings storage)                  (Vikings workshop)                           (Saracens barracks)           (Saracens barrelhouse)                                      (Saracens market)            (Saracens smith)                             (Saracens special barracks)          (Saracens stable)                                            (Saracens wall)               (Saracens church)                                 more....There

story:
SportsBeep 

The Fastest Daily Fantasy Game of the Market today. 

We changed fantasy sports forever and developed a game that is accurate, fast and fun. We developed such a unique user experience that we are building a stronger fanbase, that will never want to miss an inning a quarter or period again. 

SPORTSBEEP.COM is a complete money in, money out system. With the App Available in the GOOGLE PLAY STORE and iOS being released in July, you can play, earn, win and share with your favorite team and players. 

Be apart of Fantasy Sports History and get the GAME that is changing the way you play Fantasy Sports Forever.

story:
Update #1 ONLINE DEMO

Playable demo of the Boss Fight SCENE, right in your browser, or on your Android phone / tablet !

http://www.taurris.com/StarshooterBossDemoOnline

Be sure to check it out ! And tell me, what you think.

Facebook App

Google Play : Android App

Web demo

 

Introduction

First of all, I would like to introduce myself. I'm game developer from Czech Republic, Prague. I'm no newbie in game development industry, I've quite few years of experience as a senior artist in making AAA titles, like ARMA2, ARMA or truck sims. namely German truck simulator or Eurotrucks Simulator 2(which is in the making, right now).

But I always wanted to make a game, which will be entirely my idea. That's why, I started work on my personal project called Codename : STARSHOOTER. I'm realist and I know, that I cannot compete with other AAA titles and that I need to make something smaller. That's the reason why I chose genre of „shoot'em'up“ game. Games, which I enjoyed so much, in my childhood. You will surely remember games like Xenon or Tyrian. These are great examples of pure gameplay and fun and this is the point from where I want to continue and evolve my game further. I want to give the game more fun, more juice and more possibilities to the player.

What I want to make ?

My game should offer not only shooting of enemy air crafts, but even buying of upgrades, new ships and a lot of customizations of them. I plan to bring in the power of worldwide online statistics and leader boards, in which players will compete for in game rewards.

Today it's almost a necessity that I will prepare the game for platforms like Android, iOS, PC & Mac, but I want to make even web-app version, that will be accessible on my web page & as a Facebook application. Even this isn't the end, I will continue to expand and evolve the game. It's definitely not a one shot project. Everything will evolve one-by-one. That's the point where you, players, will come into play. I want to keep on listening to your voices, to criticism and pleas about what you want or don't want in the game. I want to prepare forums and public polls about the game, where you'll be able to discuss the game itself and new ideas & extensions of what could be presented in the game. I want YOU to decide, what is going to be in the game. After all, I want to make game that YOU will play.

You can see how the development goes on here : www.taurris.com

Why I need your help ?

Without you, my project would take MUCH more time to complete. Your support will let me to work on Codename : STARSHOOTER full time. Otherwise I need to be full time in work and this way, I'm making this project only in my spare time, mostly weekends and evenings. But this can continue only for a limited time. Of course I don't want your support for free.

For your support I'm offering you these perks :

 

  • 1$ - You will get a thanks on official website, as a contributor. As one, that made this possible.

  • 5$ - For this, I will mention your name in the game credits as well as a thank on web page.

  • 25$ - I will give you 2500 ingame credits, that you can spend in buying ship upgrades, weapons and so on. In addition, thanks on game's web page.

    • you'll receive the credits, after the game launches
  • 50$ - Game soundtrack + thanks on web page
    • you'll receive the soundtrack, after the game launches

  • 100$ - You will be able to choose which 3D printed model you will get. All of them will be printed via Shapeways.com + thanks on web page

    • see all avaiable models here


  • 200$ - You will pick the 3D printed model which will be made by Shapeways.com and we'll hand paint it for you

    • see all avaiable models here

  • 300$ - For this contribution, I will give you 3D printed logo of Codenam : STARSHOOTER in PURE SILVER. The model will be 3D printed by Shapeways.com + thanks on web page

    • see the logo design here

  • 800$ - In this case, I will make playable game ship according to your design. We'll be in contact until you'll be satisfied with the results. I reserve the right to change the design to match the game's environment. Thanks on the games web page and your name in the game credits as the ship's designer.

Shipping is already included in all perks. All shippable perks will be shipped after the campaing ends and I receive the funds, to be able to fund everything neccessary associated with the perks.

 

Why I want this much and on what I will spend it ?

Thanks to that I work on this alone, I need to fund only me. So basically its mainly about that I will be able to work on it full time. I want this much, because it should allow me to work on the project for minimum 2 months with all expenses covered. From the whole sum about 20% goes for paying for the creation of the perks and shipping them. After all 3D printing isn't the cheapest technology, but I want to give you something unique for your support. Something which you deserve and is valuable, because YOUR support is so valuable for me. The rest of the money will go to making models, textures, coding, sounds and music. Music and sound effects are the only two things which I cannot do myself and I'll be hiring someone to do it.

Because It's my personal project, I promise that I will complete the project even if I won't be able to collect the whole sum. In essence I take this as my personal goal, question of my pride to finish it :). That's why every $ counts and will help me in the development. I very appreciate even the smallest contributions.

Every help counts !

If you cannot or just don't want to contribute, but this project still interests you, please, spread the word. Tell about Codename : STARSHOOTER to everyone you know, family, friends. If you have your own blog about games, I will gladly read your opinion about the project there. If you're a editor for some internet magazine, please spread the news. Write about it, curse or praise. Any reaction will help me make the game better. Personally I hope, that you wont let me alone in this !

Thank you for your time,

Taurris.com

Václav Mazaný

These are great examples of pure gameplay and fun and this is the point from where I want to continue and evolve my game further. I want to give the game more fun, more juice and more possibilities to the player.
 What I want to make ?
My game should offer not only shooting of enemy air crafts, but even buying of upgrades, new ships and a lot of customizations of them. I plan to bring in the power of worldwide online statistics and leader boards, in which players will compete for in game rewards.
Today it's almost a necessity that I will prepare the game for platforms like Android, iOS, PC & Mac, but I want to make even web-app version, that will be accessible on my web page & as a Facebook application. Even this isn't the end, I will continue to expand and evolve the game. It's definitely not a one shot project. Everything will evolve one-by-one. That's the point where you, players, will come into play. I want to keep on listening to your voices, to criticism and pleas about what you want or don't want in the game. I want to prepare forums and public polls about the game, where you'll be able to discuss the game itself and new ideas & extensions of what could be presented in the game. I want YOU to decide, what is going to be in the game. After all, I want to make game that YOU will play.
You can see how the development goes on here : www.taurris.com
Why I need your help ?
Without you, my project would take MUCH more time to complete. Your support will let me to work on Codename : STARSHOOTER full time. Otherwise I need to be full time in work and this way, I'm making this project only in my spare time, mostly weekends and evenings. But this can continue only for a limited time. Of course I don't want your support for free.
For your support I'm offering you these perks :
 


1$ - You will get a thanks on official website, as a contributor. As one, that made this possible.


5$ - For this, I will mention your name in the game credits as well as a thank on web page.


25$ - I will give you 2500 ingame credits, that you can spend in buying ship upgrades, weapons and so on. In addition, thanks on game's web page.

you'll receive the credits, after the game launches


50$ - Game soundtrack + thanks on web page

you'll receive the soundtrack, after the game launches



100$ - You will be able to choose which 3D printed model you will get. All of them will be printed via Shapeways.com + thanks on web page

see all avaiable models here





200$ - You will pick the 3D printed model which will be made by Shapeways.com and we'll hand paint it for you

see all avaiable models here





300$ - For this contribution, I will give you 3D printed logo of Codenam : STARSHOOTER in PURE SILVER. The model will be 3D printed by Shapeways.com + thanks on web page

see the logo design here





800$ - In this case, I will make playable game ship according to your design. We'll be in contact until you'll be satisfied with the results. I reserve the right to change the design to match the game's environment. Thanks on the games web page and your name in the game credits as the ship's designer.

 Shipping is already included in all perks. All shippable perks will be shipped after the campaing ends and I receive the funds, to be able to fund everything neccessary associated with the perks.
 
Why I want this much and on what I will spend it ?
Thanks to that I work on this alone, I need to fund only me. So basically its mainly about that I will be able to work on it full time. I want this much, because it should allow me to work on the project for minimum 2 months with all expenses covered. From the whole sum about 20% goes for paying for the creation of the perks and shipping them. After all 3D printing isn't the cheapest technology, but I want to give you something unique for your support. Something which you deserve and is valuable, because YOUR support is so valuable for me. The rest of the money will go to making models, textures, coding, sounds and music. Music and sound effects are the only two things which I cannot do myself and I'll be hiring someone to do it.
Because It's my personal project, I promise that I will complete the project even if I won't be able to collect the whole sum. In essence I take this as my personal goal, question of my pride to finish it :). That's why every $ counts and will help me in the development. I very appreciate even the smallest contributions.
Every help counts !
If you cannot or just don't want to contribute, but this project still interests you, please, spread the word. Tell about Codename : STARSHOOTER to everyone you know, family, friends. If you have your own blog about games, I will gladly read your opinion about the project there. If you're a editor for some internet magazine, please spread the news. Write about it, curse or praise. Any reaction will help me make the game better. Personally I hope, that you wont let me alone in this !
Thank you for your time,
Taurris.com
Václav Mazaný

story:
We would like to create a game in the Epic Action genre with interesting Game play and incredible special effects. You will find a whole new world that will worth your attention. Your and IndieGoGo’s help would make us able to convert this dream into reality.

Let's build this game together!

- Dennis Langley


A part of Brascot 6 OST



CELISTIC
is the spherical multiple star system with many habitable planets. It was named by the central star Celistic and consists of more than 100 stars.


Huge city-factory Brascot 6 station. This is the exterior game location will be used in gameplay.



BRASCOT 6
This story about the necessity of permanent choice - personal and professional - made by the main character, Benson Miles, in whose heart the love, friendship and devotion are born.



4% - MANAGMENT AND QUALITY CONTROL
IN ORDER TO MAKE A QUALITY GAME, WE NEED TO MANAGE AND MONITOR ALL THE STAGES OF PRODUCTION.

8% - 2D ASSETS
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL DESIGN CREATED AT THIS PHASE OF PRODUCTION AND IT REQUIRES GOOD SPECIALISTS.

10% - 3D ASSETS
FOR FILLING THE GAME WORLD AND MAKING IT VOLUMINOUS, THERE ARE REQUIERED HIGH-QUALITY 3D MODELS.

8% - ANIMATIONS
IT IS NECESSARY TO REVIVE THE GAME WORLD WITH BEAUTIFUL AND REALISTIC MOTION.

15% - PROGRAMMING AND 3D ASSETS
THIS PRODUCTION PROCESS COMBINES ALL THE ELEMENTS OF THE GAME AND MAKES THEM INTERACT.

6,5% - SOUND AND MUSIC
ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT FEATURES OF VIDEO GAMES IS GOOD SOUND AND MUSIC.

2% - COPYWRITING
IN ORDER TO DISCLOSE ALL THE DETAILS OF THE PLOT AND OF THE GAME WORLD, WE NEED TO WRITE A LARGE AMOUNT OF TEXT.

20% - REWARDS FULFILLMENT
EACH BAKER WILL BE THANKED WITH DESERVED REWARD FOR THEIR CONTRIBUTION.

2% - SUPPORT
TO INFORM AND COMMUNICATE WITH OUR BAKERS AND OTHER INTERESTED PARTIES IN THE PRODUCTION PROCESS, WE NEED TO PROVIDE SUPPORT.

1.5% - EQUIPMENT
THE PRODUCTION PROCESS REQUIRES THE AVAILABILITY OF HARDWARE AND SOFTWARE.

13% - TAXES
WE TRY TO MINIMIZE TAXES, BUT WE MUST PAY THEM.

10% - TAXES
FOR CREDITING FUNDS TO THE ACCOUNT AND CONDUCTING PRODUCTION EXPENSES THERE IS A FEE APPLIED TO EACH TRANSACTION.

100% - TOTAL

Check expenses with page BUDGET on the WEBSITE


RISKS AND CHALLENGES
Celistic project was established in 2008 and has been in existence for more than 5 years. During this period, on the project has been spent over $ 500K and we did a great job of filling the world. The book was published and was created comics.

By mistake, we pointed out the form Flexible Funding. But in case of failure to achieve the main goal, we will refund all money of Backers as the reputation of the project is much more expensive.

In the project we plan to release an additional 5 books, a few video games and maybe shoot a series of films.

We are a fairly strong team, capable of creating a video game and bring it to the final product. This can be confirmed by our followers who are watching our project over the years.

We spent half a year to study and create a game demo version on the 3D engine Unity3D , but when faced with quality graphics decided to go to the UDK. Within 3 months, we will be able to provide a demo version of the game for our Bakers.

story:
We need your help to raise funds for the refugee crisis in Calais. We plan on taking down much needed clothes, blankets, shelter, toiletries, food and medical supplies. The more money we raise the better quality stuff we can get- thicker blankets, stronger tarps, warmer clothes can make a huge difference when forced to spend winter outdoors. If we raise enough it can help go to cover the costs of future trips too.

The rhetoric coming from the UK government and national media surrounding the humanitarian crisis happening less than 30 miles from Britain's shores is nothing short of sickening.

There are up to 4,000 people living in squalid conditions in Calais, mostly men but including women, young children and some with serious medical requirements.

More arrive each day, having survived perilous journeys of hundreds of miles, fleeing persecution and war torn countries like Afghanistan, Eritrea, Somalia, Sudan, Libya and Syria. Many arrive desperately hungry, in need of urgent medical attention and without basic necessities such as warm clothing or even shoes.

Volunteers on the ground use terms such as "war zone" or "disaster zone" to describe the conditions. There is no electricity and only 3 taps. Many, including children and the infirm, must walk a mile to collect water. There are just 2 refuse points for the whole camp, and sanitation is insufficient. Rubbish and in some areas human waste is strewn across the ground. Essentials that you and I take for granted, like clean underwear, toilet paper and toothbrushes are in short supply. 

The only protections from the elements are tents and improvised shelters constructed from pallets and tarpaulin, some of which sleep up to 40 at a time. Winter is just around the corner and volunteers are increasingly concerned about the lack of men's shoes, warm clothing and sleeping bags.

Those in the camp are forced to rely on charity for their survival but resources are stretched to breaking point. A makeshift hospital in the camp treats up to 90 people a day, some with serious injuries. Medical supplies are desperately low.

On top of these appalling conditions, Human Rights Watch has reported that the Calais refugees (including the children) face routine abuse, violence and harassment from the local police.

The U.N. has described the situation in Calais as a "Civil Emergency" and called for a “comprehensive package and.... a sustainable response.” Sadly this is not forthcoming and the day to day lives of those in the camps is in the hands of volunteers and the generosity of people such as yourself.

Please, will you help?

story:
Doyodo presents: The RetroEngine Sigma!

Retrogaming is constantly gaining in popularity but until now was mostly the domain of computer nerds and tech wizards who enjoy repurposing older console systems or handling bare bones electronics. Even if you have the required skills, setting up and configuring the required soft- and hardware can be a tedious process. With this project we are trying to simplify things: The RetroEngine Sigma is the device designed to make retro gaming accessible to the rest of us.

 

 

An homage to the classic systems of the nineties, our palm-size retro-style console has an ultra-powerful silicon core (four, actually) with the perfect specs to deliver one of the most kick-ass retro gaming experiences. 

The first time you plug it in, our installer will inject everything you need into the system to start gaming or use the Kodi Media Center Software, right away. You can even write a novel or do your taxes with it!

 What can I play?

The Sigma will ship with 15 preinstalled, branded games that are playable out of the box. We will reveal the individual titles over the course of the campaign. In addition, our Plug’n Play installer gives you the choice to download, configure and install additional emulators from public sources and repositories, controlled by your smartphone or tablet. This is as easy as selecting the option during the initial setup of the system and will allow you to play thousands of additional ROM’s(**) that can be easily installed onto the system with a web-browser or by using the provided Micro SD adapter. Your smartphone will also be usable as a keyboard and even as an additional game controller. The following gaming systems can be enabled:

 

Connectivity 

Direct connect to modern TVs via HDMI

  

Two front surface function buttons: User definable function.

Two Player Ports accept any USB controller…

... Retro and Modern!

Expansion Port: USB OTG -> Full-Size HUB

Bluetooth Peripherals via Dongle

Does this only work with wired controllers?

The Sigma comes with built-in WiFi so you can easily communicate with it over your home network, this includes the ability to control games with your smartphone. In addition, we offer a Bluetooth dongle for the expansion port with some perks (also available individually at a later time). That means you’re good to go with most Bluetooth gamepads, for example those used with the PlayStation 3.

Retro BT controllers!

How long can I play?

As long as you can stay awake. We ship the system with an AC Adaptor.

 

And there is more:

By adding a wireless keyboard and mouse (you can also just use your smartphone), your console becomes the perfect living room computer. Write a novel, surf YouTube or watch your movies on your big screen while kicking back on your couch.

Your Sigma Desktop

 

Manage your Media Library with Kodi

 Media Player Mayhem! 4K Support!

 

This model of the Sigma was only available via this Indiegogo campaign. You can reserve a new model with different design via Indiegogo InDemand now!

What is required to set this up?

In order to set up the system, you need to have access to a Wifi network for installation. You need a Wifi capable smartphone, tablet or computer with a full featured Internet browser for configuration and to act as a mouse and keyboard replacement.

The system ships to you as a fully-configured network enabled desktop computer and media-player preloaded with several branded games, the Armbian OS with the XFCE desktop, Kodi Mediacenter, as well as a one-click installer that allows you to easily configure Wifi access with the help of your smartphone, tablet or PC. It can also guide you through the optional download and installation of additional software.

Special Thanks:

A big thank you to Chris Huelsbeck for allowing us to use his music in our video. Please check out his amazing project "Turrican II - The Orchestral Album"!

We'd also like to thank Tronkyfran (trkfran at gmail dot com) for his gorgeous console images!

Risks and challenges

Our team members have executed three successful crowdfunding campaigns by now and will use that experience to make *your* experience as smoothly and enjoyable as possible.

While we have worked with most of our manufacturing partners for years and they have decades of experience in video game peripheral products, there is always a chance of problems in the delivery chain causing delays. If essential components used in the project become unavailable, we might be forced to make changes to the planned product to facilitate suitable replacement components, causing delays. One of our suppliers could go out of business or be unable to scale production volume up quickly enough if demand exceeds our estimates. Customs procedures and certification requirements may change and cause delays. With all unfinished projects, there is always a chance of patent or other legal claims by 3rd parties that need to be addressed and may cause delays or project cancellation.

While these risks exist, we have put contingency plans in place where possible and we are confident we can deliver the project to spec and on time.

Legal Disclaimer: The designs and functionality shown are not necessarily final, they are used for illustrative purposes and may be subject to change. The SBC board used in the prototypes is subject to change depending on economies of scale. The system does not ship with software components or games we didn't either license, develop ourselves or use under a permissible Open Source license. Where we modify or build on Open Source software in order to enable the functionality of our system, we will release all source code once distribution of the final units commences, irrespectively of license type. 

ROM(**) usage: If you decide to install the additional Emulator Pack to enable the system to run game backups from older systems, the legality of using such ROMs depends on your countries laws and on additional circumstances such as for example your continued possession of the original copy of the game as well as the original hardware it ran on. The functionality is meant to allow you access to your old gaming favorites, in cases where e.g. technical reasons prevent you from continued use of those - always subject to the laws of your country. We do not condone software piracy.

* - An Emulator is a program that tells a computer how to behave like the console or arcade machine did, so that it knows how to interpret the ROMs.

** - A ROM is a digital copy of an individual game program that was originally running on Arcade machines, consoles or older home-computers. A ROM can normally only be run on the system it was originally designed for.

story:
Introduction

If you like Kung Fu Panda, I believe you love those adorable and convivial characters in the movie.

Po, Viper, Monkey, Mantis, Shifu, Tigress, etc... They train together, they fight together and grow together.

One day, our team were thinking what if we could design a cute product that is neithher a PVC Figure nor a Puppet, but a CONTROLLER!

We all love panda. Now, there's a chance to hold it in hands.

 

Moreover,

Our team is committed to make the best controller. If you can't wait for the Panda Series Controller,

we also have the Nook Series Wireless Controller and Nook Series Joy-con for you.

Nooke Series Wireless Controller provides different colors, choose the one you prefer!

 

Nook Series Joy-con for Nintendo Switch

 

Nook Series Wireless Controller for Switch

 

FOLLOW US

story:
Real Wallachian Games proudly presents I am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia. An epic board game about the real life of Vlad the Impaler, about the habits, mysteries and actual facts from Wallachia and Transylvania.

In the year of the Lord 1456, while Wallachia and Transylvania were being haunted by bloody wars, waterways and landways were little known and very tangled; therefore, one could not travel easily and without risks and those that were able to get to one part of the world stayed there till death found them.

In those dark times, a large and bloody empire was rising in south Asia, which was ruled by sultans and whose only purpose was to conquer the world. This empire had crushed the eastern kingdoms and had extended its power over their capitals and over the peoples in the Balkans.

Many power thirsty princes had occupied the wallachian throne, the only power who was able to stop the unholy threat. One of these was different from the others - Prince Vlad Tepes (the Impaler) - who is known nowadays as "Dracu". To stop the endless battles, the struggles over the power and to impose against his enemies, the Prince used his merciless punishment – the famous "impalement", with the help of wallachian mistical creatures.

The participants must destroy hostile units, try to defeat as many neutral units as possible (werewolves, ottoman troops), thus winning gold rewards that will buy them items, magic battle cards and outpost buildings.  With the help of the methods of attack, the skills and the tacit alliances, the strategies of placing their troops and the outposts, by using daylight or being sheltered by the night, one player shall claim the throne and the Ruler of Wallachia shall be enthroned, after confronting the other claimers.

 

 

Our goal is to raise $8000. Your contribution will promote this legendary board game worldwide.

 

The english version of the I am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia rulebook can be downloaded by clicking the image below.

 
The game contains:
  • 16 highly detailed 55-70 mm plastic miniatures
  • 1 large Game Map (680x680 mm)
  • 1 large Underworld Map (395x275 mm)
  • 4 Player Sheets
  • 13 Life Dials
  • 1 Time Dial
  • 1 Eight Sided Battle Die
  • 1 Six Sided Underworld Die
  • 14 Unique Magic Battle Cards
  • 108 Unique Battle Cards
  • 12 Unique Akathist Cards
  • 66 Gold Coin Tokens
  • 8 Resurection Tokens
  • 8 Vlad's Life Tokens
  • 8 Impale Tokens
  • 14 Healing Potion Tokens
  • 8 Crown Tokens
  • 16 Flag Tokens
  • 12 Plague Tokens
  • 1 Church Bell Token
  • 1 Curse Token
  • 14 Plastic Dial Connectors
  • English Rulebook
  • Ziplock PE-Bags
 
 
The I Am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia board game allows each player to control a Vlad hero as well as an Archer and a Wallachian Knight, in order to become the Ruler of Wallachia. But the path to glory and power is not easy, as each player has to face many dangers and to eliminate all his opponents trough great battles.
 
The hundreds of playcards, tokens, figures, outpost buildings and the astonishing map design make I Am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia the best action-roleplaying game. Below we will briefly present some of these components, features and modes of interaction between players.
 
 

 

  • 4 highly detailed, 60 mm, Vlad the Impaler plastic miniatures

  • 4 highly detailed, 55 mm, Wallachian Knight plastic miniatures

  • 4 highly detailed, 62 mm, Archer plastic miniatures

  • 4 highly detailed, 70 mm, Outpost plastic miniatures

 
 
Gameplay takes place on the Game Map and on the Underworld Map.
 
Game Map
 
 
The Game Map is the board where all the interactions between players (including battles, movement and tactical positioning of units or outposts) will take place. This map has plenty of places and areas with different meanings, where players can perform actions that can and will affect their strategy and chances of winning. The most important area from the Game Map is represented by the fortress (occupied and guarded by ottomans), but players will also find churches, taverns, wild areas with dangerous werewolfes. So everyone has plenty of choices at any time: bells can be tolled, new items, cards or potions can be bought using gold coins, curses can be placed, just to name a few.
 
Underworld Map
 
The Underworld is the area where Archers and Wallachian Knights enter once they die in battle, but only if the player still has resurrection tokens. Once such a unit enters the Underworld, it must follow a path and at it's end the player can resurrect it at his own church.
 
On the same board with the Underworld the players will find 2 dials: Time Dial and Dial with Neutral Units' Life.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The game has 3 types of cards: Battle Cards, Magic Cards and Akathist Cards (all together are 134 cards).

Battle Cards are specialised on each type of unit (Vlad, Archer or Wallachian Knight) and can be either night cards or day cards. Every unit have a different pack of battle cards:
 
Vlad the Impaler - 36 battle cards
 
 
Archer - 36 battle cards
 
 
Wallachian Knight - 36 battle cards
 
 
Magic Cards - 14 cards - can only be used with Vlad in battles and will be purchased from any tavern (using gold coins).
 
 
Akathist Cards - 12 cards - can be bought from any church and can affect one or more players (including the player who buys it) with good or bad effects for a fix period of time.
 
 
Trough all these cards, players will discover abilities, characters and creatures, weapons and armors specific Romanian territories (Wallachia and Transylvania) at that time.
 
Different tokens can also be used to represent different actions and items like gold coins, impales, resurrections, healing potions, a church bell, a curse and so on.
 
 
 
 
 
There are 2 types of battles in I Am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia, against enemy units and against neutral units.

Battles between enemy units - consist in using a single Battle Card, Magic Card or Impale for each of your units involved in the battle, against the selected enemy unit (the game gives you the possibility to attack with all your 3 units, one enemy unit, if it is in their attack range). The winner will be rewarded for each enemy unit killed (1 Crown for Vlad and 3 Gold Coins for each Archer or Wallachian Knight).

Battles between player's units and neutral units - will take place only in the combat areas located near this neutral units. This time, you can use any number of cards for each attacking unit (they still have to respect the day/night time) until the enemy is dead. The neutral unit will respond after every card with it's own attack, shown by the 8 sided die. If the neutral unit dies in battle, you will also be rewarded with 3 Gold Coins (in case of werewolfes) or with 1 Gold Coin and 1 Flag (which will be placed on the appropriate symbol of that gate) in case of fortress guards.

 

 
 
 
 
The game will be dispatched from Romania for worldwide delivery.
 
We have a different shipping cost for EU, USA and Canada which is included in the Perk levels.
 
Transportation costs are different for each perk due to the large size of the games and posters. A game weighs 3,3 kg and has the following dimensions: length 520 mm, width 310 mm, height 100 mm. Posters have almost the size of a man: height 1520 mm, width 1100 mm.
By chosing a certain type of perk you will have discounts at transport costs between 40% and 100%.

 
Payments are processed through Paypal which ensures the security of your transaction. It is not required to have a Paypal account nor that you have to create one. You can use any Credit Card.
 
If you want to affirm your opinion or have questions, feel free to contact us at office@realwallachiangames.com or visit our website, www.realwallachiangames.com.
And what is most important, have fun playing the games!
 
 
 
© 2012 Real Wallachian Games. All rights reserved.
story_txt:
Real Wallachian Games proudly presents I am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia. An epic board game about the real life of Vlad the Impaler, about the habits, mysteries and actual facts from Wallachia and Transylvania.
In the year of the Lord 1456, while Wallachia and Transylvania were being haunted by bloody wars, waterways and landways were little known and very tangled; therefore, one could not travel easily and without risks and those that were able to get to one part of the world stayed there till death found them. 
In those dark times, a large and bloody empire was rising in south Asia, which was ruled by sultans and whose only purpose was to conquer the world. This empire had crushed the eastern kingdoms and had extended its power over their capitals and over the peoples in the Balkans. 
Many power thirsty princes had occupied the wallachian throne, the only power who was able to stop the unholy threat. One of these was different from the others - Prince Vlad Tepes (the Impaler) - who is known nowadays as "Dracu". To stop the endless battles, the struggles over the power and to impose against his enemies, the Prince used his merciless punishment – the famous "impalement", with the help of wallachian mistical creatures.
The participants must destroy hostile units, try to defeat as many neutral units as possible (werewolves, ottoman troops), thus winning gold rewards that will buy them items, magic battle cards and outpost buildings.  With the help of the methods of attack, the skills and the tacit alliances, the strategies of placing their troops and the outposts, by using daylight or being sheltered by the night, one player shall claim the throne and the Ruler of Wallachia shall be enthroned, after confronting the other claimers.

 

 
Our goal is to raise $8000. Your contribution will promote this legendary board game worldwide.
 

The english version of the I am Vlad - Prince of Wallachia rulebook can be downloaded by clicking the image below.

12 Plague Tokens
1 Church Bell Token
1 Curse Token
14 Plastic Dial Connectors
English Rulebook
Ziplock PE-Bags

story:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pop-to-save/id731968235



We are an independent game developer team situated at Metutech ATOM which is the only pre-incubation center in Turkey which solely aims to gaming start-ups. 


(For this game, we focus on simplicity and how to be both simple but addictive)


Pop to Save is mobile puzzle game based on particle physics, line drawing and erasing. With this compatible combination you will experience a different gameplay through our unique game. Physical interaction at games is an entertaining factor itself, adding puzzle solving challenges multiplies the fun. This game is also enriched with 3 different packages including different gameplays already.

About the second ingredient “free line drawing”; this mechanic adds freedom to gameplay and a different autonomy experience for your line drawing skills. Drawing lines through the game screen for curving, bending or blocking the particles will be a totally different experiment for you. This gameplay is also enriched with different side game elements like portals, lasers, sponges and more.


Pop to Save has its fascinating story with cute little characters. It is ready with 3 different packages and 72 levels. All level-packs have different style of gameplay. The fourth one is on the road. Our goal is to design unique playing experience with each new level.


(every package has its own story)

Each pack contains 21 standard and 3 special levels. 


Our friendly characters are trapped in bubble pops by the evil witch of this fantasy world. Its your duty to save those good old friends. In addition to supporting the gameplay, story also sends the player on a rescue mission.

(story-based gameplay)

Story-line goes parallel with the evolving game elements.

(72 original levels)

Carefully balanced difficulty, tailored for player skills. Challenging levels far from boring yet not frustratingly hard.


Financal problems are main issue for independent game developers. Pop to Save has taken 9 months to design and develop without ANY investment. Development process was achievable without support so far, but the main issue is marketing without money. It is kinda hard to get to word out for an indie game in mobile markets (AppStore, Google Play etc.)

There are two main reasons why we need your help. First one is to provide financial support for new packages and levels, and another one is to provide marketing expenses.




  • Yasir YAZICI (Programmer)
  • Yunus AYYILDIZ (Game and Level Designer)
  • Giovanni Leon Dall'O' (Composer)





If you can't contribute for whatever reason, there are still other ways you could help out, such as:

  • Tell everybody else about this campaign
  • Don't forget to share this on Facebook, tweet about it on Twitter, share YouTube video, or post it on forums.  

Anything will help. Great thanks.


Feel free to send us an e-mail at ynggamebrain@gmail.com if you have any questions or just want to say hi!




CNhttps://itunes.apple.com/us/app/pop-to-save/id731968235

story:
Greetings! Welcome to the Vales of Ithilien IndieGoGo Campaign Page!

Allow me to introduce myself. My real name is Steve Foster. Most people know me as Timmourne Darkwater. Timmourne is a fictional character I have been playing in various Live Action Role Playing Games for 20+ years.

I am using this crowd funding platform to build my dream campsite in Pennsylvania. Take a moment to hear what I envision.

I would like to construct, run, and maintain a campsite tailored specifically to Fantasy and Medieval style campers, reenactors, foam combat groups, LARPs, SCAdians, Rennies, etc! A place where we can all go and enjoy the site without all of the mundane distractions so common to campsites these days!

That is the basic gist of things. If I have your attention and you would like to know more, please continue reading as I go into more detail.

What I am Trying to Create

I have been involved in Gaming since I was very young. I have always enjoyed Fantasy and Medieval settings the most. I have been involved with Foam Combat games for 20+ years now. My oldest child now takes the field as well. We have developed a passion for these games and want everyone to have a place to enjoy them.

I want to build a campsite that is very friendly to all forms of Live Action Gaming. A place where we can gather and battle without worrying about mundane intrusions into our temporary fantasy worlds. A place for LARPers to fully immerse themselves into their characters and not worry about the locals walking around the campsite drinking beer in t-shirts. A place where SCAdians can camp in period tents and not be next to a trailer. A place to hold a Ren Faire one week, then Boffer events the next. A place where Realms and Chapters can host large meetings and councils in a room not used for Bingo that same week. A place for the local SCA chapter to hold demos and practices and not be hidden behind a school or shopping mall.

I plan on building a site that incorporates the best of both worlds. Modern ammenities hidden behind a beautiful facade of realistic looking fantasy.

Why I am the one to do this

I am the owner of Foster Property Management, LLC in the mundane world. I renovate and run rental properties in the Greater Johstown PA area. I have a ton of experience in running a business, renovating old delapitated buildings, managing properties, maintaining grounds, and dealing with groups of diverse people. After nearly 10 years getting that business flowing smoothly, I decided to persue my dreams.

I have a varied realtionship with many different groups that can benefit from a site like this. I am a unit leader in Dagorhir (The Rangers of Ithilien), I am a Realm Admin for Maethodoron (Dagorhir Chapter), a am a Leathersmith (Darkwater Arms and Armor), I am the current manager of Britannia Faire (a medieval style campsite in Ohio), I am an avid volunteer for all the games and societies I get involved with (Medic, Herald, Feast Prep), and I am a camper myself.

I have been going to different campsites all over the country for the last 20+ years, and there are always things that bother me. The biggest being the mundane population standing around gawking. The second would have to be that many events are now hosted a RV/Trailer campsites. I personally would like to get back to the way I remember the first events, much more primitive camping without cars/RVs/Trailers/Mundanes everywhere. But I have to admit that as I get older, having running water, flushing toilets, and a shower is very nice to have around!

What this Campaign is supposed to achieve

This initial Funding project is to acquire the location and the basic supplies to get started. I would love to do this on my own, but unfortunately, life has thrown me some curves and I am looking for people to help me achieve this dream. If we can raise enough to acquire a suitable location, things begin to develop quickly after that. I have the energy and desire to build this wonderful property. The funding will provide the capital to purchase a suitable site, install basic infrastructure for our comfort, and get the ball rolling!

Having enough land to satisfy the needs of the site, being close enough to major highways and decent sized towns to satisfy campers needs, and geographically centering between larger populations of demographics are the biggest concerns I have faced. Having researched the Real Estate market in my immediate area, I have found several locations that will suit the purpose quite well.

I am currently exploring three indivdual sites:

Site 1 - Cambria County PA - Near Ebensburg - 100+ acres of an old Christmas tree farm. The site sits right off of a major highway with easy access to town. There is a Walmart 10 minutes away, as well as grocery stores and all the things modern people need. There is already Electric service to the site. The site is mostly flat, but is also partially wooded.

Site 2 - Fulton County PA - Near the MD border off of route 70. Site is 100+ acres and full wooded at this time. Terrain requires a bit more work, but is closer to the Metro areas of DC/Baltimore. This site is a bit removed from a major town with a Walmart etc. Site has yet to be perked for water/septic and has no power at this time.

Site 3 - Bedford County PA - 53 Acres of undeveloped land 20 minutes south of Bedford PA. This site was recommended by a local real estate agent and has not been site surveyed at all. The pics the agent provided are promising though and I will check it out later this week.

Site #1 is my preferred site, but much will depend on the timing and market upon completion of funding campaigns. Site #1 is also much closer to my family residence as well as local companies I will need to utilize for construction.

The scope of the fundraising is daunting to say the least!

The intial invesment of funds will go towards acquiring the land itself, building basic infrastructure, and getting the site to a state it can be easily utilized by many different groups. I will use the funds to get the property going, then I will use my own funds and financing to continue the operastions. I have excellent contacts with a local bank in the region that is willing to help so long as a basic beginning level is achieved.

Site maintenance will be handled by myself and my family year round. As much as I appreciate volunteers and the amazing work they can do, I cannot rely on them to keep a project of this magnitude running. I have formed some close relationships with contractors, builders, and tradesmen over the years in my property management business and will draw on their companies to do what is needed in a quick professional manner.

Once we are up and running, the major sources of income to maintain the site feasibility is the "Per Head" fee charged for camping, Camp Store Sales, and facility rental for special buildings and events. I have always liked the idea and practice of a "Pay per Attendance" model to allow the smaller organizations to utilize some of the same perks as the bigger groups.

Being directly involved with the site also allows me special time and energy to deal with specific desires of each individual organization. I know groups like the SCA need completely different things than a Vampire LARP, and I can tailor to each in kind.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know not everyone can help financially. But that doesn't mean you can't help! Take a few seconds to post a link, spread the word, or at the very least, attend an event at the site once we are

This is a flexible funding campaign.  All contributions received in the event we do not reach our goal will be used to improve an existing site, or escrowed until the final goal CAN be reached thru other campaigns.

I have excellent contacts with a local bank in the region that is willing to help so long as a basic beginning level is achieved.
Site maintenance will be handled by myself and my family year round. As much as I appreciate volunteers and the amazing work they can do, I cannot rely on them to keep a project of this magnitude running. I have formed some close relationships with contractors, builders, and tradesmen over the years in my property management business and will draw on their companies to do what is needed in a quick professional manner.
Once we are up and running, the major sources of income to maintain the site feasibility is the "Per Head" fee charged for camping, Camp Store Sales, and facility rental for special buildings and events. I have always liked the idea and practice of a "Pay per Attendance" model to allow the smaller organizations to utilize some of the same perks as the bigger groups.
Being directly involved with the site also allows me special time and energy to deal with specific desires of each individual organization. I know groups like the SCA need completely different things than a Vampire LARP, and I can tailor to each in kind.
Other Ways You Can Help
I know not everyone can help financially. But that doesn't mean you can't help! Take a few seconds to post a link, spread the word, or at the very least, attend an event at the site once we are

This is a flexible funding campaign.  All contributions received in the event we do not reach our goal will be used to improve an existing site, or escrowed until the final goal CAN be reached thru other campaigns.

story:
Short Summary

Hi this is Robert Dunkley, I began the design of a new Golf Board Game.

I am seeking people to contribute, so I can complete the game and bring it to market. When it is cold, or rainy outside families can have FUN playing the game. It requires knowledge and skill about golf's grand slam; the players who won it and the important events!

You the contributor will allow me to achieve a dream which many people told me couldn't be done!!!!!

As you can see it has begun and will be finished. I will not stop until the game is published.

 So I respectfully ask for your support for my game I know you are all very powerful individuals.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Funding is needed to complete the final design and make the initial run of the board game.

I will use the funds as follows:

1. Initial Production Run of 100 games

2. Finish final design

3. Set up my website and appear on HSN and QVC to market and show games to potential customers.

Partial funding will go to cover costs for the initial run of games to be used to market the game.

The Impact

Many people around the world play board games. They do it with family and friends on special occasions. My game is intended for those special family times when people get together, share and make memories!!!!!

Obviously we are a golfing family and there are 27 million golfers in America alone, so people love the game. This allows those who enjoy playing or just watching to spend time with dad or mom or sister or brother when golf is not possible outside.

This is my first board game design and I am having an awesome time learning about the game business. If successful I would like to adapt it to the digital game format down the road.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can contribute I will send a game to anyone who pledges $50 dollars, and anyone who contributes $5,000 I will send a game and a 1 night hotel stay at the Luxor in Las Vegas so they can play some more games!

If you can't contribute just spread the word and look for the board game online. Make some noise you all ROCK!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Please use Indiegogo share tool to tell friends, lets make tis go viral.

And that's all there is to it.
