story:
Note: Shipping dates for the physical items are TBA 2013. The PDF releases are also TBA 2013 but will be released ahead of the physical copies and sent to their respective contributors. 

At the end of this campaign we will start to add all of the ranks and thank you mentions to our website and books.

We will be shipping out our perks internationally, so don't hesitate to claim a perk even if you don't live in North America. We are also very willing to take suggestions if none of the perks available catch your interest.

Aetherium will feature art by the amazing artist Heavenwill. You can find his portfolio here.

I'm pleased to announce that our artist, Long "Heavenwill" Pham has just completed some T Shirt designs for The Iternus System and Aetherium funders! More details about how to get one of these sweet shirts coming soon!

 

Beyond raising the funds for this project, there is a reason much closer to our hearts at Xeni Games for why we've decided to launch this campaign.

As the Lead Creative Director at Xeni Games I desire to help people expand their imagination, and discover the beauty of creativity.

As someone who has always been involved in creative fields, there is nothing that I enjoy more than exploring my mind and the minds of others. Tabletop roleplaying games have always been a great source for sharing that same feeling with others.

I wanted to create a framework that was robust enough to provide a great base for gameplay even for those who are experienced players, but simple enough to allow players new to tabletop RPGs to join in without becoming overwhelmed by hundreds of pages of rules and content that they aren't familiar with or do not have the time to become involved in.

The resulting product was The Iternus System. A framework built to encourage players to use their imagination, as well as assisting them in unlocking the innate creativity within us all.

The Iternus System is built to stand out amongst the crowd by offering many intuitive yet easily managed mechanics to players and Game Masters:

  • Scalable Game Complexity - The Iternus System framework is robust enough to provide an entertaining session for experienced tabletop gamers, yet flexible enough to allow those new to tabletop gaming to ease into the ebb and flow of a campaign without being overwhelmed by too many unfamiliar mechanics. Scaling is handled by offering a range of different sets of mechanics. For example, if you want to run a campaign that is simplistic and only takes advantage of the barebones framework (simplistic determination of your health points, damage dealt while attacking NPCs, and discovering what's in your environment) that The Iternus System provides, we explain how to set up a game of this style. This set is generally suited for games that want to focus heavily around storytelling, or want to introduce new players to tabletop gaming. However, if you want to run a campaign that is more advanced where characters have detailed armor / weapon stats, attacking requires rolling for initiative depending on the situation you are in, and Tactics Mode has a statistic for each unit or a range of statistics that need to be compared for battles, we also provide that set in the framework book.

  • Template System - Built into the core of The Iternus System and its accompanying campaigns, the Template System not only allows but encourages expansion upon the base content provided. The template system is structured so that players can create their own additions that seamlessly plug into the 'canon' mythos.

  • Highly Customizable Skill Tree Structure - For those interested in an easily set up and easily run gaming session, creating your character's skill tree out of the preset content provided will be the best choice. For those interested in having a much more in-depth experience, we offer the ability to create your own skills and determine how they grow with your character.
  • Universal Character Persistence - With The Iternus System, players are not required to lock their characters down to a single campaign. Gaming Universes (such as Aetherium) are built to house all of the content for all future campaigns to be run within it. This allows player characters to persist, rather than having to create a new character to play a new campaign. The option to create new characters is always available, but for people who wish to keep using their characters after the completion of a campaign they can continue to do so.  
  • Unique Magic Framework - The Iternus System comes with two separate magic frameworks that can either be used in conjunction with each other or used separately as the sole frameworks for magic in a campaign. The first framework is the Fantasy Magic framework, and is based off of mechanics most people are familiar with, such as your character having a pool of mana and skills draw off of that pool of mana which regenerates over time and grows with your character. The second framework is the Realistic Magic framework that works quite differently than most mechanics people are used to. With the Realistic Magic framework, if you are a magically inclined user you are required to harvest your resources from the environment directly. The resources that are harvested can be stored within the character's body, or a receptacle designed to hold a finite amount of Magic Units, which all resources are converted into based on a dice roll. Depending on the actions you wish to perform and how you wish to perform them will determine how your Magic Units are depleted. The Realistic Magic framework allows for magic to be implemented into campaigns of any genre without being unnecessarily disruptive, and adds a new dimension to the environment.
  • Streamlined Economic Framework - Encourages players of all experience levels to venture into the busy world of being an entrepreneur.
  • Karma - Be rewarded for positive actions, or receive negative karma for disruptive and antagonistic actions. Karma affects the way the environment reacts to each player. Several players in the same area could experience different results based on their karma, opening up new possibilities for actions. Players with a negative karma play style may focus on preying on those with a positive karma play style to reap the rewards they discover out in the vast universe due to their mostly positive actions.
  • Tactics Mode - Tactics Mode allows players to seamlessly switch from their player character to controlling a squadron of units or even an entire army depending on the campaign at hand. Inspired by Real Time Strategy gaming, Tactics Mode allows players to interact with the world at hand on a much grander scale. Which side will win? How will you manage your units? Will an unsuspecting third party take advantage of two warring races distracting each other and attack both sides of the battlefield and end up victorious? Engage Tactics Mode and unlock your potential. 

Learn more about The Iternus System mechanics by reading the Basic Preview at the following links:

The Iternus System Basic Mechanics Preview (Featuring Aetherium) Part One

The Iternus System Basic Mechanics Preview (Featuring Aetherium) Part Two

Aetherium showcases the wide range of possibilities that The Iternus System provides for an entertaining gaming session. 

Built off of The Iternus System framework, Aetherium is an entire gaming universe. The initial content released with Aetherium will cover the basic details of the universe, such as the galaxies, the species that live within those galaxies, and will include several scenarios to start your own campaigns with.

Our dream is to continue releasing unique content for the Aetherium universe after we have this first edition released to the public. You can expect to see campaigns focused around specific species in Aetherium, specific planets or cities within Aetherium, and much more.

Aetherium is a space opera themed universe.

  • Explore the vast reaches of space.
  • Venture through the four galaxies of known sentient space.
  • Encounter mysterious and unusual space anomalies.
  • Play as or interact with over 15 species included with the base universe. 

Don't want to play as any of the provided races?

With the Template System you can create your own playable or additional NPC races!

You can also create: 

  • Anomalies 
  • Vehicles 
  • Whole galaxies brimming with life and activity!

Want to become a space-faring entrepreneur? With the economic model provided by The Iternus System you can:

  • Create your own corporation 
  • Take out a loan to help with the startup.
  • Sell Goods and Services to your fellow players or NPCs

Play during a Warring Era and command a militia with your friends.

  • Go to War with your fellow players.
  • Team Up against NPC races!
  • Engage Tactics Mode and play as one of the many technologically superior races with millions of troops to be thrown into battle!

How will the Post-War Universe be changed?

The Universe is yours for the taking in Tactics Mode.

Has your interest been piqued? Follow the links to read excerpts from Aetherium. 

  • The Aetherius Galaxy
  • The Mie System
  • The Tein System
  • Device Field Anomaly
  • Campaign Suggestions for Game Masters

 

The money raised through this campaign will go directly towards producing, developing and publishing The Iternus System and Aetherium. A majority of the funds raised will be invested in hiring artists, the printing costs for the perks we are offering our funders, and any other projected related expenses that may arise. 

We have big dreams, and we hope to convey them to you through our final product.

By funding this campaign you will be playing a significant role in the birth of a company that wishes to foster creativity and imagination in people all over the world.

Should we reach our goal, any additional money raised will go towards hiring additional artists, unlocking our stretch goals, and to the author. 

 

You can help by spreading the word!

  • Like and share us on Facebook! 
  • Follow and tweet about us on Twitter!
  • Print and hand out flyers to friends and family!
  • Do you run a blog? Writing up an article about our campaign would be extremely helpful and heavily appreciated!
  • Got a question not answered here? You can contact us at XeniGames at gmail dot com with any inquiries you may have.
story_txt:
Note: Shipping dates for the physical items are TBA 2013. The PDF releases are also TBA 2013 but will be released ahead of the physical copies and sent to their respective contributors. 
At the end of this campaign we will start to add all of the ranks and thank you mentions to our website and books.
We will be shipping out our perks internationally, so don't hesitate to claim a perk even if you don't live in North America. We are also very willing to take suggestions if none of the perks available catch your interest.
Aetherium will feature art by the amazing artist Heavenwill. You can find his portfolio here.
I'm pleased to announce that our artist, Long "Heavenwill" Pham has just completed some T Shirt designs for The Iternus System and Aetherium funders! More details about how to get one of these sweet shirts coming soon!



 

Beyond raising the funds for this project, there is a reason much closer to our hearts at Xeni Games for why we've decided to launch this campaign.
As the Lead Creative Director at Xeni Games I desire to help people expand their imagination, and discover the beauty of creativity. 
As someone who has always been involved in creative fields, there is nothing that I enjoy more than exploring my mind and the minds of others. Tabletop roleplaying games have always been a great source for sharing that same feeling with others.
I wanted to create a framework that was robust enough to provide a great base for gameplay even for those who are experienced players, but simple enough to allow players new to tabletop RPGs to join in without becoming overwhelmed by hundreds of pages of rules and content that they aren't familiar with or do not have the time to become involved in.

The resulting product was The Iternus System. A framework built to encourage players to use their imagination, as well as assisting them in unlocking the innate creativity within us all.
The Iternus System is built to stand out amongst the crowd by offering many intuitive yet easily managed mechanics to players and Game Masters:


Scalable Game Complexity - The Iternus System framework is robust enough to provide an entertaining session for experienced tabletop gamers, yet flexible enough to allow those new to tabletop gaming to ease into the ebb and flow of a campaign without being overwhelmed by too many unfamiliar mechanics. Scaling is handled by offering a range of different sets of mechanics. For example, if you want to run a campaign that is simplistic and only takes advantage of the barebones framework (simplistic determination of your health points, damage dealt while attacking NPCs, and discovering what's in your environment) that The Iternus System provides, we explain how to set up a game of this style. This set is generally suited for games that want to focus heavily around storytelling, or want to introduce new players to tabletop gaming. However, if you want to run a campaign that is more advanced where characters have detailed armor / weapon stats, attacking requires rolling for initiative depending on the situation you are in, and Tactics Mode has a statistic for each unit or a range of statistics that need to be compared for battles, we also provide that set in the framework book.

Template System - Built into the core of The Iternus System and its accompanying campaigns, the Template System not only allows but encourages expansion upon the base content provided. The template system is structured so that players can create their own additions that seamlessly plug into the 'canon' mythos.


Highly Customizable Skill Tree Structure - For those interested in an easily set up and easily run gaming session, creating your character's skill tree out of the preset content provided will be the best choice. For those interested in having a much more in-depth experience, we offer the ability to create your own skills and determine how they grow with your character.



Universal Character Persistence - With The Iternus System, players are not required to lock their characters down to a single campaign. Gaming Universes (such as Aetherium) are built to house all of the content for all future campaigns to be run within it. This allows player characters to persist, rather than having to create a new character to play a new campaign. The option to create new characters is always available, but for people who wish to keep using their characters after the completion of a campaign they can continue to do so.  



Unique Magic Framework - The Iternus System comes with two separate magic frameworks that can either be used in conjunction with each other or used separately as the sole frameworks for magic in a campaign. The first framework is the Fantasy Magic framework, and is based off of mechanics most people are familiar with, such as your character having a pool of mana and skills draw off of that pool of mana which regenerates over time and grows with your character. The second framework is the Realistic Magic framework that works quite differently than most mechanics people are used to. With the Realistic Magic framework, if you are a magically inclined user you are required to harvest your resources from the environment directly. The resources that are harvested can be stored within the character's body, or a receptacle designed to hold a finite amount of Magic Units, which all resources are converted into based on a dice roll. Depending on the actions you wish to perform and how you wish to perform them will determine how your Magic Units are depleted. The Realistic Magic framework allows for magic to be implemented into campaigns of any genre without being unnecessarily disruptive, and adds a new dimension to the environment.



Streamlined Economic Framework - Encourages players of all experience levels to venture into the busy world of being an entrepreneur.



Karma - Be rewarded for positive actions, or receive negative karma for disruptive and antagonistic actions. Karma affects the way the environment reacts to each player. Several players in the same area could experience different results based on their karma, opening up new possibilities for actions. Players with a negative karma play style may focus on preying on those with a positive karma play style to reap the rewards they discover out in the vast universe due to their mostly positive actions.



Tactics Mode - Tactics Mode allows players to seamlessly switch from their player character to controlling a squadron of units or even an entire army depending on the campaign at hand. Inspired by Real Time Strategy gaming, Tactics Mode allows players to interact with the world at hand on a much grander scale. Which side will win? How will you manage your units? Will an unsuspecting third party take advantage of two warring races distracting each other and attack both sides of the battlefield and end up victorious? Engage Tactics Mode and unlock your potential. 

Learn more about The Iternus System mechanics by reading the Basic Preview at the following links:
The Iternus System Basic Mechanics Preview (Featuring Aetherium) Part One
The Iternus System Basic Mechanics Preview (Featuring Aetherium) Part Two

Aetherium showcases the wide range of possibilities that The Iternus System provides for an entertaining gaming session. 
Built off of The Iternus System framework, Aetherium is an entire gaming universe. The initial content released with Aetherium will cover the basic details of the universe, such as the galaxies, the species that live within those galaxies, and will include several scenarios to start your own campaigns with.
Our dream is to continue releasing unique content for the Aetherium universe after we have this first edition released to the public. You can expect to see campaigns focused around specific species in Aetherium, specific planets or cities within Aetherium, and much more.
Aetherium is a space opera themed universe.

We have big dreams, and we hope to convey them to you through our final product.

story:
Short Summary

I am Josh and I am a computer science college graduate who has hit hard times. I want to make a major career comeback by launching my own operations / company(valor.creations) making game apps, and apps for the iPad, iPhone and possibly Andriod and PC. I have a passion for making apps! I currently specialize in the iPhone/iPad platforms.

This campaign is to help me make a comeback from the hardships I have encountered and to give my dream in creating valor.creations a starting boost so that I can bring creative apps to the world with my own operations / business.

You will be helping me to do what I love. You will be helping me bring new creative and entertaining app products to the world. You will help me fufill my core foundational model and motto "hopes.dreams.makingThemReality". Please help make my hopes and dreams a reality to help me also fufil this motto for others through the avenue of making apps that are useful and entertaining to them.

What We Need & What You Get

To get this off the ground I need funding, for equipment like a good dev pc, and good mobile devices to test on like iPhone 5, iPad Mini and iPad, art resources to make the apps visually stunning, finding more developers to help, devlopment cost rates for team memebers, helping to launch the business, marketing...etc

You will first hand get to share in the excitment of the creative apps to come, the perks are designed for you all to get a peace of the dream!

If I don't reach my goal any thing contributed will be of great help! Any amount will help in going towards my dream of launching my own operations

The Impact

Want to see a new, creative and innovative app developer reach the vast and popular mobile app market? Please invest, we can watch how my operations will grow into something that will reach many.

With the movtivation I have based on the hardships of the past, I'm now determined more than ever to reach my dreams and to become a contending app software developer bringing great products to the world.

Can you relate to a situation like mine? Will you help me make a comeback and just watch and see how I will launch a succesful operation that will become a major player in the mobile app world bringing wonderful products to many people =)

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't support financially, please share this with as many people as you can. Thank you for taking the time to read about my campaign!

 

Updates

11/2/12 -We are at $35 right now, I am greatful for your donations so far. Please keep them coming! I'm currently working on a couple app projects right now. One of my own and one for a client on elance. I should have the one on elance finished in a few days, but I love the design I have so far and can show you guys picturea soon. Still need your help with donations, please keep them coming =)

story:
The Main Goal and Cause

My friend Nate and I are avid gamers and believe we have wonderful content to share with the world in the form of our Youtube and twitch channels. We would like to produce that content with proper hardware and the latest software available. In order to do so we decided to start a fundraising campaign that would not only benifit our newly created media channel, but to donate 50% of the funds raised directly to the Relay for Life Foundation/ American Cancer Society to further fund vital research. The battle against cancer  takes place in thousands of households across Michigan. We would like to do our part in helping  research find a cure. For those choosing not  to spilt half of their donation to our Media Channel we will offer 100% donations to the foundation upon request sent to this E-mail: muffinchopmedia@gmail.com

  • Raise money to fund our funny and creative outlets broadcasted to you!
  • Fund amazing progress towards finding a cure and fighting cancer!
  • Every Dollar Counts! Dollars add up and the more we make the more we donate back!

Thank you all so much for your support,

Sincerely, 

Tom and Nate of MuffinChopMedia

Benefits of Donating!

Donating money is simple, but what do you get out of it?

  • We have a target goal of $2,000 overall. $1,000 will fund the necessary start up costs of running a successful channel. $1,000 will go directly to ACS and Miracle League!
  • If we raise higher than the target goal the % we donate goes up!

TARGETS TO REACH:

  • $4,000-$8,000: 55% of the funds go to Charity!
  • $8,001-$15,000: 65% of the funds go to Charity!
  • $15,000-$20,000: 70% of the funds go to Charity!
  • $20,000+: 80% of the funds go to Charity!

The Impact

Everyone involved in this campaign has had a family member or a close friend  who've been diagnosed with and treated for cancer. We want to help find a cure and help them in anyway we can. 

Miracle League is a cause close to our hearts. It allows developmentally challenged youth to experience the joy, camaraderie, and passion that is baseball!

As a bonus we will offer specific Perk levels that you can donate towards a charity of your choice without us collecting any of the donation:

  • The Buck: Simple $1 donation. Every bit helps!
  • Take a look at the list of perks and see which one suits you! 
  • Or choose to donate a specific amount of money to a charity of your choice! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Quick Links to share and contribute if you dont want to donate! Get Involved!

Miracle League: 

Relay for Life: http://www.relayforlife.org/getinvolved/

Our Facebook:  http://www.facebook.com/Muffinchop

Our Twitter: http://twitter.com/muffinchopmedia

Our Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/muffinchop (Stay tuned for fundraiser streams!) 

We will post daily updates about the fundraiser until the last minute! 

Thank you all so much for taking the time to view our campaign! 

Stay strong MuffinNation.

story:
Download game

Do you want to see what is it about? Download and play current dev version of the game. It is playable but not finished, please remember that.

Download Murnatan here

Why this campaign?

After 4+ years of development, we run out of money. We did everything that we could but now it is up to you. If you want to play a finished game then please support us.

Otherwise, the development of this game must be paused.

About game

Game website: www.murnatan.com
Game forum: forum.murnatan.com

Murnatan is online team multiplayer 3D FPS combined with RTS. In short: the team of aliens fighting against the team of humans. 

But it is not just shooting for score. If you will camp and kill millions of enemies then you will still lose. You have to destroy enemy spawns and then kill all enemies. But they can build new spawns and not only spawns but many other things.

Each team is totally different. Humans using long-range weapons and they can buy better weapons in Armoury (that is also buildable structure). But Aliens using melee attacks, traps, debuffs, poisons, they can evolve to better aliens and some of them can walk on walls and ceilings.

For more information visit the Steam page (download link) or just try the game.

BTW, try to sniff and taunt with different aliens to provoke humans.

About author

I love games. I played them on Arcade Machines, C64, Amiga 600, Amiga 1200, PSX, PC, and PS4. And one time I discovered the game with name Tremulous. Action multiplayer game with aliens vs humans. There players building bases during the game. Amazing thing. I created maps, developed modified server, created three server mods and we become a bunch of good players with many unforgettable stories in the game (hi!). 

But Tremulous died. Old engine, no maintenance... There was no similar game and I decided to resurrect it. To create the complete game from scratch with the new engine but with the same gameplay. 

I got the small team together and we started. We created some ideas, concepts and went to Kickstarter. Of course, we failed - no product, unknown team, almost no community. But I stated even before that if Kickstarter will fail then development will still continue somewhat.

I got a job. The team was working on Murnatan and I was working in a different job and at evening I continued working on Murnatan too. I spent all my salary to our team. But it is not possible to do this all time (4+ years) and now I can't continue like that. So our last chance how to finish this game is this campaign. 

We are in similar situation like on Kickstarter before. But there are two differences. First, we already have the working product, Murnatan game. Second, this time if this campaign will not succeed then development will not continue. 

Now it is really up to you. If you want to have finished game, please support us and tell about it everywhere. 

What we need

Well, we need only money. All that time it was only about one damned thing and that is money. With enough money, we would have finished the game after 2 years of development.

What needs to be done

Mostly:

  • Admin system (Admin accounts, Server owners, Moderators, Ability to block accounts, etc.)
  • In-Game shop
  • Mod support
  • Capella section
  • More maps
  • Theme maps (Story maps)
  • Overhauled UI
  • Variable building system
  • Achievements
  • Trade cards
  • Complete server administration
  • Various game mods
  • and more...

Rewards

Some rewards will be delivered later - coupons to in-game shop, skins or credit records in a book because the store and the book are not yet finished.

VIP status

Later you will be able to buy limited VIP status from the in-game shop and it will be time-limited. VIP will unlock your full game and other things (kick prevention from non-VIPs, possible to play on servers only for VIP etc.). 

The current version of the game is not limited at all, but that can change later.

Risks & challenges

There is only one risk. If we don't get the requested money = the game will remain in the current state.

There are no other risks.

Challenges? Yes, there are some challenges because of Unreal Engine 4 - that engine can create many challenges like hearing sounds through walls or weapons clipping into walls but that is a small problem compared to everything else.

Other ways you can help

There are two ways how you can also help:

1) Share this campaign with others.

2) Play this game, create own public stable servers and have fun!

There is only one risk. If we don't get the requested money = the game will remain in the current state.
There are no other risks.
Challenges? Yes, there are some challenges because of Unreal Engine 4 - that engine can create many challenges like hearing sounds through walls or weapons clipping into walls but that is a small problem compared to everything else.


Other ways you can help
There are two ways how you can also help:
1) Share this campaign with others.
2) Play this game, create own public stable servers and have fun!

story:
Attention all gamers, environmentalists, animal lovers…and everyone who wants to make a difference! Here is the role-playing game which you will feel proud to contribute.

The bushfires devastating communities all around Australia have made global headlines.  With everyone globally wanting to help in some way, My partner Alexandria and I thought about how we could use my skills as a Software Engineer. While working at my day job, and also on another game, I had an idea: imagine a game where the action isn’t about shooting everything, but about saving people and property from devastation against fire, I have put all my other projects on hold and working on to make this game possible, with all your great support.

Growing up, we all have dreams and huge aspirations…the sky's the limit!

As a child…I dreamed of becoming an actor!  As a teenager…I was set on achieving my dream as a patriotic "Fighter Pilot"…The opportunities were endless…and very exciting!

Ultimately, I am proud to say that my career as a Software Engineer has been rewarding and an amazing stepping stone in helping me evolve in my career and as a person!  Having a strong passion for drawing sketches in my childhood and receiving award recognitions for them in my academic education greatly fascinated my interest in the creative aspect of games!

Forget guns and shooting games… I'm super excited to create a game where our everyday unsung heroes…our firefighters are in the center of the action…actively saving people, animals, properties, and our beautiful forests from the devastating fires…fighting to protect others in need.

This game is designed for release on all platforms and is a fresh take on how a game can be exciting, challenging and rewarding. It's about saving people - not killing them, but will have amazing challenges as similar or more than any action role-playing game.  The development has begun, with early gameplay under construction. I have prioritized the development of this game and have paused other projects, so this can start having an impact as soon as possible.

The plan is to contribute a portion of the revenue generated by game sales to Australian firefighting organizations including the CFA and RFS. I want to help in a way that I can! The goal here isn't to use Indiegogo as a fundraising platform, but to reach out to passionate gamers globally and create ongoing revenue to support our firefighters too.

Previously, I have released a few free games on Android. One of them had 250K+ downloads!  This motivated me to create bigger games!  With your support, I am hopeful to release the next one on the target launch day in June 2020!

The game will be done within the mentioned delivery timelines and your support will definitely help in achieving the goal!  The game is based on life's challenges and risks…so I am ready for this challenge…and appreciate your support! 

 

I am confident, that together we will achieve great gameplay in this game, the game which you will always love and be proud to support. The roadmaps and communication channels will be open at all times, in order to keep track of the progress. If for any unforeseen reason I am not able to complete this game, I will refund the money!  Alternatively, I will provide you the option to swap the same with the copy of my other games with all rewards mentioned here!  I thank you for your consideration, likes, and shares. 

 

Game Mechanics Updates as on 9th March (Beta Stage)

 

Reviews

Mr. Michael, I met on twitter wrote a great review for this game, it is not a paid one honestly: https://www.surrealvalecity.com/indiegogo-fire-...

I thank Mr. Michael from deep of my heart.

 

I am proud to have a great "Fire Fighter" himself backed us, got to know from his message. So proud, thanks to Mr. Mike (18th February 2020)

 

Additional Information

story:
Here's What I'm Asking For

I'm making a video game called "The United Space of America." It's about an alternate version of the US being blown off of the Earth by an alien force and the President of the United States putting it back together by fighting the aliens with a cannon mounted on his shoulder. I'm well underway in my production and have just released demos on STEAM and itch.io platforms, but I need a couple of instruments and a piece of equipment to finish the music.

  • I'm Mark. I'm a budding video game developer and seasoned musician. I'm passionate about gaming and the culture around it. One day, a friend of mine asked, "If you were to make your own game, what would it be?" I answered in full detail without missing a beat. This is something I've always wanted to do, but I didn't know anything about coding or game design (still learning.) At that moment, I decided to teach myself and a year later, here I am.
  • This campaign is an attempt to get a modest amount of funding to purchase my own guitar, bass and audio interface. 
  • I know what you're thinking, "But Mark, if you're such a seasoned musician, why don't you already have those things?" That is a good question. Over the years, I've started to wane on my direction as an artist. I knew that I loved making music, but couldn't find motivation to make new music, so I sold my guitars. I still have an audio interface, but it's very old and on the fritz. When I started making USoA, my fire to create music was hotter than ever! I wanted to make music for video games. That's what I've always wanted, but now I know that I want to make games, too! Unfortunately, due to recent circumstances, I'm not in a financial position to purchase these things on my own. I'm very fortunate to have friends that let me borrow their equipment, but I'd love to have my own, again. I want nothing more than to make this and many other games and a big part of that is having the ability to compose and perform the music for this and future projects. If you think you can help, I'd like to make it worth your while in my own way.

 

I'm Looking for a Guitar, a Bass and an Audio Interface.

Here's the breakdown:

  • I need $350 for a guitar, $250 for a bass and $100 for an audio interface (though the last part is the least important.)
  • As a thanks for helping me out, I have a variety of donation incentives ranging from a mention in the credits of USoA, a personalized picture of me, shirtless on a bed writing in my diary, to becoming a character in game complete with a pixelated version of yourself.
  • If $250 or less is reached, that will go toward a purchase of a bass. If $600 or less is reached, I will purchase a guitar and bass. If raise the full $700, I'll acquire all three. If anything beyond that goal is reached, that will appreciate the value of the equipment I choose to purchase.

I Really Appreciate Anything You Can Do

  • Making this game has changed my life. I have a new drive in me that I haven't felt in a very long time.
  • I'll admit, I've never finished a game before, but this is my first one, and we're doing pretty well, so far. We're getting very close to being at 100% complete.
  • If you'd get a kick out of being a part of an official video game being released on a reputable platform that's about America getting blowed off the Earth and a fictional President based on yours truly putting it back together, you're in the right place.

Risks

I'm going to be honest with you, I think there's little doubt that I'll finish this game, but the quality of the end product is at stake.

  • The worst case scenario is how long it takes to complete the game and the donation incentives. It might be a while.
  • That being said, I'm not asking for that much, so I don't anticipate many donations, so keeping up shouldn't be a problem. The game itself is months away from completion.

If You Can't Donate

Here's some ways you can help:

  • Just interact with  me on social media. Spread the word about USoA and my campaign.
  • If you're a STEAM user, write a review for The United SPACE of America. Follow me on twitter, add the Fractured Earth page on FB. Anything you can do would be very appreciated!
  • https://twitter.com/_FracturedEarth
  • https://www.facebook.com/FracturedEarth
  • https://store.steampowered.com/app/1312420/The_...

Thanks!

If you're a STEAM user, write a review for The United SPACE of America. Follow me on twitter, add the Fractured Earth page on FB. Anything you can do would be very appreciated!
https://twitter.com/_FracturedEarth
https://www.facebook.com/FracturedEarth
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1312420/The_...

Thanks!

story:
Mana pools from MGT would be analogous to faiths or mythologies, for example ✝ power would be redemption, sacrifice, humility with a polar opposite of divine retribution, invincibility, wrath of God... you can see how these powers could be represented in card abilities. As an example, Tupac, drawing from the messianic power pool, would start with abilities to increase positive power of other cards, heal hitpoints, amplify abilities and such, the more damage taken the closer he would come to ability to call God's wrath causing mass insta-kills of opponent's cards or resurrection or invincibility. Nyarlahotep as Snoop Dogg would have powers of subterfuge, stealing opponent cards, when damaged heavily could cause madness in an enemy card causing that card to attack his/her allies. GZA would have technology powers, killer robots etc., the possibilities are only as limited as the imagination of the creators.

Now, take those possibilities and give them to the people. A card designer, where users can create their own custom artwork for each character, choose their own abilities, select the associated faiths/mythologies, and the cards that get the most upvotes are selected for official decks and balanced by either a panel or some kind of AI.

Turn all of this into a game playable from cellphones and you can add music from each character on play or card 'turn'. People can select their decks based on their favorite artists and have rap battles alongside play. And with drill-down info there could be bios and history for each character.

now a stupid cartoon from our sponsors...


Hey look, it's the Dungeons and Dragonz ride!

What's that? "I'm KRS ONE, the manifestation of study, not money."

DOPE!

Hauk, who goes yonder?
It is I, sire, Richard of Nottingham
Well, speak up man, what is it?
News from the east, sire, Rick the Ruler has returned!

"Stupid HoE!" "La Di Da Di my pretty!" "Hotline Bling!"

What's going on? [a HAZE of KUSH CLOUD encircles the caddy...] "I won't deny it, I'm a straight ridah"

"Floatin off of that kush cloud" "Enter a new dimension Can't you feel the tension?" "Drop it like it's hot!"

"Keep ya head up, ooh, child
Things are gonna get easier
Keep ya head up, ooh, child
Things'll get brighter"

WUF WUF!

"Lookin' for these better days
Better days, hey, better days
Got me thinking 'bout better days
Better days, better days, better days
Hey, better days
Got me thinking 'bout better days"

"Yeah, what up, this is Dr. Dre. The party's goin' on."

"Who the hell is this?Paging meat 5:46
In the morning, crack of dawn and
Now I'm yawning,wipe the cold out my eye
See who's this paging me and why?"

"Now you can tell from my everday fits I ain't rich
So cease and desist with them tricks"

"Hate to sound sleazy, but tease me
I don't want it if it's that easy"

"Straight off the f--king streets of C-P-T
King of the beats you ride to em in your Fleet"

"I got a TEC-9 now his smokin' a-- is mine"

"Keep their heads ringin'. RING DING DONG!"

"Hol up, we dem boyz
Hol up, we dem boyz
Hol up, hol up, hol up, we makin' noise Hol up
Hol up, hol up, hol up hol up"

"Once upon a time in the LBC
Santa came up missing, he was sitting by a tree
His reindeers were near but their leader wouldn't lead
So I took the lead, now as we proceed"

"Oh my god, I’m on the chase,Chevy
It's gettin’ kinda heavy, relevant, sellin’ it
Dippin’ away, time keeps slippin’ away
Zip in the safe, flippin’ for pay"

"Tell ya the truth, I swoop in the Coupe
I used to sell loot, I used to shoot hoops
But now I, make, hits, every single day
With, that nigga, the diggy Dr. Dre"

"I'm 'round the bullshit like a matador
I’m used to the bullshit, it don’t matter boy
Corporate acquisitions, accumulations of wealth
Build with the gods and double knowledge of self"

"I don't know what you heard about me
But a b---- can't get a dollar out of me
No Cadillac, no perms, you can't see
That I'm a mother---ing P-I-M-P"

"Name callin' hasn't fallen into what I'm runnin'
I wouldn't diss another sista unless she had it comin'
Name callin' hasn't fallen into what I'm runnin'
I wouldn't diss another sista unless she had it comin'"

"Instinct leads me to another flow
Every time I hear a brother call a girl a bitch or a ho
Trying to make a sister feel low
You know all of that gots to go"

"Gonna blast squeeze first ask questions last
That's how most of these so-called gangsters pass
At last, a nigga rappin bout blunts and broads
Tits and bras, ménage à trois, sex in expensive cars"

"Now every place that we go, they say we can't smoke
But we do it anyway, cause real G's smoke when they want
When they say turn down, we turn up and turn up some mo'
When they say put it out, it's too loud, We burn up some mo'"

"Gold rollie on my arm, ten rings like a don
Cuban links in my chain, Zigzag on my charm
Champagne on ice, good weed in the jar
Everything Hermes, Chanel seats in the car"

"Come with me!
Hail Mary, nigga, run quick, see
What do we have here now?
Do you wanna ride or die?"

"Yeah, uh-huh
They don't do it how we do
Niggas ain’t on the shit we on (we on, we on)
Everything new"

"Hello Good, morning tell me what the lip read;
Pretty face, thin waist with the sick weave
First time fish tailing in the 6 speed
Real bad boy tell em come and get me"

"I see death around the corner, gotta stay high while I survive
In the city where the skinny niggas die
If they bury me, bury me as a G nigga, no need to worry
I expect retaliation in a hurry"

"Chop it like sumo
Nigga hungry like Cujo
Smoking that Pluto
No ticking time like hand on the rope"

"I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man
I'm the man, I'm the man, I'm the man"

"I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see"

"Who shot ya? Separate the weak from the obsolete
Hard to creep them Brooklyn streets
It's on, nigga, fuck all that bickering beef
I can hear sweat trickling down your cheek"

"Old school/new school need to learn though
I burn, baby, burn like "Disco Inferno"
Burn slow like blunts with yayo
Peel more skins than Idaho Potato"

"Yeah, all the homies that I ain't talk to in a while
I'mma send this one out for y'all, knahmean?
Cause I ain't mad at 'cha
Heard y'all tearin' up shit out there, kickin' up dust
Givin' a motherfuck
Yeah, niggas
Cause I ain't mad at 'cha"

"California knows how to party
California knows how to party (Yes, they do)
In the city of L.A
In the city of good ol' Watts
In the city, the city of Compton
We keep it rockin'"

"I'm representing for them gangstas all across the world
Still hittin' them corners in them lo-lo's, girl
(Still taking my time to perfect the beat
And I still got love for the streets, it's the D-R-E)"
Looks like my ride is here. Catch ya on the flipside. Here, take these headphones, [Beats By Dre]

  • Clear highs and deep lows for premium sound quality
  • Rotating earcups to hear the sound around you
  • Durable housing and cushioned headband for long hours in the studio
  • Share what you're hearing through dual audio ports with DaisyChain™ connection
  • Take calls and control music with RemoteTalk™ cable*
  • (*Compatible with iOS devices. Functionality may vary by device.)

OUTLAWZ!!!

WESTSIDE!!!!

"I'm representing for them gangstas all across the worldStill hittin' them corners in them lo-lo's, girl(Still taking my time to perfect the beatAnd I still got love for the streets, it's the D-R-E)"Looks like my ride is here. Catch ya on the flipside. Here, take these headphones, [Beats By Dre]

Clear highs and deep lows for premium sound quality
Rotating earcups to hear the sound around you
Durable housing and cushioned headband for long hours in the studio
Share what you're hearing through dual audio ports with DaisyChain™ connection
Take calls and control music with RemoteTalk™ cable*
(*Compatible with iOS devices. Functionality may vary by device.)


OUTLAWZ!!!
WESTSIDE!!!!

story:
The final game will have a huge handcrafted city to explore, filled with hundreds of opportunities to speak to the city's inhabitants. You'll be able to learn one of at least a dozen languages. 

The full version of the game will support Arabic, Mandarin, Russian, Japanese, Spanish, German and French. These languages will have voice recordings and apart from teaching people who can speak English these languages, you'll also be able to learn English in each of the chosen languages.

There are also a few dozen languages that have been translated by the community. I can't vouch for the fact that they'll be 100% correct or 100% accurate, but right now the community has added at least some translations for: Ainu, Arabic,Basque, Bengali, Bulgarian,Catalan ,Chinese (Simplified Mandarin), Croatian, Czech,Danish, Dutch, Esperanto, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Norwegian, Persian (Iranian), Polish, Portuguese (BR), Portuguese (PT), Romanian, Russian, Scots,Slovak,Slovene,Spanish,Sranan Tongo, Swedish, Turkish and Vietnamese.

Want to know more? You can keep up to date with twitter, facebook and the mailing list. There's also a discord.

 

There are a few ways to learn words in the game

  • You can click on objects in the environment to learn the word for them.
  • Whenever you talk to one of the city's inhabitants you'll be able to learn a word by guessing it from a list or by solving a riddle.
  • The city's inhabitants will also comment on the weather as you walk past. So if you want to learn how to say "It's snowing" (for example), then this is the way to go.

By clicking on a tree, the player learns the word for it.

The pictures give you clues to guess the word in red. In this case, "bird".

Words you know will appear purple when talking to people in the game. By moving your mouse over these words you'll be able to see its translation. The more words you know, the more you'll understand and begin to feel at home in this strange city.

The words you know are purple and can be translated

By being continuously confronted with the language you'll also internalise the word order and keep the words you know fresh in your memory. The game can display both the romanised version of languages with different scripts as well as the native scripts.

 

 Three of the five planned city districts are currently in a near final state. They all have a unique look and their own words to teach you. The size of the city in the final version of the game also depends on the Kickstarter, some pledges will result in new buildings or areas.

  • If fifty people back the Animal Lover reward, a zoo will be added to the game. You'll be able to learn the words for dozens of animals by clicking on them.
  • If fifty people back the Paying Respect reward, a graveyard will be added to the game. Statues of the deceased will teach you adjectives, i.e "Here lies Alexander the great".
  • If twenty five people back the Parent reward, kindergartens will be added to the city, children will use see-saws and swings and liven up the city with their playful ways.
  • Finally, if 1 backer is found for the Royalty reward, a palace will be added to the city. You'll be able to explore the palace from the inside and learn many new words.

All the backers listed above and those who back as Citizens  will have access to the game immediately and leading up to the game's release (which is currently scheduled for August 2018). Several new versions of the game will be available to you per month. You'll be able to watch the city grow and evolve as I work on the game and constructions sites will gradually make way for finished buildings.

 

Throughout the city, various street musicians will beguile you with their songs. This was my solution to play music in the game, they'll often be near important characters, luring you to their location

Some of the talented musicians you'll be able to meet.

 

I often feel bad for playing video games. They can take dozens of hours to complete and that's time I could've spent learning a valuable skill.

I also believe that games can be a great way to teach people various skills. I loathed the time I had to spend learning in school and would have been tremendously excited at the prospect of playing a game like Lingotopia.

I began searching for a game that allows me to learn a language while playing, thereby absolving my guilty conscience. To my surprise there were no games out there like Lingotopia. So I set out to create my own language learning game. A game set in a beautiful city, with an uplifting story, many unique characters to meet and hundreds of words to learn.

 

I've been developing the game in my spare time throughout 2017.  Thanks to a successful Kickstarter campaign in January 2018 I'm now able to work on the game full time! But the more support I get, the better the game will end up being.

Right now I'm busy adding more content to the game: Expanding the city and creating many more characters to talk to. You'll  be able to learn hundreds of words by exploring a huge city. By supporting me you can either pre-order the game when it's released in August 2018. Or, by backing at the Citizen tier or above, you'll be able to join in on the fun now, by getting access to the unfinished version of the game immediately. I'm sure you'll be able to learn a lot!

 

My name is Tristan and I'm the developer of Lingotopia. Apart from some help with the art direction at the beginning of the project and with the music, I've been developing the game all on my own.

My career in game development has been short and sweet so far. I started out as an intern on the wonderful Expedition simulator, "The Curious Expedition". While working on the puzzle game "Slayaway Camp", I began making my own, smaller, more experimental games, like "One Show Only" and "Tumbling Home". Lingotopia is my first foray into language learning and I'd love to keep going in this direction, as long as the game is well received of course.

Music for the game has so far been provided by my dear friend Tobias Junge and wonderful wife Mariella Ziegenhagen. As more bands join the city's ensemble cast of musicians more songs by these two and potentially by others will be added to the game.

Art direction for the game has also been provided by Ludovicus Gees Aryo Herwastho, who played a huge role in establishing Lingotopia's unique look

I am also tremendously thankful to the wonderful people that have added translations to the game so far! Without them, the game wouldn't have made it this far <3

Risks and challenges

I've overcome the majority of the technical hurdles already. There will also be no physical rewards that require shipping. 
It's always possible to underestimate the time it takes to make a game but I will do my very best to meet all deadlines on time.

story:
Eerie Games is a small studio made up of a handful of passionate developers, artists and programmers, from various parts of the world. Though not physically established or corporately funded, our love for video games and creative ambitions have brought us together through the internet to do what we've always dreamed. Currently, we have one other game released of Steam (Red Goblin: Cursed Forest). With some new artistic talents and renewed drive, we are working on our next title; Vanaheim Tales.

  • What we want with our efforts is to deliver a nostalgic but worthwhile gaming experience. One inspired by the games of old but with fresh, new innovation. A game that's as fun for us to develop as it is for you to play it.

  • If you do so choose to aid us in our efforts, you'll get a few things in return. First off; our gratitude! As real people spotted all about the world, we appreciate every little bit of investment and encouragement, monetary or otherwise. Every team member is essentially working for free at the moment and it will remain our passion project. Until sales begin and revenue is generated, we have no money in our pockets.
  • And, you know, some perks. Those are right over, to the right. Check 'em out!

.. So, what do you say?


The crowdfunding hopefully coming in from this campaign will be shared about to every member of the team, and used to supplement our audio resources, where needed. Though working for free, we are also motivated by our zeal for developing. Basically, the game happens whether we're funded or not. So why help?

  • Developers are real people! Every member is working daily on new art, features and narrative and game design. We carry on because we're confident our efforts and motivations will show through to the final project in a game obviously made with love.
  • Exclusive perks and content! Of course we can't just accept your aid for a thank you and chest full of warm fuzzy feelings. In exchange for your donations, depending on amount, you can get anything from specifically requested content to a digital, or even one of five physically produced copies of of the game. Additionally, extra content produced solely for the access of backers, and also free passes to any future DLC.

A JRPG full of tons of throwbacks to everything that inspired our loyalty to the genre in the first place- with a few of own twists thrown in. A story that promises to draw you in with political intrigue and a thought-provoking pitch at the concepts of religious and scientific warfare; a clash between a secretive alchemist and the angels he's found to be keeping a dark secret..

  • 10-20 Hrs of game play.
  • 8 playable characters to join your party.
  • A unique Alchemy mechanic that gives you..
  • Hundreds of different items to collect. From potions and equipment to alchemy recipes, materials and more.
  • A story open to influence. With several diverging paths to choose from, your choice matters in what the experience unfolding before you ends up being.
  • 3 Different endings. 
Unique Features
  • Alchemy system:In the universe of Vanaheim, magic is an art and a science forbidden by those known as Angels- locked and kept from humans, in prevention of its violent and catastrophic abuse. Whatever their intentions, however, those known as Demons have come to humanity with the forbidden knowledge to teach them and spread alchemical instruction through tomes and scattered recipes. In Vanaheim Tales, there is no "Mana" or "MP" stat- all magical spells, or Alchemies, are cast by means of gathered ingredients and materials. This encourages the player to plan ahead and collect strategically for the enemies and environments they choose to explore.
  • No random encounters: There are no random battles in Vanaheim tales, every monster can be seen walking or patrolling on the maps. Tired of combat, in a rush, or unprepared for an enemy? Tuck and roll! Dash and dodge! Evading the enemy is often a possibility with enough speed, dexterity or creativity.
  • Skill System: Alchemy of course isn't the only field of expertise available to the player- other such skills, requiring Skill Points (SP), are also acquirable for a slightly more traditional RPG experience. Using a sword, a staff, a pole-arm, shield, or even bare handed - skills can be trained from meager defenses and attacks to powerful tools against customizable enemy types.
  • Along with all the regular systems like Elemental effectiveness, Status effects, Leveling and Exploring; you get a Teleport System, this way you don't need to spend hours walking to reach the next town or dungeon. 
Main Characters

  • Leo Sylphide

 Protagonist; one of many Alchemists, or those that pact with Demons in exchange for the heaven-kept secrets of his art and science. Through the course of the story, Leo attempts to realize his ambitions of the creation of a Homonculus, a dream that leads him to a maelstrom of nightmares beyond his imagining. Soon to face the conquering of his nation by an enemy army, a traitorous King willing to sacrifice his own people and slowly uncovering the selfish conspiracy of the Angels and Demons playing the race of humanity for their own gain.

  • Alial van Droft: The Demon that formed a covenant with Leo. Trapped in the realm of humans against her will long ago in the ancient war with Angels, she desires to unseal her wings and their magic and return to the underworld- but needs the aid of a human alchemist and their capability for Alchemy. Though first begrudging, the necessity of their mutual cooperation has softened her view of Leo and made him one of few humans she would admit to being fond of.

  • A mysterious woman with secrets so various and great in number that even she sometimes forgets the truth. More or less adopted by Leo on one of his ventures, her past is slowly follows her back and her true identity and nature comes to the forefront of Alial's and Leo's efforts.


Depending on the amount of donations received from backers, more of our plans for the game can be produced and faster. Here's the layout- from bare-minumum to the deluxe works.

At the minimum of $3000 USD, we can work a continuous production of the game with the following features:
  • 10-20 Hrs of game play.
  • 8 playable characters to join your party.
  • The fully fleshed out Alchemy system..
  • Hundreds of Items to collect, potions, equipment, alchemy books, materials and more.
  • Several paths in the story, depending on your choices, though all ending in one of-
  • 3 Different endings.

  • Extended play time and an added a side quest- "What Was Lost", where you explore the events 100 years before Leo started his journey. 
  • Extra Playable Character, Noel (Royal Knight from the past).
  • Extra Boss Archangel Gabriel.
  • Extra hidden Ending.

  • Extended play time and an added a side quest- "Love Between Realms", a tale of romantic drama between Leo, Alial and Maryann.
  • Extra Playable Character; the Angel Miguel or the Demon Lucifer.
  • .. and Extra Boss; the Demon Lucifer or the Angel Miguel.

Are there any risks in contributing to the campaign? Not really, the game will happen, however your contribution impact is big. With your help we can spend more time developing and expanding the game, having more polished features and better looking pixel art .

  • We believe that games are meant to invent and innovate, however nostalgic and the amount of retro inspiration. That said, it's our plan to risk and try new ideas.
  • While our first game might've been a safer attempt, this is our true passion project. It might take a bit more time and a bit more effort, but we're dedicated to the end.

Shucks, no need to worry! Just share our campaign link and support our greenlight on Stream with a "yes" vote. More than enough for us.

story:
Update: We've uploaded a video of the tutorial section of the game, you can watch it here in our gallery. If you find it fun enough to play, post a comment here or in our blog and will release it as a playable demo if we get a good amount of comments...


About 2 Bad Company

2 Bad Company is a team of two, Pedro Pitéu and Luis Baleca, from Portugal, who share a passion for videogames and are currently developing their very first game for PC, Yokai.
We announced the game in March, through a teaser trailer, which was very acclaimed by the audience. Since then, the amount of positive feedback has been outstanding, with Yokai being featured in the most diverse websites around the web, including popular ones like indigames.com, and even in the television.
Because we want to officialize 2 Bad Company as studio and dedicate ourselves full-time to the development of Yokai, we decided to launch this campaign.



About Yokai

The concept behind Yokai is pretty simple and straight forward.
It’s an old school platformer. Find ways to progress in the map, defeat enemies, collect items, fight bosses, etc…
The gameplay is focused in the different abilities of Yokai, who is a shape shifter, being is main ability to swell like a ballon.
During the game, the player will be able to unlock new abilities, which will allow him to explore new paths in previous levels, or fight the enemies more easily. 
Because we are a small team, the game will be launched in four separated chapters, each one composed by four stages, with two levels and a boss each.
Visit ou development blog for all the info on Yokai: http://2badcompany.blogspot.com/

 


Why we need the money

Unfortunately, at this moment, we can’t afford to full-time work in Yokai. What you can see in our development Blog is the product of two month of work in our spare time.
In order to dedicate ourselves 100% to the game, we need to officialize 2 Bad Company in legal terms, and that takes money. Aside from the legal expenses that it takes, it’s necessary to rend a place, acquire hardware and software, among other things.
Once the studio is set, we can count on other funding options like government funds or the Indie Fund.
We wish to remain indie. Only this way we total have control and creativity freedom while developing Yokai.
Other way, it will be very difficult for Yokai to see the light of the day.
Also, if we ever manage to raise an amount above our target, that money will be used four our travels and stands for game conventions.

 





Our Special offer!

Obviously, we are not here just to ask.
Just for this Campaign, we created a Collector’s (limited) Edition for the first episode of Yokai, which you can only get here, on IndieGoGo.


              *Prototype of the Collector's Edition pack
 
This is what’s in the box:
 - The First Episode of Yokai, embedded in a Yokai USB Pen Drive, which will allow you to play the game as portable, directly from the pen or install it on your PC (with an actual installer, not just coping the files).
 - An extra stage, exclusive of this edition. It won’t be accessible in the regular edition of the game and it won’t be selled later as DLC.
 -The game soundtrack, embedded in the USB pen, wich plays in a Yokai media player.
 - A poster(we can sign it if you want :P).
 - Five different postals with art from the game.
 - A T-Shirt.
 - A badge.
 Remember, everything from the box is exclusive os the Collector’s Edition, and you can only acquire it while this campaign is open.

Important: The shipping costs for every part of the world are included in th perk, no aditional payments are necessary.




 
Thanks a lot, and take care.
story_txt:
Update: We've uploaded a video of the tutorial section of the game, you can watch it here in our gallery. If you find it fun enough to play, post a comment here or in our blog and will release it as a playable demo if we get a good amount of comments...


About 2 Bad Company





2 Bad Company is a team of two, Pedro Pitéu and Luis Baleca, from Portugal, who share a passion for videogames and are currently developing their very first game for PC, Yokai.We announced the game in March, through a teaser trailer, which was very acclaimed by the audience. Since then, the amount of positive feedback has been outstanding, with Yokai being featured in the most diverse websites around the web, including popular ones like indigames.com, and even in the television.Because we want to officialize 2 Bad Company as studio and dedicate ourselves full-time to the development of Yokai, we decided to launch this campaign.





About Yokai


The concept behind Yokai is pretty simple and straight forward.It’s an old school platformer. Find ways to progress in the map, defeat enemies, collect items, fight bosses, etc…The gameplay is focused in the different abilities of Yokai, who is a shape shifter, being is main ability to swell like a ballon.During the game, the player will be able to unlock new abilities, which will allow him to explore new paths in previous levels, or fight the enemies more easily.  Because we are a small team, the game will be launched in four separated chapters, each one composed by four stages, with two levels and a boss each.Visit ou development blog for all the info on Yokai: http://2badcompany.blogspot.com/
  



Why we need the money
Unfortunately, at this moment, we can’t afford to full-time work in Yokai. What you can see in our development Blog is the product of two month of work in our spare time.In order to dedicate ourselves 100% to the game, we need to officialize 2 Bad Company in legal terms, and that takes money. Aside from the legal expenses that it takes, it’s necessary to rend a place, acquire hardware and software, among other things.Once the studio is set, we can count on other funding options like government funds or the Indie Fund.We wish to remain indie. Only this way we total have control and creativity freedom while developing Yokai.Other way, it will be very difficult for Yokai to see the light of the day.Also, if we ever manage to raise an amount above our target, that money will be used four our travels and stands for game conventions.
  



 Our Special offer!Obviously, we are not here just to ask.Just for this Campaign, we created a Collector’s (limited) Edition for the first episode of Yokai, which you can only get here, on IndieGoGo.

              *Prototype of the Collector's Edition pack This is what’s in the box: - The First Episode of Yokai, embedded in a Yokai USB Pen Drive, which will allow you to play the game as portable, directly from the pen or install it on your PC (with an actual installer, not just coping the files). - An extra stage, exclusive of this edition. It won’t be accessible in the regular edition of the game and it won’t be selled later as DLC. -The game soundtrack, embedded in the USB pen, wich plays in a Yokai media player. - A poster(we can sign it if you want :P). - Five different postals with art from the game. - A T-Shirt. - A badge. Remember, everything from the box is exclusive os the Collector’s Edition, and you can only acquire it while this campaign is open.Important: The shipping costs for every part of the world are included in th perk, no aditional payments are necessary.

 Thanks a lot, and take care.

story:
Pick3 Dominator is the easiest way to "intelligently" pick numbers each day for the pick 3 lottery games offered around the country.

The Pick 3 Lottery is played by ten millions of people around the USA EVERY day.  So popular that in most USA states Pick 3 is played twice daily.

We've developed a fully automated program, Pick3 Dominator, that takes advantage of the same skills we use to successfully trade stocks and commodities, the skills of defining and following PATTERNS.  During our research we found a pattern in the Pick 3 lottery with the following characteristics:

  • It's found in 50+% of all draws.
  • It is found in all State Pick 3 lottery games.
  • Gives you a real chance to win in every other draw.

Pick3 Dominator exploits that pattern to your benefit!


With the click of the mouse, Pick3 Dominator will provide you with a short list of combinations to play each day.  That's it, we cannot make it any simpler.

Our algorithms narrow down the playable combinations to a manageable number, bettering your odds of winning by quadruple or more!

We've also "back tested" our program in multiple State Pick 3 drawings to find that this unique pattern has worked for over 6000 past draws in each state lottery tested with good history.  When we added additional pattern algorithms, that take in to consideration additional probabilities, then winning is no longer a guess but just a matter of time.
("Back testing" is a hallmark of creating profitable stock trading algorithms before implementing them. If they don't back test, then you don't use them.)

Pick 3 lotteries are in every state with a lottery program.  The game is simple.  Pick 3 numbers from 0-9 with the hopes of getting the correct 3 numbers in a row.  Pick the number exactly in order, such as 123 and you win $250 for a 50 cent bet.  Pick the numbers out of order ( 321) and you win $40 for a 50 cent bet.  $1 bet pays $500 and $80 respectively.  There are 1000 possible combinations for the exact order and 220 for the out of order combinations.

Here's what we need:

  • Pick3 Dominator is a complicated BUT fully automated 7 step formula (each step a separate algorithm itself) and we need to hire a couple of highly skilled mathematicians who are also programers to do the final programing so all you'll need to do is push a button and out will come your picks for that days Pick3. We have our programers lined up but they're not cheap!  So your funding will go to pay additional, research  programing and marketing.

Here's what you'll get:

  • You'll get the first copies of this program before it's offered to the public at a substantially higher price than it will be offered to you!

If we don't meet our financial goal:

  • Regardless, even if we fail to reach our financial goal, this project will be completed. We will put up whatever balance is needed.  It may take us a little longer but you'll get your copy of the Pick3 Dominator!


This project was started by a 30 year Wall Street veteran with a financial analysis background, a Russian professor of math, and an experienced VBnet programer.

We have been studying the lotteries for years, identifying trends and patterns for most lotteries.

Our passed experience with the lottery is the highly popular LotterySlayer program  ( http://lotteryslayer.com ) which is the most detailed statistical analysis program available and suitable for all lottery games,  Pick 3,4,5, Lotto, PowerBall and MegaMillions.  Pick3 Dominator is our first program to actually chose the winning numbers for you.


If you just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • We all know someone who plays the lottery, get the word out to them.
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
日本語のウェブサイトはこちら

体験版のダウンロードはこちら！！

 

Here is pre- pre Alpha Game Link

 

 

 

たくさんのご支援ありがとうございました！

Thanks so much for your funding !

 

本日BitSummitに応募しました！

We did entry BITSUMMIT

Use of funds

 

  • First Step

Completing to create game in Unity

Only four people is now working for this project as major member and each has huge task:system making, scenario, ilustrate, back music. We'd like to use fund to develop the game system in more efficient way by recruiting more game programmers. Also, we need to purchase several equipment and materials to create better quolity products. In this period, we will destribute single player game which is available on iOS, Android, Mac and Window.

 

  • Second step 

Unreal Engine 4 for game developing

We'd like to develop our game from simple 2D games to stunning high-end visuals  high-end visuals and seamlessly deploy to iOS and Android devices. However, in our current situation, we have no high spec pc for that. Therefore, we'd like to introduce new one when we are ready to use game developing tool.

 

  • Third Step 

Multi Play

Our next step is providing the game which is  enjoyed multiplay on online.  We haven't decided a detail of that system. We'd like to built sever for the game as soon as we correct enough funds for that.

 

  • Forth Step 

VR System

 

 

In our project,  we engaged in VR invention in using Oculus-rift and are now inventing wrist and ancle mounted type devices to reproduce full-body function on game screen. We are going to get some idea from existing teqnology of a powered exoskeleton. When a players attempt to move their body, nerve signals are sent from the brain to the muscles through the motor neurons, moving the musculoskeletal system. When this happens, small biosignals can be detected on the surface of the skin. The device and screen registers these signals through a sensor attached to the skin of the wearer. Based on the signals obtained, players are able to move in the world of VR without any body movement in actual world. That mean, the posture players usually enjoy game in can be anything: even lying down on the bed. So players may feel like that they are watcjing a dream chosen by yourself during playing the game . Other function of this devise is now under the consideration.

 

 

Set in apocalyptic Japan– a fusion of two stories!

There suddenly appeared in Japan, a black shadow-like monster, "Tsumibito". 

Competing with the ruthlessly attacking Tsumibito is "Utsushimi" (a monster reflects your deep down)

There are 2 different routes to this story.

Depending on the story, there are different characters that appear in the story and different goals.

Which story you choose is up to the player!

 

 

 

 

Background 

Unlike the games in the past, current games are played through networks and can be played with several people. Because of this, games are not just something you do alone, but it’s something that you do with others, whether its helping or competing with each other. 

However there is a disadvantage of playing games with many people: enjoying the individuality. In most of the current online games, there is only one certain type present such as strong characters with strong weapons, and most of the players play in such a way.  When games are played this way, the game is filled with the same type of characters. Even the game cheats have become boring and tasteless. 

We launched this project because we wanted to create a game that seemed less like a task as much as possible, and make a game where an individual can enjoy his own playing style. 

Member

Yoshiaki Nakamichi : Directer and Programmer

Ku Yashiro : Script writer

Airi Katayama : Illustrator

Shin Yabumoto : Composer 

The funding we receive will be used to produce the game as early as possible. We would like to thank you in advance.

story:
Bonjour à tous,

Je m'appelle Alain Truffier (Alias Angelstar) et je suis le créateur de plusieurs jeux en ligne dont 650km.com et Druidik.com.

Ce projet de financement INDIEGOGO permet de maintenir 650km.com en tant que jeu gratuit en ligne sans abonnement et sans blocage de niveau.

Cette page INDIEGOGO vous permet de faire vos contributions en toute sécurité et de recevoir vos KM-POINTS sous 48 heures après le crédit des achats sur le compte de 650KM

Je vous invite à mettre à jour vos informations personnelles dans 650km.Com afin que je puisse faire la liaison entre le contributeur INDIEGOGO et le joueur de 650km!

Grâce à ces fonds il me sera possible de maintenir le jeu en ligne et de m'assurer que les serveurs soient toujours opérationnels.

Il est désormais possible d'utiliser vos cartes de crédits ainsi que vos comptes Paypal pour obtenir des KM-POINTS!


Alain Truffier / Angelstar
