story:
October 18th Update

We've had a designer create a few mock ups of what the beta version of Manaverse.com will look like. Below we have a sample newsfeed with a few fictional and not so fictional names and places added in.

Down below is a hypothetical version of Codex, where finding info on game stores anywhere is as easy as clicking on their map location.

And thirdly, we have a sample event page. This is an example of a live tournament being broadcast using Victory from the perspective of a visiting user.


Manaverse.com - The technology that Magic: the Gathering is missing

Manaverse.com is a social network dedicated to the needs of the Magic: the Gathering community of players and business owners alike. Designed to address several missing aspects of one of the world's most popular games, we want Manaverse.com to become the #1 online asset for Magic players and stores.

Magic is an exceptional game, 21 years strong and still growing. Outside the game itself however, Magic has fallen behind. As tournament attendance increases and the game's popularity continues to rise, the cracks in the architecture around Magic have become more and more glaring. We believe that Magic can become even greater if the systems around it also continue to evolve. Which is where Manaverse.com comes in.

From a player's perspective Manaverse.com will:

  1. Be a place to connect with players in your local area as well as around the world.

  2. Offer access to the schedules and information of any LGS (Local Game Store) in your area or anywhere in an intuitive and friendly manner. No more digging through an outdated webpage to find basic info.

  3. Showcase your achievements and share your story.

  4. Keep you up to date on the current news and tournaments in the Magic community.

  5. Offer easy access to the coverage of tournaments and events from anywhere.

  6. Be a content creation platform. More details below.

  7. Be free to access.

From a business owner's perspective Manaverse.com will:

  1. Be a platform to promote your store to highly qualified customers.

  2. Allow your business to appear in Codex. See below.

  3. Simplify your social media marketing efforts by automatically pushing your posts on Manaverse.com to other social platforms like Facebook and Twitter.

  4. Be an easy way to stay connected with your customers and to manage your contact list.

  5. Offer access to demographic information about the player base as well as more Magic specific info like what format players prefer in your area.

  6. Offer access to Victory, an end to end system for hosting, organizing, running, and covering tournaments. More details down below.

  7. Simplify and streamline the Magic: the Gathering side of your business.

  8. Have two kinds of memberships, one free and one paid with access to premium features.

Our goals for Manaverse.com

Our goals for this project are to validate interest and generate buy in from the community to make this site a reality. By contributing to this project you will be directly supporting the creation of the website while also getting some sweet perks at the same time. Specifically, all money pledged will go towards paying for the development and coding of the site as well as producing the branded merchandise.

What you will help create and what problems we will solve

Have you ever wanted to write about Magic, make a video, or record a podcast but don't have a platform to share it? Manaverse.com is a platform where anyone can create content and get published online while simultaneously earning money for their efforts as the quality of the content grows. Manaverse will be a place to build and grow an audience for sharing your experiences and talents that has no gatekeepers, and no one to tell you that your stuff isn't good enough. Validation comes from the community itself. If your content isn't great, no big deal. Use Manaverse’s free resources and tips to improve, and then keep producing and keep getting better at the craft. Soon your audience and your subscribers will grow and you can be topping the charts and earning cash for your content. In addition to Manaverse paying for content, a built in tip jar will make it easy for content creators to be supported directly by their fans and subscribers. Play Magic. Create Content. Get Paid.

Victory. A new tournament experience. Victory is Manaverse.com's own proprietary application which combines the software used to run and organize tournaments with an online public event page that can be viewed from any account on the network. This instance will enable any store to create coverage of their events and be the location for players to find pairings and standings during a tournament.

Victory will virtually eliminate the need for endless print outs each round or for someone to yell out the names of each pairing. As part of the project, Manaverse.com will be developed and made available as an application for iPhone, Android and Blackberry devices enabling players with Manaverse accounts to receive push notifications to their phones when their pairings are posted. This will allow events to run smoother and faster which is rapidly becoming a bottleneck for larger tournaments.

Imagine the next Grand Prix where 2000+ players don't have to crowd around a handful of printouts to see which table they were playing at. Also, at the same Grand Prix, imagine being able to check the results in real time while streaming video coverage on the same page and chatting with other players who are also viewing the same event. This is our vision. Game changer.

As part of an end-to-end solution for organizing tournaments, Victory will also allow stores to receive payment via paypal or credit card when a player preregisters for an event. This will simplify the process of registering players the day of, while also giving the tournament  organizer a better understanding of the turnout they can expect.

Codex.

Have you ever struggled to find information about events in your area? How about simple info like what days your favourite LGS is open? Codex is an intuitive map interface that displays all game stores that are registered with Manaverse.com within a certain radius of the user. It is also a database of information for each business with their name, address, contact info, and weekly schedule. As well as upcoming/current events and their details: price of admission, format, location, prizes, etc. Codex will be an easy and convenient way for players to learn more about the community they play in as well as when they travel for events out of their local area. The more stores that register their information on Codex, the more valuable the software will become for both the businesses and the players that use it.

Codex goes both ways and is just as useful for the stores that are part of the system. By adding your business information to Codex, you are making it easier for your store to be reached by your customers while also cutting down on answering the same mundane questions over and over again.

Codex is more than a map however, it's also a universal event calendar. When an LGS creates their schedule of events on Manaverse.com they are automatically published on Codex and are then displayed on the Codex calendar of each player profile following that store. Each kind of event will have its own unique styling so that people viewing the calendar can see at a glance where and when a local Modern tournament is being held versus an upcoming PTQ or Grand Prix. Codex will intelligently display events and stores to players based on their geographic location and can be customized and filtered to display on different scales and distances.

Want to find out where and when every PTQ within 500km is being held over the next 4 months? No problem, input your criteria and you can start planning. Codex and Victory are fully integrated. A player will be able to register and pay for an event ahead of time, and then once that's done they can see who else has decided to attend the same tournament. If the event involves travelling, this information can be used to arrange car pooling with local players thus saving the players involved money.

Larger, more regional tournaments like a PTQ or WMCQ will be featured prominently on the landing page when a player logs in to the site. The landing page will be an excellent place for businesses to promote tournaments and events to local players as well as reach players outside of their region.

Our appeal to you

We are not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast and this project is in no way supported by them. We are merely avid players of Magic: the Gathering and former game store owners and want to see it continue to grow and prosper.

A little about me: I have worn many hats when it comes to Magic. I've played the game since 5th Edition starting with a casual interest and developing all the way up to the competitive scene. I've organized and run multiple tournaments for my local area and understand how difficult it can be to manage events for the Magic community. I have owned and operated a local game store with two friends where Magic was our primary business. Player, tournament organizer, business owner, all this adds up to a wider perspective on the needs of the Magic community which is how the idea for Manaverse came to be.

As a game that has lead to many friendships and experiences, Magic has been an important part of my life. I feel that in order for Magic to continue to grow and to reach another generation the structures and systems around it need to evolve. I believe that Manaverse.com is the technology that will take Magic into the future.

As stated above, this campaign is to gauge interest and generate buy in for Manaverse.com with all the funds pledged going towards developing the network and producing the merchandise. This project isn't the only source of funds however. The Manaverse team is fully dedicated to bringing the resources needed to make the network a success. Whether that be time, money, energy, or expertise. What we need is you, the person reading this, to pledge your support and help make our vision a reality.

We need you to get excited about Magic and about Manaverse. We need you to sport our t-shirts and hoodies. We need you to tell your friends to contribute to the campaign. We need you to spread the word to your local game store and to get them interested in signing up. We need you to share it on Facebook and Twitter using the built in tools on Indiegogo.

If you're reading this as a fellow Magic player and you think that Manaverse.com sounds pretty cool, we hope you will pledge your support to help bring it to fruition. In exchange for your pledge you will get some excellent merchandise and help spread the word about how Manaverse.com is going to revolutionize the way we play Magic.

If you're a business owner or a future business owner, we hope this description of what we want to accomplish has convinced you that Manaverse.com can change the way Magic is played and marketed for the better. If you feel this way, please pledge your support and become a premium member. Not only will it save you money from when the site goes live to the public, but you will be supporting a project that will then help simplify your own social media marketing efforts and amplify the Magic side of your business. As early adopters you will also gain special priority access to any new features developed for the site in the future. We will look for your feedback as well so you will be able to influence the direction the site takes in the future.

Our LGS Guarantee

If you own a game store and are on the fence about pledging to this campaign know this. Any store owner that signs up for a premium membership in advance of the beta release can get a full refund of their money if they don't like the product we are developing or for any reason at all. We are confident that Manaverse.com will be such a valuable tool for you we are offering 100% satisfaction or you get your money back.

What happens if we exceed our goal?

If we receive more than our goal the extra funds will go towards developing the site on a faster timeline and getting the beta out earlier so we can get feedback from our users sooner. 

What do I get for pledging?

Pledge $5 and we'll send you a digital high five and a personal thank you.

Pledge $10 and we will send you a custom printed DCI/Manaverse plastic membership card with your name and DCI number on it. Team names can be added as well. Impress your friends and foes with a stylish card that says you mean business.

Pledge $35 and receive a t-shirt branded with the Manaverse logo. Comes in your choice of size and a variety of colours. XS - XXL.


Pledge $75 and we'll ship you a Manaverse hoody personalized with your name on it. Comes in your choice of size and a variety of colours. XS - XXL.

Pledge $100 and become a Legend. Comes with the hoody too.

Pledge $110 and grab a hoody and a custom DCI card. Become a Legend as well.

This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $75 and get three months of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This perk comes with $75 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. Stores that pledge $75 or more will be given the opportunity to discuss the project in person or via Skype as well.

This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $150 and get six months of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This comes with $150 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site.

This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $250 and get one year of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This comes with $250 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. At this level your business will also have permanent Legendary status. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.

This perk is for serious store owners only. Pledge $500 and get two years of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This perk comes with $500 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. At this level your business will also have permanent Legendary status as well as our team's eternal gratitude. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.

Pledge $599 and your business will become a permanent lifetime premium member of Manaverse.com. This comes with $599 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. Your business will also have permanent Legendary status as well as our team's eternal gratitude. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.

What does a premium membership get me?

Anyone can set up a profile on Manaverse.com for free but stores have the option of upgrading their profile to a premium membership which gives them access to features that aren’t automatically available. For the price of $30/month or $300/year when the site goes live, premium members get access to extended customer relationship management tools, extra visibility on Codex and the front page, become a part of an exclusive store owner forum, and learn effective strategies for growing their business. In addition to that each premium member is awarded $30 in ad credit each month and earns $5 in credit each time they sign up a new player under their store’s unique referral link.

Knowing what your customers want is a great way to know what to sell whether it’s board games, standard format singles, or modern tournaments. The CRM tools are a way for stores to manage the information of their customers and communicate with them as well as access demographic information that can give them insights into what the local community likes. This can help stores know what to provide. It is also a good way to build an email list for use with email campaigns outside of the Manaverse network.

Premium member’s events posted on Codex are placed more prominently on the homepage of players that follow that store making them more likely to be noticed and interacted with. For larger events this is important in drawing a larger turnout.

An important aspect of growing a business is learning from others who have been there and accomplished what you are trying to achieve. Every store owner has stories of success and failure they can share that can help other store owners build their own business and avoid common mistakes. By becoming a premium member, store owners gain access to an exclusive group forum where they can share what has worked for them and what hasn’t. Cooperation and sharing is essential to growing the Magic community as a whole. By helping other entrepreneurs build their game stores up, the entire Magic community benefits and grows together. The resources found here can help new and experienced store owners become more successful and prosperous than they could isolated on their own. Everyone needs to learn how to run a successful business before they can have one, premium members get access to all the tools and help they need to shorten the learning curve and succeed.

Become a Legend. Gaining Legendary status on Manaverse.com will only be available through this campaign to those players and businesses who pledge a certain level of support. Legendary status for players means that their profile and posts will be styled differently from other users, highlighting the fact that they got in at the ground floor. Any content Legends produce will also be given priority and prominence on the main page of the site, which is advantageous for reaching out to new subscribers.

Businesses that acquire Legendary status will have similar perks as Legendary players in addition to a special icon and display within Codex. Any events or content posted by a Legendary store will be set apart from other stores in a way that highlights the fact that they were critical to the creation of Manaverse.com. Similarly Legends will be displayed and featured in a prominent way on the main landing page of the site when players log in.

In addition to all that, all players and stores that acquire Legendary status will receive a personal thank you from the founder complete with Skype call if desired. You can use this opportunity to discuss the site and potentially influence the direction development moves in the future. Feedback from the people most invested in the site is an important goal for Manaverse.com once the campaign is finished.

With your support we can build the most powerful companion to Magic since card sleeves were invented.
story_txt:
October 18th Update
We've had a designer create a few mock ups of what the beta version of Manaverse.com will look like. Below we have a sample newsfeed with a few fictional and not so fictional names and places added in.


Down below is a hypothetical version of Codex, where finding info on game stores anywhere is as easy as clicking on their map location.
And thirdly, we have a sample event page. This is an example of a live tournament being broadcast using Victory from the perspective of a visiting user.

Manaverse.com - The technology that Magic: the Gathering is missingManaverse.com is a social network dedicated to the needs of the Magic: the Gathering community of players and business owners alike. Designed to address several missing aspects of one of the world's most popular games, we want Manaverse.com to become the #1 online asset for Magic players and stores.Magic is an exceptional game, 21 years strong and still growing. Outside the game itself however, Magic has fallen behind. As tournament attendance increases and the game's popularity continues to rise, the cracks in the architecture around Magic have become more and more glaring. We believe that Magic can become even greater if the systems around it also continue to evolve. Which is where Manaverse.com comes in.From a player's perspective Manaverse.com will: 
Be a place to connect with players in your local area as well as around the world. 
Offer access to the schedules and information of any LGS (Local Game Store) in your area or anywhere in an intuitive and friendly manner. No more digging through an outdated webpage to find basic info.
Showcase your achievements and share your story.
Keep you up to date on the current news and tournaments in the Magic community.
Offer easy access to the coverage of tournaments and events from anywhere.
Be a content creation platform. More details below.
Be free to access. 
From a business owner's perspective Manaverse.com will:
Be a platform to promote your store to highly qualified customers.
Allow your business to appear in Codex. See below.
Simplify your social media marketing efforts by automatically pushing your posts on Manaverse.com to other social platforms like Facebook and Twitter.
Be an easy way to stay connected with your customers and to manage your contact list.
Offer access to demographic information about the player base as well as more Magic specific info like what format players prefer in your area.
Offer access to Victory, an end to end system for hosting, organizing, running, and covering tournaments. More details down below.
Simplify and streamline the Magic: the Gathering side of your business.
Have two kinds of memberships, one free and one paid with access to premium features.
Our goals for Manaverse.comOur goals for this project are to validate interest and generate buy in from the community to make this site a reality. By contributing to this project you will be directly supporting the creation of the website while also getting some sweet perks at the same time. Specifically, all money pledged will go towards paying for the development and coding of the site as well as producing the branded merchandise.What you will help create and what problems we will solveHave you ever wanted to write about Magic, make a video, or record a podcast but don't have a platform to share it? Manaverse.com is a platform where anyone can create content and get published online while simultaneously earning money for their efforts as the quality of the content grows. Manaverse will be a place to build and grow an audience for sharing your experiences and talents that has no gatekeepers, and no one to tell you that your stuff isn't good enough. Validation comes from the community itself. If your content isn't great, no big deal. Use Manaverse’s free resources and tips to improve, and then keep producing and keep getting better at the craft. Soon your audience and your subscribers will grow and you can be topping the charts and earning cash for your content. In addition to Manaverse paying for content, a built in tip jar will make it easy for content creators to be supported directly by their fans and subscribers. Play Magic. Create Content. Get Paid.Victory. A new tournament experience. Victory is Manaverse.com's own proprietary application which combines the software used to run and organize tournaments with an online public event page that can be viewed from any account on the network. This instance will enable any store to create coverage of their events and be the location for players to find pairings and standings during a tournament.Victory will virtually eliminate the need for endless print outs each round or for someone to yell out the names of each pairing. As part of the project, Manaverse.com will be developed and made available as an application for iPhone, Android and Blackberry devices enabling players with Manaverse accounts to receive push notifications to their phones when their pairings are posted. This will allow events to run smoother and faster which is rapidly becoming a bottleneck for larger tournaments.Imagine the next Grand Prix where 2000+ players don't have to crowd around a handful of printouts to see which table they were playing at. Also, at the same Grand Prix, imagine being able to check the results in real time while streaming video coverage on the same page and chatting with other players who are also viewing the same event. This is our vision. Game changer.As part of an end-to-end solution for organizing tournaments, Victory will also allow stores to receive payment via paypal or credit card when a player preregisters for an event. This will simplify the process of registering players the day of, while also giving the tournament  organizer a better understanding of the turnout they can expect.Codex.Have you ever struggled to find information about events in your area? How about simple info like what days your favourite LGS is open? Codex is an intuitive map interface that displays all game stores that are registered with Manaverse.com within a certain radius of the user. It is also a database of information for each business with their name, address, contact info, and weekly schedule. As well as upcoming/current events and their details: price of admission, format, location, prizes, etc. Codex will be an easy and convenient way for players to learn more about the community they play in as well as when they travel for events out of their local area. The more stores that register their information on Codex, the more valuable the software will become for both the businesses and the players that use it.Codex goes both ways and is just as useful for the stores that are part of the system. By adding your business information to Codex, you are making it easier for your store to be reached by your customers while also cutting down on answering the same mundane questions over and over again.Codex is more than a map however, it's also a universal event calendar. When an LGS creates their schedule of events on Manaverse.com they are automatically published on Codex and are then displayed on the Codex calendar of each player profile following that store. Each kind of event will have its own unique styling so that people viewing the calendar can see at a glance where and when a local Modern tournament is being held versus an upcoming PTQ or Grand Prix. Codex will intelligently display events and stores to players based on their geographic location and can be customized and filtered to display on different scales and distances. Want to find out where and when every PTQ within 500km is being held over the next 4 months? No problem, input your criteria and you can start planning. Codex and Victory are fully integrated. A player will be able to register and pay for an event ahead of time, and then once that's done they can see who else has decided to attend the same tournament. If the event involves travelling, this information can be used to arrange car pooling with local players thus saving the players involved money.Larger, more regional tournaments like a PTQ or WMCQ will be featured prominently on the landing page when a player logs in to the site. The landing page will be an excellent place for businesses to promote tournaments and events to local players as well as reach players outside of their region. Our appeal to youWe are not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast and this project is in no way supported by them. We are merely avid players of Magic: the Gathering and former game store owners and want to see it continue to grow and prosper.A little about me: I have worn many hats when it comes to Magic. I've played the game since 5th Edition starting with a casual interest and developing all the way up to the competitive scene. I've organized and run multiple tournaments for my local area and understand how difficult it can be to manage events for the Magic community. I have owned and operated a local game store with two friends where Magic was our primary business. Player, tournament organizer, business owner, all this adds up to a wider perspective on the needs of the Magic community which is how the idea for Manaverse came to be.As a game that has lead to many friendships and experiences, Magic has been an important part of my life. I feel that in order for Magic to continue to grow and to reach another generation the structures and systems around it need to evolve. I believe that Manaverse.com is the technology that will take Magic into the future.As stated above, this campaign is to gauge interest and generate buy in for Manaverse.com with all the funds pledged going towards developing the network and producing the merchandise. This project isn't the only source of funds however. The Manaverse team is fully dedicated to bringing the resources needed to make the network a success. Whether that be time, money, energy, or expertise. What we need is you, the person reading this, to pledge your support and help make our vision a reality.We need you to get excited about Magic and about Manaverse. We need you to sport our t-shirts and hoodies. We need you to tell your friends to contribute to the campaign. We need you to spread the word to your local game store and to get them interested in signing up. We need you to share it on Facebook and Twitter using the built in tools on Indiegogo.If you're reading this as a fellow Magic player and you think that Manaverse.com sounds pretty cool, we hope you will pledge your support to help bring it to fruition. In exchange for your pledge you will get some excellent merchandise and help spread the word about how Manaverse.com is going to revolutionize the way we play Magic.If you're a business owner or a future business owner, we hope this description of what we want to accomplish has convinced you that Manaverse.com can change the way Magic is played and marketed for the better. If you feel this way, please pledge your support and become a premium member. Not only will it save you money from when the site goes live to the public, but you will be supporting a project that will then help simplify your own social media marketing efforts and amplify the Magic side of your business. As early adopters you will also gain special priority access to any new features developed for the site in the future. We will look for your feedback as well so you will be able to influence the direction the site takes in the future.Our LGS GuaranteeIf you own a game store and are on the fence about pledging to this campaign know this. Any store owner that signs up for a premium membership in advance of the beta release can get a full refund of their money if they don't like the product we are developing or for any reason at all. We are confident that Manaverse.com will be such a valuable tool for you we are offering 100% satisfaction or you get your money back.What happens if we exceed our goal?If we receive more than our goal the extra funds will go towards developing the site on a faster timeline and getting the beta out earlier so we can get feedback from our users sooner. What do I get for pledging?Pledge $5 and we'll send you a digital high five and a personal thank you.Pledge $10 and we will send you a custom printed DCI/Manaverse plastic membership card with your name and DCI number on it. Team names can be added as well. Impress your friends and foes with a stylish card that says you mean business.Pledge $35 and receive a t-shirt branded with the Manaverse logo. Comes in your choice of size and a variety of colours. XS - XXL.Pledge $75 and we'll ship you a Manaverse hoody personalized with your name on it. Comes in your choice of size and a variety of colours. XS - XXL.Pledge $100 and become a Legend. Comes with the hoody too.Pledge $110 and grab a hoody and a custom DCI card. Become a Legend as well.This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $75 and get three months of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This perk comes with $75 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. Stores that pledge $75 or more will be given the opportunity to discuss the project in person or via Skype as well.This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $150 and get six months of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This comes with $150 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site.This perk is for store owners only. Pledge $250 and get one year of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This comes with $250 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. At this level your business will also have permanent Legendary status. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.This perk is for serious store owners only. Pledge $500 and get two years of premium membership to Manaverse.com. This perk comes with $500 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. At this level your business will also have permanent Legendary status as well as our team's eternal gratitude. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.Pledge $599 and your business will become a permanent lifetime premium member of Manaverse.com. This comes with $599 worth of credit that can be used to promote your business on the site. Your business will also have permanent Legendary status as well as our team's eternal gratitude. See description for more detail about Legendary status for businesses.What does a premium membership get me?Anyone can set up a profile on Manaverse.com for free but stores have the option of upgrading their profile to a premium membership which gives them access to features that aren’t automatically available. For the price of $30/month or $300/year when the site goes live, premium members get access to extended customer relationship management tools, extra visibility on Codex and the front page, become a part of an exclusive store owner forum, and learn effective strategies for growing their business. In addition to that each premium member is awarded $30 in ad credit each month and earns $5 in credit each time they sign up a new player under their store’s unique referral link.Knowing what your customers want is a great way to know what to sell whether it’s board games, standard format singles, or modern tournaments. It is also a good way to build an email list for use with email campaigns outside of the Manaverse network.Premium member’s events posted on Codex are placed more prominently on the homepage of players that follow that store making them more likely to be noticed and interacted with. For larger events this is important in drawing a larger turnout.An important aspect of growing a business is learning from others who have been there and accomplished what you are trying to achieve. Cooperation and sharing is essential to growing the Magic community as a whole. By helping other entrepreneurs build their game stores up, the entire Magic community benefits and grows together. story:
Like us on Facebook                                                  Follow us on Twitter

    

 Wildlife Survival : Safari Edition 


We want to bring you an exciting game that allows you to roam freely, yet you can complete mini quests to gain bonuses if you wish or even enter a "Animal team death match", Capture the tree/water hole" "King of the jungle/Savannah", Catch the prey timed races and much more all through out the sandbox style gaming environment! This is not a pay2win game, old and new players can both survive! If you want to support this game click here now.

         Here are a few key features :

  • Massive Animal MMORPG with mini games and optional quests
  • Choose your animal (unlock more animals as you play)
  • Hunt and stalk your prey, eat other animals, drink and graze while you use up your environments resources and food source and replenish them.
  • Night and Day Cycles with Weather that affects your animal in many ways
  • Fatigue from overeating  and food diet prevents most spawn kills and creates a challenging and well balanced game for newbie and veteran players
  • Stealth Mode for Big Cats
  • Sleep to gain stamina and increase your health
  • Animals can Climb, Swim, Run and Leap to navigate their way around their environment to ambush or avoid other animals
  • Join a group of the same type of animal and communicate to survive attacks


               The Game Plan

    We will be releasing our game on steam greenlight and donating our $100 with
  the hope that it will be well received by the public. However we will not be placing      our game "on sale" to "cash in" on fans with an unfinished product. We have more    respect for our game and our fanbase and gaming community than that. That is why we are offering the game here at a discounted rate for those who believe in 
our project and want to aid in it's launch. We are excited to see just how far it can go and we truly hope you are too. Thank you for all your the support with our project.
  
      SUPPORT THIS GAME ON INDIEGOGO TO UNLOCK HIDDEN ANIMALS              

  

     WILL IT BE AVAILABLE ON OTHER CONSOLES?

                 We are going to do everything we can to make Wildlife Survival
                 available on all consoles and make it available to all supporters
           at a discounted rate.  Please help us reach our stretch goals below by
           sharing our link on your Facebook,Twitter and Instagram. Thank you! 

                 What We Do With The Funding

We will be using 80% to pay the creators, the coders, the animators and the advertisement on Facebook and Youtube for the game. It is hard work to make a multiplayer online game of this size, so we need your support! So please don't forget to look at what perks we have to offer. Thank you for making our job a little easier.

            WHAT WE DO FOR FANS & CHARITY

10% of the funds and our profit will be given away in our sweepstakes and we will donate the other 10% to help both the endangered animals and people suffering from illness in America and Africa! This is so important so please help us reach our stretch goals. We know you want to help make our world a better place, together we can!


          Click Here to enter the sweepstakes above

                 

                THE CHEETAH

                 

The fastest land animal in the world, The cheetah's slender, long-legged body is built for speed. Cheetahs are tan in color with black spots all over their bodies. They can also be distinguished from other big cats by their smaller size, spotted coats, small heads, ears and distinctive "tear stripes" that stretch from the corner of the eye to the side of the nose.

                                                                              THE LION

                 

Lions consume a wide variety of prey, from wildebeest, impala, zebra, giraffe, buffalo and wild hogs to sometimes rhinoceros and hippopotamus. They will also feed on smaller animals such as hares, birds and reptiles. Lions are also known to attack elephants when food is scarce.

     

CROCODILE DEATH ROLL :

   

                

                   WHY WE ARE CROWDFUNDING

We feel that most game companies that do not get a successful launch will not have the kind of fanbase needed to make a steady flow of new releases and patches. Also, we want to offer the chance for both casual gamers and hardcore gamers, a middle ground for an early release and get important feedback from our players.

All of our funders will get all of our future editions and games at a huge discount

to show our appreciation for all of their contributions and helping us succeed!

                 

                     

                      


               WANT TO HELP US IN OTHER WAYS

                                 Here are a few ways you can help us make our game:
  • Post our link on your facebook wall and groups www.igg.me/at/wildlife-survival
  • Add us on Twitter at www.twitter.com/mentalwarpgames
  • Find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/wildlifesurvivalgame

       

              THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/wildlifesurvivalgame


       

              THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Greebo Games: Hand of Death your Japanese style Rats

Our goal is to create a full Japanese style Rats team for Fantasy Football.

Welcome to the Greebo Games Rats funding campaign!

 Greebo Games is a well known Italian manufacturer of miniatures, born for fantasy football. Recently we have started  to produce board games and different types of fantasy sports game, other than collaborations with different Italian and International realities.

It is already several years that we create board games, form sculptor with the International School of Comics and, in 2014, we added a new service of 3D sculpture including both the making of and the production of digital artworks! All of these could be possible thanks to the sculpting experience gained from several years of work and to the tridimensional sculpting needed for all the details on the final model.

Greebo Games is a factory who keeps an eye both on past and future, giving you the best product TODAY!

Contacts:

indiegogo@greebo-games.com

Facebook

www.greebo.it

Twitter

Some examples of the 3D Print Service


The project: this year Greebo Games is celebrating the ultimate technology, 3D sculpture! What’s better to show off our new techniques than create a whole new team? Everything produced by Greebo Games!

A well projected Japanese Rats Team ready for the pitch right after our known Waag Saabhi, the Nippo Goblin Team that we launched on our last campaign. We would like to give you all the necessary to play and have fun with this new team such as a specific pitch to play on, several markers, Star Players and coaching staff! Every character will be a discovery and a wonderful sight for your eyes. The attention to details made from our Senior Character Designer will show you exactly what will be our finished work, who will born only with YOUR HELP. But we won’t stop here! We have had a lot of requests for our Tartalar models for Tutatis, so now you have the chance to get them in a bigger size, perfect for Fantasy Football! Armed Turtles, Robots, Chimeras, everybody ready to go on a pitch. Is this all? NO! You fill find even some more miniatures, available ONLY during conventions and campaigns!

Just one more thing: do not forget to HAVE FUN following our new Hand of Death campaign!

Some examples of painted models by Alessio Cisbani aka Wolfbane

Assassins:

Bushido's Clan:

Throwers:

The Rats:


Lots of heads to customise your models*:

 Rat-Oni ( Big Guy )


The Hero:

Fetz

 Big Guy hero:











The Pitch: if we will unlock this, it will be a rolled up version 



Prone and Stunned Marker for Oni-Rat:

3D projects, printed and casted models for Prone and Stunned Rat-oni mark


Team Marker:


Block Dices: 

Custom block dice for the Hand of Death, available as add on  Dice perk 



The Extras:

Tartalar: do you remember the Tutatis' turtle team? Lots of people have been asking us to rework on them in 27 mm scale instead of 10 mm, and here they are!

Wartart: We have prepared multy head and multy weapon, so you can arm your Tartalar as you prefer, chose from lots of different weapon and create your own personal team composition! Bow, Sword, Kunay, naked head, band on eyes, bandana, lots of different ways to create your Tartalar! Here are some examples

Here you can see the final result after a 3D print, casted in white metal , primered and inked to show you every details.

Wartart :







Iron fang is a completely customizable model !

Mecha Tartalar (Big Guy)


From our last Campaign, the Hand of Death's best friends Waag Saabi Goblin  (Painted by Chiafele "Axia" Giuseppe):

The EXLUSIVE Bonzo Goblin, available ONLY during campaigns and some festivals:


Special Weapons

Clan Goblins:

Elite Goblins:

Ninjas:


Oni-Trolls (Big Guys):

Dragon Coach and markers:

Geisha:

*all model where needed will come with one random head. 

Of course, once you go beyond the basic level, the more people get involved, the more advanced the options get. The beauty of crowdfunding projects is that you can go for the safe option of a basic pledge (our first levels) which gets you a guaranteed set of stuff, provided the project reaches its minimum funding level.

In our case, this minimum level sits at € 3,000.

Alternatively, you can invest a bit more money (with a higher level) and reap the benefits when more people become involved and the project really takes off. Once certain funding levels are reached (see below), the return for your initial pledge grows, even though you don’t you have pay any additional money.

These benefits can include additional models, parts or substitute parts for the characters, such as better weapons, strongest creature, sidekick characters or other miscellaneous stuff.

Not all extra goals give you automatic bonuses, though, some release additional pledging/update options. These can be available for all pledge levels or just for specific ones, please see below for details.

This is a low-risk campaign, as the majority of the stuff is produced by Greebo Games and will be produced, if we get founded, sooner or later! The only exception to this is regarding the Tartalar models as they were commissioned to another company. Some of these models can get delayed, changed or deleted. If this occurs, we will be glad to refund you the money you have spent to claim them, or we will convert the amount of money in whatever you want from our catalog.


So what happens once the campaign is over? Well, some miniatures are intended as a once-off special on this campaign. And once that is over, they will not be available from our online store. In fact, some of these sets will only be available as part of this or future Indiegogo campaigns or at conventions. The best way to secure your miniature(s) is to pledge the amount for what you’d like, spread the word among your mates so they get in on it as well and the project reaches not only its minimum funding level but also some stretch goals. Once this campaign is over, there’s no secure way to get one of these models!.

Please note that the items will be shipped from Italy and may thus be liable to customs duties outside the European Union.

The following applies to all perks,:

All miniatures are sculpted by Lorenzo Giusti, (Bonzo, Ninja 1-2, Goblin 1, Troll 2, Geisha 1-2 sculpted by Pedro Ramos. Goblin 2 Sculpted by Alessio Cisbani) 

All miniatures concepts are made by Massimiliano Gallo.

All miniatures from Hand of Death team are painted by Alessio "Wolfbane" Cisbani

All miniatures from Waag Saabi team, Iron fang and Mecha Turtle are painted by Giuseppe "Axia" Chiafele

All sets are securely shipped in padded envelopes or box, depend of the pledge.

All miniatures are made from metal. They will be supplied as unassembled, unbased kits, except where explicitly stated otherwise. They are all supplied with the standard round 25mm black plastic bases (Big Guys will have a 30mm round plastic base).

The miniatures and all additional parts are 28 mm scale

Shipping commences in May 2014.

All sets are shipped from Italy. Postage to EU, UK, USA and Canada is FREE OF CHARGE! Postage to anywhere else in the world is only 5 €! (Depending on the Level)

Please also note that you do not necessarily need a credit card to participate in an Indiegogo campaign (see FAQ for details).

Right, here are the perk levels and the stuff you can receive depending on the total funding level reached.

Level 1 – Single Miniature € 5

You will receive ONE miniature chosen from our campaign EXCEPT the Big Guys.

( Assassin, Bushido, Rat, Thrower, Iron Fang, Blade Clan, Tartalar no weapon, Miss May, Hoky Jo, any Goblin except Bonzo and Dragon. When UNLOCKED: Cheerleader, 2x Team Marker, Big Guy Marker Prone and Stunned ) 

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more

If not please add € 3+1 every 3 additional miniatures from the same level


Level 2 – Star Players and Exclusive Miniature € 7

You will receive ONE Rats Star Player, Wartart, Blade Master, Razorbock, Rinhor, MindGolem, Bonzo, Dragon, Rat Master, or exclusive model miniature chosen from our campaign EXCEPT the Big Guy.

( When UNLOCKED: Glaskart, Haksilam, Skitex, Fetz, Coach, Priest, Sorcerer, Yosu, 3 Block Dices, Two Heads Assassin, Horned Bushido )

If you choose the Wartart, write us which kind of weapon and head you want.

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more

If not please add € 3+1 every 3 additional miniature from the same level


Rats Dice –  3 Rats Dice € 7

Block Dices: 

Custom block dice for the Hand of Death

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more

If not please add € 3+1 every additional miniature from the same level


Rats Pitch –  Rolled-up version € 25

Hand of Death Pitch: 

You will receive one rolled-up version pitch made with the hand of Death theme!

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more for the States below:

Austria - Belgium - France - Germany - United Kingdom - Greek - Luxembourg - Malta - Netherlands - Czech republic - Portugal - Romania - Spain - Hungary - Canda - Japan - Iceland - San Marino - USA - Switzerland

 For the other states if combined with level 5 or more please add 5 Euro (20 Euro for Oceania)

If you don't have take any level 5 perk or more, please add

€ 15 for Europe

€ 20 for Americas - Asia - Africa

€ 26 for Oceania 


Level 3 – Big Guy Miniature € 16

You will receive ONE Big Guy miniature.

( Ratt-Oni, Mecha Tartalar, Oni-Troll)

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more

If not please add € 3+1 every additional miniature from the same level


LOCKED - Level 4 – Big Guy Star Player Miniature € 18

You will receive ONE Big Guy Star Player miniature. ( Eishin )

FREE shipping if combined with Level 5 or more

If not please add € 3+1 every additional miniature from the same level


Level 5 – Rats Team (Early Bird) € 65

0/15

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins and 2 Throwers miniatures.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Level 6 – Rats Team € 70

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins and 2 Throwers miniatures.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Underworld Team (Eraly Bird) € 75

0/15  

You will receive 2 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 2 Throwers, 1 Oni-Troll and 7 Nippo Goblins miniatures + free add-on from stretch goals achieved.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Level 7 – Rats Full Team (Early Bird) € 80

25/25    

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Level 8 – Rats Full Team € 85

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Level 9 – 5x Rats Full Team € 375

You will receive 30 Rats, 10 Bushidos, 20 Assassins, 10 Throwers and 5 Big Guy miniatures.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 10

Oni Level - € 1000

You will receive a Full Hand of Death team including every stretch goal (even the regular pitch made for this oriental team!) PLUS A Greebo Games miniature designed by you!

Here's the deal in detail: You tell us what kind of miniature you would like, provided it is a rat man in shape, roughly human-sized and fits one of the Hand of death role. We will provide concept sketches with your likeness or the likeness desired by you. The character will become part of the team. This means that we will also be giving it a name based on your own or based on your suggestions. Please keep in mind that the character will have to fit into the Fantasy world, please don't ask us a Mac5 pilot.

In addition to your place in gaming history, you will also receive the original of the character and one Silver (925) model from it. Of course, the production rights, copyright of the sculpt and any commercial licence in any way, shape or form shall remain with Greebo Games. So you're not allowed to make copies of it. You won't have to, mind, because we will also be supplying you with 10 metal casts of your miniature, which should be enough to be getting on with for all sorts of gaming-related purposes.

This perk level will only be available here at Indiegogo! 

FREE shipping worldwide!

0/1


Waag Saabi Team € 90

You will receive 24 models: 4 Goblins, 2 Elites, 4 Ninjas, 1 Bonzo, 1 Dragon, 2 Oni Trolls, 4 Markers, 2 Geishas, 4 Special weapons

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 5


Rat and Goblin Alliance € 165   

5/5

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures, 4 Goblins, 2 Elites, 4 Ninjas, 1 Bonzo, 1 Dragon, 2 Oni Trolls, 4 Markers, 2 Geishas, 4 Special weapons

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 10


Rat and Goblin Alliance € 170 

0/10

You will receive 6 Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures, 4 Goblins, 2 Elites, 4 Ninjas, 1 Bonzo, 1 Dragon, 2 Oni Trolls, 4 Markers, 2 Geishas, 4 Special weapons

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada!

Rest of the World please add € 10


Tartalar bundle (Early Bird) € 90 

0/20

You will receive 15 models + 1 Big guy:

9 Hero chosen from: Wartart (choose weapon), MindGolem, Rhinor (choose head), Razorbog (choose head), Rat Master - when UNLOCKED : Yaso, Blade Master, Add-on

6 Troupe models chosen from: Tartalar, Iron Fang, Blade Clan, Miss May, Hoky Joe  - when UNLOCKED : Yaso, Blade Master, Add-on

1 Mecha Tartalar (Big Guy)

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping

Rest of the World please add € 5


Painted Rat Model (No Big Guy) € 47

You will receive ONE model (NO BIG GUY), master painted by Wolfbane (Alessio Cisbani).

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping

Rest of the World please add € 10

0/10


This is the master level:


Painted Full Rats Team  € 460

You will receive 6 Clan Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures, painted by Wolfbane (Alessio Cisbani). It will come with a Feldherr case.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping

Rest of the World please add € 10

0/2

This is the level:


Master Painted Rats Full Team € 560 

You will receive 6 Clan Rats, 2 Bushidos, 4 Assassins, 2 Throwers and 1 Big Guy miniatures, master painted by Wolfbane (Alessio Cisbani). It will come with a Feldherr case.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping 

1/1

Painted Goblin Model € 73

You will receive ONE model (NO BIG GUY)  master painted by Chiafele Giuseppe (Axia) chosen from GOBLINS range.

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping  

Rest of the World please add € 5

0/6

Painted Waag Saabi Team  € 1114

You will receive a FULL Waag Saabi team master painted by Giuseppe Chiafele ( Axia ) : 4 Goblin, 2 Elite, 4 Ninja, 1 Bonzo, 1 Dragon, 2 Oni Trolls, 4 Markers, 2 Geisha, 4 Special weapon. It will come with a Feldherr case. 

FREE shipping in EU, UK, USA and Canada! Tracked Shipping 

Rest of the World please add € 10

0/1



Here are the Stretch Goals for the campaign:

3.000 € ACHIEVED  - MINIMUM REACHED! The Rats Team is coming on your pitches!

4.000 € ACHIEVED - Every Level 5 or more will get a Rats Team Marker for free! 

4.500 € ACHIEVED - Glaskart Star Player add-on

5.000 € ACHIEVED - Haskilam Star Player add-on

5.500 € ACHIEVED - Every Level 5 or more will get a Big Guy Marker for free! PLUS Fetz Star Player add-on

6.000 € ACHIEVED - Skitex Backstab Star Player add-on

6.500 € ACHIEVED - DOUBLE ADD-ON! Priest AND Yosu

7.000 € ACHIEVED  - Pitch add-on AND Dices add-on

7.500 € ACHIEVED  - every Level 5 or more will get a Cheerleader for free!

8.000 € ACHIEVED   - Coach add-on

8.500 € ACHIEVED  - Sorcerer add-on AND Blade Master add-on

10.000 € ACHIEVED   - Eishin Big Buy Star Player add-on

11.000 € ACHIEVED   - one different Assassin miniature available for every Perk

12.000 € ACHIEVED   - one different Assassin miniature available for every Perk

13.500 € - Two Heads Assassin Star Player Add-on

15.000 € - Every Level 5 or more will get a Star Player for free!!! AND Horned Bushido Star Player Add-on


Facebook Goal:

ACHIEVED  2.000 Likes - every Level 5 or more will get another Rats Team Marker for free!

Backers Goal:

400 Backers - every Level 5 or more will get a STAR PLAYER for free!

Maybe we can also do them...it all depends on YOU!





It seems that the FAQ section is hidden quite well, so here is the top list of questions we have been asked:

Do I need a credit card for that? Can I pay with credit card?

Indiegogo uses Paypal AND credit card for contributions.

Can I upgrade my contribution at a later stage?

Sure, if you can`t resist the temptation as more and more groovy extra bits get revealed, you can contribute the difference to what you want to have now, put a corresponding note in the comments box. Please note that downgrading your contribution is not possible.

Can I make multiple contributions for the same level?

Absolutely, go right ahead.

Can I get a single miniature of the Hand of death set, but with all the bonus options?

No, sorry. In order to be able to offer the sets on Indiegogo at the prices we do, we have to group certain options together.

Can I add regular orders from the Greebo Games shop to my Indiegogo contribution to gain free shipping on that order?

Yes, of course you can. Just tell us in the comments section of the Greebo Games Online Shop, that you have contributed and want to have the contribution and the regular order shipped all in one. But please note, that we ship the Inidegogo goods in June 2014 , so any additional orders from our shop will also be shipped in that date if you link them to the Indiegogo contribution. 

In case you don't want to wait and need some stuff from our store earlier, please have a look at our shipping conditions:

At the end of the campaign, in the pledge manager, you will have the possibility to add material from shop at 50% sales as big thanks to have contributed in our campaign, for level 5 total price or higher.

Italy: 2,50 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 60,-+ EURO

Europe: 5 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 120,-+ EURO

World: 9,00 EURO Shipping, Free Shipping on orders of 180,-+ EURO

the FAQ section is hidden quite well, so here is the top list of questions we
have been asked:
Do I need a
credit card for that? Can I pay with credit card?
Indiegogo uses
Paypal AND credit card for contributions.
Can I upgrade my
contribution at a later stage?
Sure, if you
can`t resist the temptation as more and more groovy extra bits get revealed,
you can contribute the difference to what you want to have now, put a
corresponding note in the comments box. Please note that downgrading your
contribution is not possible.
Can I make
multiple contributions for the same level?
Absolutely, go
right ahead.
Can I get a
single miniature of the Hand of death set, but with all the bonus options?
No, sorry. In
order to be able to offer the sets on Indiegogo at the prices we do, we have to
group certain options together. 
Can I add
regular orders from the Greebo Games shop to my Indiegogo contribution to gain
free shipping on that order?
Yes, of course
you can. Just tell us in the comments section of the Greebo Games Online Shop,
that you have contributed and want to have the contribution and the regular
order shipped all in one. But please note, that we ship the Inidegogo goods in June 2014 , so any additional orders from our shop will also be shipped in that date
if you link them to the Indiegogo contribution. 
In case you
don't want to wait and need some stuff from our store earlier, please have a
look at our shipping conditions:At the end of the campaign, in the pledge manager, you will have the possibility to add material from shop at 50% sales as big thanks to have contributed in our campaign, for level 5 total price or higher.

story:
Welcome !

This is the crowdfounding for Space Collector game.

 This is a small game where you need to collect coins and bonus objects before the time expires to unlock the next levels or beat your personal high-score.  

At this point the game is about 90% done. We only need to costumize the last levels.

 Who we are?

We are 2 young students from Timisoara, Romania.
Our names are Adi and Razvan. Adi is the graphic designer and Razvan is the programmer.

This game started as a fun project but shortly after it turned in a real project for both of us and we decided to develop it for other people to play it.

 

 What do we need the money for?

                 

We need the money to buy the Full License Of Unity3D (iOS Pro and Android Pro). Unity3D with Android and iOS Pro costs $5,625.00 and the fees to indiegogo will be $540.

The full license of Unity3D will provide us great tools to make the game work flawless and our next games

  • $6000 - Unity3D License
  • $7000 - Unity3D License + MacMini 
  • $8000 - All of above + another MacMini
  • $10000 - All of above + Testing Devices (Android / iOS Tablets and Phones)

Currently we do not own any Mac computers/laptops and we need one to build our game ourselves not from friends computers.

                             

 About the game

This game is created in Unity3D with a 3D graphics engine as a Third-Person Arcade Game.
The game has 3 levels of difficulty: Easy, Medium, Hard.
Every type of difficulty has a different character type : The Baby , The Courageous , The Annoyed.

The Baby (Easy)

Easy like a baby's life, all you need to do is to collect the required coins , drop them in the collector in a given time. Isn't that easy?

The Courageous (Medium)

You will feel like an olympic runner, collecting coins and avoiding obstacles in a short time. How good are you?

The Annoyed (Hard)

Beware of the mighty drone.You need to avoid the obstacles, collect the money in a short time and avoid the drone.Do you feel annoyed?

Each level has a different number of coins, waves and time.

What is a "wave"?

A wave is a set of coins that you need to collect and deposit them in the collector.
As soon as you collect all coins and drop them in the collector a new wave will appear in the level.

The game also features different environment, colors and awseome textures:

 

 The Perks

 $1 - The Thank You

  • You will recieve an email with a special thank you for your donation

  $5 - The Good Guy Greg

  • You will recieve an email with a special thank you
  • A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

 $10 - The Game 

  •  You will recieve The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$25 - The Wallpapers

  •  You will recieve 5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$50 - The Credit Name

  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$100 - The 5 Games

  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recieve a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$150 - The Gift

  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$300 - The Source Code

  •  You will recieve the source code
  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$500 - The Goodies Pack

  •  You will recieve all 3D models with texture, sounds and illustration
  •  Source code
  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$1000 - The T-Shirt

  •  You can chose a T-Shirt by model (1,2,3,4) and size
  •  All 3D models with texture sounds and illustration
  •  Source code
  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$2500 - The Special Level

  •  You can name the character because he doesn't have a name and we will make you a special level by your instructions
  •  T-Shirt by model (1,2,3,4) and size
  •  All 3D models with texture sounds and illustration
  •  Source code
  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

$6000 - The Official Sponsor

  •  You become the official sponsor and your name/logo/signature will be on all advertising materials.If you dont have any logo/signature we can create your own one
  •  T-Shirt by model (1,2,3,4) and size
  •  All 3D models with texture sounds and illustration
  •  source code
  •  You will recieve an extra copy of the game to give as a gift
  •  For the next 5 games we launch you will recive a copy of the game
  •  Your name will be in the credit list
  •  5x HD Wallpapers with your favorite Space Collector
  •  The Game
  •  A special thank you
  •  A thank you on our facebook and twitter page for your donation

 

 

 Final words

We hope that we convinced you that we are motivated and we want to make more awesome games in the future. 
I the end we would like to thank you for giving us a moment and for helping us with what you can.

Please support us to make this game a reality.

story:
About us

Vichitra Games is founded by Rohit Kulkarni in July 2015. 'Vichitra' is a Sanskrit word and the meaning of Vichitra is distinct or out of the box. As the name suggests, the objective of Vichitra Games is to create different games and entertain wide variety of users.

Till today, Vichitra Games has developed few small games of different categories just to get familiar with whole process about gaming world.

A brief about our last games-

Romi and Road Juliet - It is  a Vichitra (out of the box) game where you will see a Romi running to save his life from a Juliet who is attacking him with her love. The contradiction in game makes it more funny where broken heart indicates life and a full heart received from Juliet ends one life.

Mystery Numbers - It is a puzzle where you need to solve a magic square which ends in equal sum of all rows, columns and diagonals. This magic square was invented by Great Mathematician Ramanujan. The developer Rohit decoded this logic and developed an unique and addictive puzzle based upon it.

(At the moment Our competition is not with other Game developers who have already developed a lot better games than we did, we are competing with ourselves and making sure that our new game is better than our previous one)

What We Need

The purpose of our campaign here is to collect funds for our biggest upcoming project 'Mrityu - a terrifying maze'. It is a 3D thriller game. It is dream project of Vichitra game. As we are team of 8 members (4 developers, 2 quality analyst, 1 graphic designer and 1 manager), fully aspired to put our dream project into reality and eager to see audience response for our tremendous and creative efforts.

We are looking for 20,000$ which will be used in paying salaries of our team members, purchasing resources such as graphic assets, music, sound effects etc.

If we get more than our expectation then we will use it to purchase required tools such as pro version of unity, 3D model making tools etc.

Also, all our efforts will be in vain if we fail to advertise our game and unable to reach all users and game lovers. We've learned that its very difficult to sustain without marketing. So honestly speaking, We will also use the funds for marketing of our game.

If we couldn't get our targeted amount then we have decided our priorities as follows:

1. Complete the development with available resources (If we couldn't reach our target)

2. Get more quality resources. (If we are close to our target)

3. Release the game within decided time lines (March last week or April first week of 2017) (If we reach the target)

4. Purchase tools required for game development (If we cross our target)

5. Spend more on marketing (If we cross our target)

What You Get

Everyone who contributes in our campaign will get promo codes of all our previous games so that you can play it without the trouble of advertisements along with the promo code of Mrityu once it is live in the stores.

You will get other benefits as per your contribution. Please check the Perks section for details. We are offering promo codes of our previous games to every one who contributes, but there is a limit to generate number of promo codes per app. Once this limit is crossed we can make the paid app free for certain period for our contributors.

The Impact

Your contribution is very important to us, since this project means a lot to our team and therefore we decided to use this platform. We've learned the basics of game development process without expecting anything by releasing our first few games, and now we believe that we can develop much better games if we get enough support. With every new project we will learn new things and we will improve ourselves in the next project.

 

Risks & Challenges

If we could not reach our target then there is a risk of not able to release the game in given time lines.

Funding is the challenge, we need to overcome this challenge by trying to earn from our other services which may impact the 'Mrityu' project time lines. Even though our priority is 'Mrityu', we can not run away from the bitter truth of required fundings !

Other Ways You Can Help

We know everyone can not contribute to every project, but money is not the only thing with which you can help us. You can still download our games which are available in the stores. You can follow us on facebook, twiiter, youtube etc. Share it with your friends.

It will increase our motivation !

Funding is the challenge, we need to overcome this challenge by trying to earn from our other services which may impact the 'Mrityu' project time lines. Even though our priority is 'Mrityu', we can not run away from the bitter truth of required fundings !

Other Ways You Can Help
We know everyone can not contribute to every project, but money is not the only thing with which you can help us. You can still download our games which are available in the stores. You can follow us on facebook, twiiter, youtube etc. Share it with your friends.
It will increase our motivation !

story:
Who Makes a Game About Squares?

Well I do. I'm Ben Lewis and I'm the founder of Neural Shunt Media. It's a design and consulting firm that I originally created to make zombie survival kits (http://www.zombiesak.com/). I'm also one of the co-founders behind Mystery Envelope.

While working on Mystery Envelope I was inspired to design a small portable game with simple but fun gameplay mechanics. I've spent over two years designing this game and building out many, many prototypes.

I finally have a version that's ready for a full public beta and I need help funding the production of the game, and that's where I need your help...

I need your $ and your support, you get a sweet game.

With your help I can overcome the barriers to make this a full commercial game:

  • The game pieces are a special design so I need funds to have a custom die set up (I currently cut them out by hand).
  • I need more people to test the game and give me feedback. Even with a great game I want to make sure that I didn't miss anything.
  • My current orders have been small. I want to test out my current supplier and operating processes on my end to make sure I can exceed expectations.
  • You'll get a game that's already gone through extensive testing.
  • This version is going to include some special options that are not offered in later versions.
  • I will include game piece and expansion updates for those that opt for them.

As of 07/23 we're about to hit our $500 mark so here are our stretch goals!

  • $1000 - This will give us the funding to bring Square Game to PAX east in 2017! It would be amazing to be in front of that may people and PAX has a great indie board game section. Anyone who's getting a game will also receive an extra token pack that lets them play with up to 4 players.
  • $2000 - If we keep getting backers this level will allow us to do a larger production order. It'll lower our costs so not only will we be able to go to PAX but people that are getting the game will also get another special action piece (in addition to the one that they get from fully funding the campaign), they'll also get the additional token pack.
  • $5000 - With this many backers it'll allow us to do some serious regional promotion for the game. In addition to PAX East we'll also bring the game to TempleCon in Rhode Island, TotalCon in Mass, and SnowCon in Maine. Backers that are buying the game will also get the extra tokens and action game pieces!


What You Get

First and foremost you get our appreciation! This is a huge deal for me, I never thought that this game would turn out as well as it has and I really want to share it with people.

If you're backing the game you'll get the original version of the game:
  • Game box
  • Instructions
  • Game piece bag
  • 54 Square Game pieces
  • 24 double sided play tokens
This is enough for either a 3x3 or 4x4 grid and for two people to play (four people could play if you're doing teams).

The Impact

With the horrible Bastille Day attack on Nice I really can't raise money for my own causes without helping the victims of this attack. You'll notice two ways that you can back this campaign and help the victims of the Bastille Day attack.

  1. Select the backing option with an additional $5 donation to Center for Disaster Philanthropy's Fund for Nice.
  2. Opt for the "Les Bleus" version of the game. This is a special version of the game that I'll be creating only for this Indiegogo campaign where half of the money raised will go to charities that represent the values of Liberty, Egalite, and Fraternity.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't back this campaign there's plenty that you can do to help me out!

  • Share information about the game with your friends.
  • Ask for the game as a gift.
  • Talk to your local game stores or independent retailers to see if they'd like to carry Square Game.
  • Donate directly to a charity that's helping the victims of the Bastille Day attacks.
  • Just be a wonderful person and lend a helping hand to someone in need.
