story:
Keys Keys Keys (Also a belated "WE DID IT!")

Release keys will begin going out right now. Expect an email sometime today or early next week with your steam code for the game. The game unlocks April 5th at noon PST.  Soundtrack and Development scrapbook keys will be sent separately to the Deluxe Junker backers and up later next week.

Here are some of the things we have been working on around the clock for launch:

Twitch Chat

Twitch chat is now visible in game and you can set it to any twitch.tv chat channel you want, so all you streamers out there can see whats going on in your chat while you play.

Leaderboards

We have implemented a leaderboard so you can see where you rank in game now. Eventually we would like to make this pretty robust and have ranks per game mode but this is a start!

Player Stats

A big goal of ours is to implement ranked play down the road. We have started by providing a rank and player stats however they are only used for bragging rights at the moment

(As you can see my character stats in the Editor are pretty bad at the moment)

Soundtrack

Michael has compiled all the songs he wrote for the game into the soundtrack and we're looking at 37 original songs with over 2 hours of music! The soundtrack will be available on itunes from Michael (link coming later) if you didn't pick up a deluxe junker perk in time.

VOIP upgraded

We have completely upgraded the in game Voip system. The game will use your Vive mic to let you communicate with other players, the grip button is push to talk.

Lots of Polish

We have made a major push for some final polish to the game, updating textures, lighting, adding special effects to many things. All ships now have special effects like so:

Character clothing color is now selectable to differentiate yourself while we work on getting additional character models implemented. Recoil animations have been updated to work at 90fps (they don't look shaky anymore!).  We have implemented the final Steam Achievements, trading cards, etc. as well!

Hover Junkers is no longer listed as Early Access on Steam

Some of you may have noticed Hover Junkers is no longer listed as Early Access on steam. We feel we have reached version 1.0 with Multiplayer and are ready to release! We still fully plan to support the game with frequent updates post launch including Singleplayer, additional modes, more weapons, more characters, more ships, and more weirdness.

Thank you all for backing and making this campaign successful, we can't wait to see you all in VR!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SETTLERS MONUMENT

For all of you awesome backers out there, here are some screenshots of the in game Settlers Monument memorial where your name will be listed for all players to see!

You will have a chance to set the name you want on it after the campaign is over. Don't worry it doesn't have to be the name you chose when backing, it can be set when we send out the surveys.

(These are example names pulled from the campaign already, if you're on here and are wanting a different name up there, don't worry you will get a chance to send the correct name in!!!).  

Each name shows up pretty huge and are very readable in the headset so don't worry about anyone missing it!

 

The monument can be found in the multiplayer map: New Eden, as well as at the end of the single player campaign when it is available after launch.  

Now for the number one most requested thing: 

This weapon will NOT be available in traditional team deathmatch or free for all, we don't want everyone to feel the need to always be hiding on your ship as you fly around. So this weapon will be saved for when we begin playing with additional modes after launch (There would potentially be a sniper specific game mode), also it will be available for hunting in single player.

it heats up when fired too.

and before you even ask, yes the scope works:

Thank you to all the backers who have shown your appreciation by backing the campaign. We can't wait for you all to get your VR hardware and hop in game for some crazy gunfights!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hover Junkers

In August of 2014 we at Stress Level Zero took a trip up to Valve HQ and were introduced to their VR room and Room-Scale VR. We were in awe of the tech and only wanted to design for such a system.  Unfortunately at the time they couldn't foresee such tech being ready for the home until 2018 or later. Fast forward to March of 2015.  The HTC Vive is announced as a consumer version of the Valve VR Room-Scale experience.  Twenty minutes later we had formulated the initial idea for Hover Junkers:  

"What do we have to work with?"............"A Room"    

"If only rooms could move"......................"They could hover?"  

"Guns?"......................................................"Obviously"  

  

So here we are almost a full year later and the game is nearing completion. VR is absolutely without any doubt the coolest thing we have ever had a chance to create for and couldn't be more excited about the coming consumer launch. We can't wait for all of you to get your hands on the hardware and join us in VR for a technological revolution of near unparalleled potential!


What is Hover Junkers?  Virtual Reality Multiplayer Shooter

Hover Junkers is a multiplayer focused flying platform shooting game built from the ground up exclusively for VR WITH TRACKED CONTROLS ONLY. Choose your ship based on your room scale play area, enter into multiplayer combat areas to claim scrap/loot, and have shootouts against enemy player junkers. Using scrap as defenses against incoming fire, you can physically dodge, hide, and shoot from behind the cover of your ship's defenses.


Why do an IndieGoGo?  Rewarding the Community of Fans

We have been developing Hover Junkers since March 2015, and are now on the final stretch for release.  After receiving many requests for pre-orders and ways for the community to support the game, the best way for us to answer is by providing a limited run campaign here on IndieGoGo. We want to provide the community with special limited rewards for taking such an interest in the project!


Well what happens if the goal isn't met?  The game releases regardless.

The game is coming out regardless of the result of this campaign. We are now down to the final crunch and only need to iron out some last bugs. No matter what, Hover Junkers will be released with the launch of the HTC Vive in April. The purpose for this campaign is to reward supporters who want to get involved early!


When will Hover Junkers be released?  April for the Vive Launch

Hover Junkers is slated to release right along side the HTC Vive in April and will provide early VR adopters with exciting multiplayer VR combat as well as an exciting single player player adventure. When the Oculus Touch releases in Q3-4, Touch players will be able to join in the action as well! You will receive your Steam key shortly after this campaign ends.



Check out this early multiplayer video!

Choose your character, grab your ship, pick a map, and start hunting for junk. Using loot found in lost shipping containers, you fortify your junker in preparation for shootouts with other junk hunters.

More info on Characters, Weapons, and Ships to come!



Single Player

The Single Player campaign pays homage to the survival story genre made popular by the classic 'Oregon Trail'.  Players choose a profession which allots them with a number of credits to spend on goods/resources/trinkets with which they will need to smuggle across the world along with several NPC characters… assuming they survive the trip!

More info on the single player campaign to come!




$35 Basic Junker 
  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • All backers will have their name immortalized on a Settlers Memorial in game


$55 Deluxe Junker

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack download
  • Digital Development Scrapbook


$125 Junk Hunter

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt
  • Hover Junkers Poster
  • And more surprises

$275 Junk Master

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Hover Junkers Poster (signed by the team)
  • Other special surprises
  • Your name and special backstory as an NPC in Single Player
  • Invitation to schedule a studio visit *

$650 Junk Road Pioneer

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Hover Junkers Poster (signed by the team)
  • Other special surprises
  • Your name and special backstory as an NPC in Single Player
  • Invitation to schedule a studio visit *
  • In-game ship attachment piece **

$1800 Hover Junker Builder

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Hover Junkers Poster (signed by the team)
  • Other special surprises
  • Your name and special backstory as an NPC in Single Player
  • Invitation to schedule a studio visit *
  • In-game ship attachment piece **
  • A custom ship built specifically around YOUR room scale (with furniture) **

$1800 Weapon Builder *NEW*

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Hover Junkers Poster (signed by the team)
  • Other special surprises
  • Your name and special backstory as an NPC in Single Player
  • Invitation to schedule a studio visit *
  • In-game ship attachment piece **
  • Custom built Weapon we will co-design together **


$4600 Hover Junk Hero 

  • Hover Junkers Steam code
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Digital Development Scrapbook
  • Hover Junkers t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Stress Level Zero t-shirt (signed by the team)
  • Hover Junkers Poster (signed by the team)
  • Other special surprises
  • Your name and special backstory as an NPC in Single Player
  • Invitation to schedule a studio visit *
  • In-game ship attachment piece **
  • A custom ship built specifically around YOUR room scale (with furniture) ** 
  • Custom built playable character hero based on YOU! (or whoever you want) **


Hover Junkers Steam code:
Shortly after the campaign has completed we will begin sending out an activation code for the game on Steam.    

  

Settlers Memorial:
All backers will have their names immortalized on the Settlers Memorial in game. The settlers memorial will be a large monument with all backers names carved to pay respect towards the brave souls who managed to brave the treacherous trail. Once you reach the monument in VR you will be able to find your name and show off to all your friends; a rite of passage, for any VR pioneer!
  

Digital Development Scrapbook:
After a full year in development we have compiled an absurd amount of art assets, game lore, production diary, development photos, and a ton of information about everything we learned along the way experimenting with and designing for VR. 

Original Soundtrack digital download:

Over 20 tracks of MP3 download of the original soundtrack written and produced just for Hover Junkers by Michael Wyckoff.


Hover Junkers t-shirt:
Special edition Hover Junkers T-shirt limited strictly to this campaign only which features Gunther on a Junk ship.  

Stress Level Zero t-shirt:  
In addition to the Hover Junkers shirt, a classic Stress Level Zero t-shirt will be included as well.  

Hover Junkers Poster:  
Special edition Hover Junkers 11"x17" poster limited strictly to this campaign only.  
  

Other Special Surprises:  
We can't reveal too much here but we want to include a couple extra fun surprises for you that will be limited only to backers of this campaign.  
  

Your name and custom backstory as an NPC in Single Player:  
Part of traveling across worlds in single player is bringing along a randomly generated NPC family and keeping them healthy and safe. Get YOUR name and a custom backstory to display as one of the random NPCs. Other players can and will randomly get your NPC during play-throughs as well so make it good! NOTE: this will be text only.  
  
  
Invitation to schedule a studio visit:
You have an invitation to schedule a visit to our studio and play the game with us. You must provide your own means of travel to/from our studio and lodging if you are not local to the Los Angeles area. The visit must be scheduled with us first! We will announce a schedule for times that will work best!  

In-game ship attachment piece:  
There is quite a bit of junk out there left behind from people who ditched the planet, maybe some of it was yours? With a custom in game ship attachment piece we will model you a custom piece of junk that can be found in loot containers and attached to ships in battle, we can put your name on it, make it a cool object that you like, anything (as long as we can make it fit the style and a couple size requirements)!

  


A custom ship built specifically around YOUR room scale:  
We will work with you to create a custom fit ship designed around your VR room. Maybe a box placed exactly where your desk is, or a couch exactly where your couch is that fits the dimensions exactly. Other players will be able to choose your ship but it will only perfectly fit YOUR room.  This ship can also be styled in a custom tailored way that we will work with you on.  We will hard-code in a special emblem presented on the outside of the ship that will only display when you are flying your ship so everyone knows that it is actually your ship!  
  

A custom built playable character based on YOU (or whoever you want):  
Want to actually be a playable character in Hover Junkers? We will work with you to design a playable character based around you! Your character will need to get somewhat apocalyptic with some interesting costuming (unless that is how you dress in the real world), but we can work with you on designing the perfect character to represent you in VR.  While everyone will be able to select your character as a playable avatar in the game, we will hard-code a special version unique specifically to you (special texture/emblem/accoutrement) so that everyone knows its the real you!


  

  

  

  •   Youtube - Check out all the dev blogs on YouTube and follow the progress!
  •   Twitch - Watch us live every weekday on Twitch!
  •   Steam - Hover Junkers Community hub and Steam page are live! 
  •   Reddit - come hang out on r/hoverjunkers!

* Invitation -If you pledged at the Junk Master tier or higher you have an invitation to schedule a visit to our studio and play the game with us. You must provide your own means of travel to/from our studio and lodging if you are not local to the Los Angeles area. The visit must be scheduled with us first!   

** Custom Items - For custom in game items we will want to schedule a Skype call or come visit (or alternatively a very descriptive email) where we will work together on the concept for each item. These items will be usable by all players however it will be made clear they are specifically yours.

  

  

Contact: info@stresslevelzero.com  

Special thanks to the fans who have watched development all the way since the beginning as well as the new fans who are just being introduced now but are just as excited! We know not many people have had a chance to try modern virtual reality as it is not quite commercially accessible yet. You're still excited about it and you should be; VR is absolutely the coolest thing we have ever seen and don't want anything besides fun VR content. You want the future and we do too, lets make it happen!

Check out this early multiplayer video!





Choose your character, grab your ship, pick a map, and start hunting for junk. Using loot found in lost shipping containers, you fortify your junker in preparation for shootouts with other junk hunters.


More info on Characters, Weapons, and Ships to come!



Single Player


The Single Player campaign pays homage to the survival story genre made popular by the classic 'Oregon Trail'.  Players choose a profession which allots them with a number of credits to spend on goods/resources/trinkets with which they will need to smuggle across the world along with several NPC characters… assuming they survive the trip!





More info on the single player campaign to come!

Hover Junkers Steam code:

Shortly after the campaign has completed we will begin sending out an activation code for the game on Steam.    

  

Settlers Memorial:
All backers will have their names immortalized on the Settlers Memorial in game. The settlers memorial will be a large monument with all backers names carved to pay respect towards the brave souls who managed to brave the treacherous trail. Once you reach the monument in VR you will be able to find your name and show off to all your friends; a rite of passage, for any VR pioneer!
  



Digital Development Scrapbook:
After a full year in development we have compiled an absurd amount of art assets, game lore, production diary, development photos, and a ton of information about everything we learned along the way experimenting with and designing for VR. 





Original Soundtrack digital download:
Over 20 tracks of MP3 download of the original soundtrack written and produced just for Hover Junkers by Michael Wyckoff.



Hover Junkers t-shirt:
Special edition Hover Junkers T-shirt limited strictly to this campaign only which features Gunther on a Junk ship.  


Stress Level Zero t-shirt:  
In addition to the Hover Junkers shirt, a classic Stress Level Zero t-shirt will be included as well.  




Hover Junkers Poster:  
Special edition Hover Junkers 11"x17" poster limited strictly to this campaign only.  

  


Other Special Surprises:  
We can't reveal too much here but we want to include a couple extra fun surprises for you that will be limited only to backers of this campaign.  

  




Your name and custom backstory as an NPC in Single Player:  
Part of traveling across worlds in single player is bringing along a randomly generated NPC family and keeping them healthy and safe. Get YOUR name and a custom backstory to display as one of the random NPCs. Other players can and will randomly get your NPC during play-throughs as well so make it good! NOTE: this will be text only.  

  

  

Invitation to schedule a studio visit:
You have an invitation to schedule a visit to our studio and play the game with us. You must provide your own means of travel to/from our studio and lodging if you are not local to the Los Angeles area. The visit must be scheduled with us first! We will announce a schedule for times that will work best!  


In-game ship attachment piece:  
There is quite a bit of junk out there left behind from people who ditched the planet, maybe some of it was yours? With a custom in game ship attachment piece we will model you a custom piece of junk that can be found in loot containers and attached to ships in battle, we can put your name on it, make it a cool object that you like, anything (as long as we can make it fit the style and a couple size requirements)!


  






A custom ship built specifically around YOUR room scale:  

We will work with you to create a custom fit ship designed around your VR room. Maybe a box placed exactly where your desk is, or a couch exactly where your couch is that fits the dimensions exactly. Other players will be able to choose your ship but it will only perfectly fit YOUR room.  This ship can also be styled in a custom tailored way that we will work with you on.  We will hard-code in a special emblem presented on the outside of the ship that will only display when you are flying your ship so everyone knows that it is actually your ship!  

  


A custom built playable character based on YOU (or whoever you want):  
Want to actually be a playable character in Hover Junkers? We will work with you to design a playable character based around you! Your character will need to get somewhat apocalyptic with some interesting costuming (unless that is how you dress in the real world), but we can work with you on designing the perfect character to represent you in VR.  While everyone will be able to select your character as a playable avatar in the game, we will hard-code a special version unique specifically to you (special texture/emblem/accoutrement) so that everyone knows its the real you!



  
  
  




  Youtube - Check out all the dev blogs on YouTube and follow the progress!


  Twitch - Watch us live every weekday on Twitch!


  Steam - Hover Junkers Community hub and Steam page are live! 


  Reddit - come hang out on r/hoverjunkers!


* Invitation -If you pledged at the Junk Master tier or higher you have an invitation to schedule a visit to our studio and play the game with us. You must provide your own means of travel to/from our studio and lodging if you are not local to the Los Angeles area. The visit must be scheduled with us first!   
** Custom Items - For custom in game items we will want to schedule a Skype call or come visit (or alternatively a very descriptive email) where we will work together on the concept for each item. These items will be usable by all players however it will be made clear they are specifically yours.
  
  

Contact: info@stresslevelzero.com  
Special thanks to the fans who have watched development all the way since the beginning as well as the new fans who are just being introduced now but are just as excited! We know not many people have had a chance to try modern virtual reality as it is not quite commercially accessible yet. You're still excited about it and you should be; VR is absolutely the coolest thing we have ever seen and don't want anything besides fun VR content. You want the future and we do too, lets make it happen!

story:
All in One BFG, Countdown Grenade, Impact Grenade, Tilt Mine, IR Trip Mine. 


We need your pledge so that you can work with us to help us develop this product and make it all it can be. 
Visit our Facebook Page for the latest progress and videos of it working.

Story

An Ex-RAF Electronics Technician with more than 20 Years Electronics experience and more than 10 Years product design experience in both Military and Commercial sectors.

Being an Airsoft player myself, I realised that what was missing was a grenade which every Airsofter would just have to own.

So I went right back to the drawing board and took a look at what would really give me the edge in a game and I came up with the MAS-G Advanced Airsoft Grenade.

Grenades that throw out BB's rely on the BB actually hitting the player which isn't very effective, so I looked at the explosion rule where for example, at my site a bang would take out any player within a 5 metre radius.

I noticed that in wet conditions the striker on many different grenades and flash bangs would become unreliable, also you can not 'dial in' a delay time. This for me was a must as there were some situations where the enemy might have time to retreat.

I also thought, wouldn't it be awesome if it were a tilt and trip wire mine too and then I started thinking and came up with a list of Must Have's


1-9 Second Countdown Grenade

Tilt Mine with Optional 1-9 Second Delay

Virtual Trip Wire Mine also with optional delay

Zero-G 'In Flight' Arming

Beeps after use making it easy to find after the game

Lost and Found website so the finder can enter their details and your serial number

Smart charger which only works with your grenade serial number (Can be disabled)

Waterproof to 30 Metres

Beeper volume and Display brightness control

Interchangeable bases for Blank / Primer pre-loads and other future options

Remote detonation via RIS mounted IR designator (Optional extra)


So here it is... A combination of more than 20 years of electronic and mechanical engineering knowledge and experience, designed, developed and almost ready for production.


What We Need & What You Get

We need you to join us in further developing this product, your feedback and suggestions on how we can improve it and make it better and easier to use in the field. With automatic firmware updates via the smart USB charger, we can implement changes in near real time that you have worked with us to develop. These features can then be tested and used with your MAS-G 

You will get:
1 x MAS-G Advanced Airsoft BFG
1 x Smart Charger and USB Cable
1 x Instruction Manual
1 x BFB (Blank/Primer Firing Base)  for 9mm Blanks or 209 Primers

All we need is your pledge, and your MAS-G Advanced Airsoft Grenade could be taking out the enemy force in this August!

The Perk price is limited to our backers until the end of this crowd funding campaign.
  

Risks and Challenges

 

Luckily for you, I have spent many years developing the components of this product in real combat systems and have combined them together to produce what can almost certainly be called "The Most Advanced Airsoft Grenade in the World!"

There is just a small amount of development left to do and get yours manufactured, for that we just need your pledge.

Something to bare in mind:

Some of you who are looking at this, want to see this and that working before you are prepared to back. 

It's important to understand that you aren't buying a finished product from a shop, for that you can wait until October.

What you are doing by backing this project is: 

1. Showing us that there is a market for this product.

2. Giving us the funding to manufacture the quantity needed for the backers(YOU).

3. Giving us input over the next 60 days prior to receiving your grenades, then while you trial the first batch of MAS-G Advanced Airsoft Grenades giving us feedback.

We understand that there will be tweaks and changes with the software, you will help us with this by giving us your feedback from using it in the field. We can then make the changes and update your Grenade's Firmware over the internet via your PC.

So remember, if you want to see the finished article, then you will have to wait until it's out in the shops... You want to get involved now and be one of the first people to be using one of these in August, then back this project... Otherwise wait and pay the Full RRP in October.


Combined Shipping:

If you want more than two grenades then select the 2 x MAS-G appropriate for requirement or country, then add an additional £50 per grenade up to a maximum of 2 additional grenades. They are over 500g each.


Progress:

06/05/2015
Due to popular demand, we have decided to bring the development of the Blank / Primer Firing base forward as part of this campaign so that you will have a choice of either type.
We are working on this now so it will be ready in time for when the campaign concludes on the 3rd of July.

06/05/2015

We've modified the main body and base so that it rotates and interlocks.


07/05/2015

We've uploaded to Facebook a video of it detonating a proprietary pre-load.


08/05/2015

Over 50% funded in less than 4 days!

Thank you to everyone who has backed the project so far..


08/05/2015

We've revised the body of the grenade to incorporate a groove to allow it to be secured to objects. This will also assist in retaining them in Kydex holder


09/05/2015

Due to lack of interest in the Proprietary Firing Base, we are no longer offering this as an option. There will be other base options including 'Light Flash' to illuminate rooms and disorientate . 


10/05/2015

Created durability test video, we've put the MAS-G to the test.


13/05/2015

Created Ballistic Durability video.


21/05/2015

BFB (Blank Firing Base) Prototype design finalised and ready for production.


04/06/2015

Factory produce first of the BFB prototype parts.


08/06/2015

PCB files sent off for BFB and Smart Charger.


15/06/2015

Prototype BFB Coil Assembly and Charger PCBs received.  

https://youtu.be/qTIEh5d7DAc

https://youtu.be/MYm0f5Atjxg

http://mas-g.molyneux.systems

story:
Welcome to the NEW Manorhouse Workshop Indiegogo project!


Casted also the Arengario

Hello to all.
With a little delay on the roadmap also the Arengario is ready to be put into production.
We have to admit that this model is truly mastodontic.
With many pieces, but easy to assemble and is a real pleasure for the eyes.
Still a moment of patience and the put into production of Arengario finally the bulk of the shipments will start.
Now we leave you with images....

Lorenzo.

Also the rewards are ready.

Hello to all.
The rewards have been completed. Now are in production.
A small advance...

Lorenzo.

The first brick houses were casted.

Hello to all.
Continued the processing of our project funded on Indiegogo.
We have the first resin copies of the brick houses.
A possible composition...

Lorenzo.

Updating our Campaign on Indiegogo: casting all stone houses.

Hello to all.
During the Manifestation of San Marino “Dadi.com” We have delivered the first kits casting of the watermill and the first set of stone houses at the funders Italians that came to visit us in San Marino...

...By next week we will also have brick houses and part of the accessories.
As all you, also we not see the hour to assemble the houses of brick and combine them together with those of stone.

Lorenzo

How to paint the wood and stone house

Hello to all.
An update on the continuing work of the campaign on Indiegogo.
At the moment we are preparing all the kits of houses of brick and stone.
We’re late on the roadmap, but by the end of May and beginning of June we ready to be shipped Watermill, all the houses and the arengario.
in the month of June will be ready kits of walls, towers and manor.
The delay is given by the new system of preparation of the molds that will allow a more rapid production later.
We are confident that the final result will make you forget about our delay.
While also us await to get their hands on the new kits … we continue to work on what we have already in our hands.
Today we present a tutorial on how to paint the house in wood and stone.
Good vision. Lorenzo

How to paint the wood and stone house

It starts with the production of the stone houses

Happy Easter to everyone.
Blog:
New update on how to continue the production of the village.
We started with the production of stone houses.
The first images of wooden and stone cottages make very good result...

Lorenzo

How to assemble the water mill.

Hello to all.
And here we come to how to assemble the mill:
let’s start with the wheel module and the laboratory...

Lorenzo.

Casting of the water mill is completed.

Hello to all.
The mill was completely casted and here’s the result. 

The complete kit:

Lorenzo

Casted a Complex Part of the Mill

Hello to all.
Even the most complex part of the water mill we were able to casting in one piece.
The wheel...

Lorenzo.

Color testing 02

Hello to all.
We also have the stone effect .
External wall in stone of the mill...

Lorenzo

Color testing.

Hello to all.
Update on the test for base color: wood and brick.

Wood effect.
Note the cleanliness of the private piece of sprue.
It remains only a slight “sign” that cleans quickly with a cutter or a sheet of fine sandpaper...

Lorenzo.

The mill to Colors…

Hello to all.
More images of the first printed the mill.
News, the mill will be printed in 3 base colors: stone, brick and wood. Of course all the other kits will be printed in their respective colors...

Lorenzo.


First test print

Hello to all.
first test print.

As you can see the walls have a minimum attack on the sprue (chimneys of casting).
just a little pressure to remove the piece from the sprue.
Of course, the pieces will be private  of the sprue that you see at the base of the piece before being boxed and shipped.
To you it will remain just a little cleanup work to remove any residue due to the separation.

Lorenzo


The water mill ready for printing.


Hello to all.
This is a technical update.
We want to show the various stages of processing of our models.
This is certainly the most boring but also the most important in the whole process of Print.
In fact it is wanted to study a very innovative system and at the same time practical to create the crates for silicone molds with the ability to regenerate in a short time and always with the highest precision the silicones worn out...

Stay tuned. Lorenzo

New update: Great Tournament

Hello to all.
After a certain amount of time devoted to the bureaucratic side and information: relating to various private contacts with all funders of our campaign (to which goes our thanks) we go back to update about the progress of the project.
1 – The Water Mill is ready to go to press. Soon the first images of the printed pattern. There will be a very pleasant news for all of you about the print result. Stay Tuned
2 – We had stopped with  the campaign  at the first pictures of the Grand Tournament…  we want to see how the works are proceeding?

We look forward to the next update. Lorenzo

It’s not over yet.

First of all I will like to personally thank you all for the support.

This campaign has boosted in the last days because you have believed in me and my products, and I will like to reassure you that I will maintain all my promises providing you with a top quality product.


Also since several have contacted me both to join or to expand their order, I am extending sales for another 31 days. This will give actual pledgers time to add to an existing pledge if they want to, and will give a chance to new founder to join.


The post campaign extension will go from the 31st of Jan to the 2nd of March.

During this time all the offers, rewards and conditions available during the campaign will remain the same.
If you want to add or place a new order you can contact me at:  marchetto.lorenzo@gmail.com
When contacting me please send a list of your wants including the various rewards, adding the destination country. All orders received up to the 2nd of March will be mailed at the end of May instead of April as stated in the campaign.

If you are only looking to get the miniatures the shipping charges will be reduced and we will mail them as regular registered recorded mail or priority mail, at a significantly lower price then the heavier kits.

Thank you,
Lorenzo


Hi everyone, my name’s Lorenzo Marchetto, founder of Manorhouse Workshop, which deals with 28-35mm Wargames’ and modelism kit making since more than 13 years.

Our main activity is the production of buildings, sceneray elements, and modular gaming tables for tridimensional wargames and static modelism.

During our years of activity, we did work wiht a lot of national and international societies of this sector, providing them with dioramas, models, and other works. Those societies inclues Games Workshop, Rackham, Italeri, Wizards of the Coast, without forgetting editors’ houses like Hachette and Hobby&Work, or TV channels like Disney Channel and RAI.

When working with privates collectionists or players, we did give birth to historical or fantasy’s reproductions, like Helm’s Deep of the Lord of the Rings, Falkenstein Castle in Corinthia or the Templar Castle of Almuruol in Portugal.

Our passion even made us create Mindstalkers, a 3D Skirmish Wargame in 35mm, which received a Nomination for the "Best of Show" at the prestigious Italian Fair of Lucca Games, finishing as 1st in 3D Wargames category.

Our experience, throughout the years allowed us to project and continuously build a range of modular scenary kits that can thus be combined to create multiple and infinite results, be it for outside or inside scopes, while having an extreme sturdiness yet keeping perfect realism, as you can see (to see hundreds of examples of our works, come visit our Blog!).

It is our wish to keep bettering ourselves, by continue to create new products with new state of the art materials and priting techniques, like we’ve been constantly doing during our long history.
 

Update 21 – Now all the buildings are activated…

…And  you can create all of this!

But also all this.


This new series of kit, while increasing the modular possibilities of modelism and the level of details - and giving you a fresh new design - will be fully compatible with all of our existing products.

This new series of kits will also be produced with an increased industrial policy: the material will be high quality polyreuthane resin, and the production will be done using the latest vacuum and printing technologies, with new generation silicons molds which highly lower down miscasts... and this will mean lower kit prices too!

This innovation will allows us to print the models both sides, while still keeping all doors and windows open to keep all gaming options open.

Whi Indiegogo

This Manorhouse Workshop project is very big and complex, and requires a hefty investment. Our decision to transition from an artisanal production to a new semi industrial one, and to direct client sales allows us to use the Indiegogo platform to its fullest, since it brings us into contact with you, our potential customers.

To bring it to life, we need you. We need your pledge so that we can have "the numbers" to lower production costs, and to gain better delivery costs for all. Indeed, you will be the one to decide if this project is worthy of success. And you will be the one to benefit from all the advantages, discounts and rewards.

By reaching our Indiegogo goal we will be able to start the production, and it will allow you to gain great gifts and rewards, while economizing on the final price... and if the project will rise and pass objectives and objectives, more and more prices and adds-on will be open to you!


Update 24 – Activated Great tournament

Hello to all.
Activated Also the perk dedicated to the Grand Tournament.
(Soon we will post the item pictures)

Grand Tournament.
Consist: of stage for noble 23x8h12 cm., a carousel for knights 30 cm., 2 tents, the game of Quintana and fences. price only for Campaign: 30,00 euro. ended campaign; 40,00 euro. weight about: 400 g. – Material: polyurethane resin. Free Shipping throughout Italy: outside, see “Delivery” section.

Update 23 – Activated 2 more new female warriors

Activated 2 more new female warriors
Sculpted by Andrea Bellarte

Update 22 – Shady characters they arrive in the night to the village.

Hello to all.
We begin to make “live” the village. Beginning a new partnership, which bears fruit very interesting. Here are the first 6 characters in 32 mm.
Sculpted by Andrea Bellarte

Painted by Marco “Irminsul” Bariselli: irminsul@libero.it

Perk: 6 miatures in 32 mm. price only for Campaign: 28,00 euro. (4,60 to piece) to ended campaign; 36,00 euro. weight about: 70 g. – Material: polyurethane resin. Free Shipping throughout Italy: outside, see “Delivery” section.

Update 20 – Activated the Manor House

Hello to all.
activated the Manor House

3 corner towers, 2 watchtowers, 1 barbican, 3 fortified walls, 1 house 3 storey. dimensions: 40x32xh32 cm. price only for Campaign: 260,00 euro. ended campaign; 325,00 euro. weight about: 6700 g. – Material: polyurethane resin. Free Shipping throughout Italy: outside, see “Delivery” section.

Lorenzo.

Update 17 – How to work the new sheets – 02

Hello to all.

Everything you need to know about the rewards.

Backers Rewards

Choose your rewards or add-ons:
you can choose from many rewards packages and add-ons at a special price for the campaign.
The rewards 01 - 03 - 04 - 05 - 06 - 09 - 10 -11 -12 - 13 - 14 - 15 - 17 - 19.  they can be chosen with the purchase of 1 these perks.
Perk 2: six complete houses – 01.
Perk 3: six complete houses – 02.
more purchases of these two perks allow you to choose a different reward each time.

These two perks can access to all rewards  published.
Perk 4: six complete houses + 1 watermill 01.
Perk 5: six complete houses + 1 watermill 02.
more purchases of these two perks allow you to choose a different reward each time.

(List of rewards)

Time schedule

The shipping of the goods will start three months after the end of the campaign. About the end of  April 2014.

Maybe some items will be ready before this limit, and so will be shipped before this term, but we have to consider the production of the entire project as "real" term to be given to you to be realistic.

Door to door delivery cost

Italy: free delivery on all the national territory. 

European Union (EU): add 20,00 Euro on the overall expense (for a maximum weight of 30 kg).

Switzerland - Norway - Gibilterra : add 35,00 Euro on the overall expense (for a maximum weight of 30 kg).

 U.S.A.:

  • weight from 1 to 5 kg: add 25,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 6 to 10 kg: add 30,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 11 to 15 kg: add 40,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 16 to 20 kg: add 55,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 21 to 30 kg: add 80,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 31 to 50 kg: add 110,00 Euro on the overall expense.

Australia:

  • weight from 1 to 2 kg: add 30,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 3 to 7 kg: add 33,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 8 to 11 kg: add 47,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 12 to 15 kg: add 60,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 16 to 20 kg: add 75,00 Euro on the overall expense.
  • weight from 21 to 27 kg: add 87,00 Euro on the overall expense.

Rest of the world: please contact us first by email: marchetto.lorenzo@gmail.com 

The above weight limits apply on the overall purchase for this Indiegogo project, of course as long as the delivery stays on the same region/weight selection as the first purchase.

Example: one purchaser buys a first perk for 5 kg worth of material. The goods need to be delivered in Germany.

Later, the same purchaser wants to buy some other goods of this Indiegogo project. As long as the overall goods purchased do not go over the 30 kg limit (weight or volume), there won’t be any additional 20 Euro delivery expense for the second, third, etc purchase.

Welcome to the NEW Manorhouse Workshop Indiegogo project!Casted also the ArengarioHello to all. With a little delay on the roadmap also the Arengario is ready to be put into production. We have to admit that this model is truly mastodontic. With many pieces, but easy to assemble and is a real pleasure for the eyes.
Still a moment of patience and the put into production of Arengario finally the bulk of the shipments will start.
Now we leave you with images....Lorenzo.Also the rewards are ready.Hello to all.
The rewards have been completed. Now are in production.
A small advance...Lorenzo.The first brick houses were casted.Hello to all.
Continued the processing of our project funded on Indiegogo.
We have the first resin copies of the brick houses.
A possible composition...Lorenzo.Updating our Campaign on Indiegogo: casting all stone houses.Hello to all.
During the Manifestation of San Marino “Dadi.com”
 We have delivered the first kits casting of the watermill and the first
 set of stone houses at the funders Italians that came to visit us in 
San Marino......By next week we will also have brick houses and part of the accessories.As all you, also we not see the hour to assemble the houses of brick and combine them together with those of stone.
LorenzoHow to paint the wood and stone houseHello to all. An update on the continuing work of the campaign on Indiegogo. At the moment we are preparing all the kits of houses of brick and stone. We’re late on the roadmap, but by the end of May and beginning 
of June we ready to be shipped Watermill, all the houses and the 
arengario. in the month of June will be ready kits of walls, towers and manor. The delay is given by the new system of preparation of the molds that will allow a more rapid production later. We are confident that the final result will make you forget about our delay. While also us await to get their hands on the new kits … we continue to work on what we have already in our hands. Today we present a tutorial on how to paint the house in wood and stone. Good vision. Lorenzo
How to paint the wood and stone houseIt starts with the production of the stone housesHappy Easter to everyone.Blog:New update on how to continue the production of the village.
We started with the production of stone houses.
The first images of wooden and stone cottages make very good result...LorenzoHow to assemble the water mill.Hello to all.
And here we come to how to assemble the mill:
let’s start with the wheel module and the laboratory...Lorenzo.Casting of the water mill is completed. Hello to all.
The mill was completely casted and here’s the result. 
The complete kit:
LorenzoCasted a Complex Part of the MillHello to all. Even the most complex part of the water mill we were able to casting in one piece. The wheel... 
Lorenzo.
Color testing 02Hello to all.
We also have the stone effect .
External wall in stone of the mill...LorenzoColor testing.Hello to all.
Update on the test for base color: wood and brick.Wood effect.
Note the cleanliness of the private piece of sprue.
It remains only a slight “sign” that cleans quickly with a cutter or a sheet of fine sandpaper... Lorenzo.The mill to Colors…Hello to all. More images of the first printed the mill. News, the mill will be printed in 3 base colors: stone, brick 
and wood. Of course all the other kits will be printed in their 
respective colors... 
Lorenzo.First test printHello to all.first test print.As you can see the walls have a minimum attack on the sprue (chimneys of casting).just a little pressure to remove the piece from the sprue.
Of course, the pieces will be private  of the sprue that you see at the base of the piece before being boxed and shipped.
To you it will remain just a little cleanup work to remove any residue due to the separation.
LorenzoThe water mill ready for printing.Hello to all. This is a technical update. We want to show the various stages of processing of our models. This is certainly the most boring but also the most important in the whole process of Print.
In fact it is wanted to study a very innovative system and at the same 
time practical to create the crates for silicone molds with the ability 
to regenerate in a short time and always with the highest precision the 
silicones worn out...Stay tuned. LorenzoNew update: Great TournamentHello to all.After a certain amount of time devoted to the bureaucratic side 
and information: relating to various private contacts with all funders 
of our campaign (to which goes our thanks) we go back to update about 
the progress of the project.
1 – The Water Mill is ready to go to press. Soon the first images of the
 printed pattern. There will be a very pleasant news for all of you 
about the print result. Stay Tuned
2 – We had stopped with  the campaign  at the first pictures of the 
Grand Tournament…  we want to see how the works are proceeding?
We look forward to the next update. LorenzoIt’s not over yet.
First of all I will like to personally thank you all for the support.
This campaign has boosted in the last days because you have believed 
in me and my products, and I will like to reassure you that I will 
maintain all my promises providing you with a top quality product.


Also since several have contacted me both to join or to expand their 
order, I am extending sales for another 31 days. This will give actual 
pledgers time to add to an existing pledge if they want to, and will 
give a chance to new founder to join.





The post campaign extension will go from the 31st of Jan to the 2nd of March.
During this time all the offers, rewards and conditions available during the campaign will remain the same.
If you want to add or place a new order you can contact me at:  marchetto.lorenzo@gmail.com
When contacting me please send a list of your wants including the 
various rewards, adding the destination country. All orders received up 
to the 2nd of March will be mailed at the end of May instead of April as
 stated in the campaign.




If you are only looking to get the miniatures the shipping 
charges will be reduced and we will mail them as regular registered 
recorded mail or priority mail, at a significantly lower price then the 
heavier kits.
Thank you,
Lorenzo




Hi everyone, my name’s Lorenzo Marchetto, founder of Manorhouse Workshop, which deals with 28-35mm Wargames’ and modelism kit making since more than 13 years.
Our main activity is the production of buildings, sceneray elements, and modular gaming tables for tridimensional wargames and static modelism.
During our years of activity, we did work wiht a lot of national and international societies of this sector, providing them with dioramas, models, and other works. Those societies inclues Games Workshop, Rackham, Italeri, Wizards of the Coast, without forgetting editors’ houses like Hachette and Hobby&Work, or TV channels like Disney Channel and RAI.
When working with privates collectionists or players, we did give birth to historical or fantasy’s reproductions, like Helm’s Deep of the Lord of the Rings, Falkenstein Castle in Corinthia or the Templar Castle of Almuruol in Portugal.

Our passion even made us create Mindstalkers, a 3D Skirmish Wargame in 35mm, which received a Nomination for the "Best of Show" at the prestigious Italian Fair of Lucca Games, finishing as 1st in 3D Wargames category.
Our experience, throughout the years allowed us to project and continuously build a range of modular scenary kits that can thus be combined to create multiple and infinite results, be it for outside or inside scopes, while having an extreme sturdiness yet keeping perfect realism, as you can see (to see hundreds of examples of our works, come visit our Blog!).

It is our wish to keep bettering ourselves, by continue to create new products with new state of the art materials and priting techniques, like we’ve been constantly doing during our long history. 

Update 21 – Now all the buildings are activated…
…And  you can create all of this!But also all this.
This new series of kit, while increasing the modular possibilities of modelism and the level of details - and giving you a fresh new design - will be fully compatible with all of our existing products.
This new series of kits will also be produced with an increased industrial policy: the material will be high quality polyreuthane resin, and the production will be done using the latest vacuum and printing technologies, with new generation silicons molds which highly lower down miscasts... and this will mean lower kit prices too!
This innovation will allows us to print the models both sides, while still keeping all doors and windows open to keep all gaming options open. 
Whi IndiegogoThis Manorhouse Workshop project is very big and complex, and requires a hefty investment. Our decision to transition from an artisanal production to a new semi industrial one, and to direct client sales allows us to use the Indiegogo platform to its fullest, since it brings us into contact with you, our potential customers.
To bring it to life, we need you. We need your pledge so that we can have "the numbers" to lower production costs, and to gain better delivery costs for all. Indeed, you will be the one to decide if this project is worthy of success. And you will be the one to benefit from all the advantages, discounts and rewards.
By reaching our Indiegogo goal we will be able to start the production, and it will allow you to gain great gifts and rewards, while economizing on the final price... and if the project will rise and pass objectives and objectives, more and more prices and adds-on will be open to you!Update 24 – Activated Great tournamentHello to all.Activated Also the perk dedicated to the Grand Tournament.(Soon we will post the item pictures)
Grand Tournament.

Later, the same purchaser wants to buy some other goods of this Indiegogo project. As long as the overall goods purchased do not go over the 30 kg limit (weight or volume), there won’t be any additional 20 Euro delivery expense for the second, third, etc purchase.

story:
Battleground USA is a turn based election game that combines strategy elements with turn based board game mechanics into a fun, humorous, and educational iOS game.


You select your candidate and lead a campaign to win the US election by traveling from state to state across the map taking various actions to raise your poll numbers and sway these states to your side (you do this by building up influence points)! If you hold a state by the end of the turns, you get that state's electoral votes.  The player with the most electoral votes at the end of the game wins!

You can also set the length of the election by setting the amount of turns it takes to finish the game, so you can choose whether your going for a quick game or in for the long haul!

So those are the basic mechanics of the game!


The game is about 75 percent complete and well under way, your contributions will specifically go towards additional artwork, animations, sound, and testing! Become a backer and help make Battleground USA come to life!

Robert - Designer/Lead

David - Concept Art/Graphic Design

Brian - Music

Daniel - Code Development

If you hold a state by the end of the turns, you get that state's electoral votes.  The player with the most electoral votes at the end of the game wins!You can also set the length of the election by setting the amount of turns it takes to finish the game, so you can choose whether your going for a quick game or in for the long haul!So those are the basic mechanics of the game!The game is about 75 percent complete and well under way, your contributions will specifically go towards additional artwork, animations, sound, and testing! story:
The Tempest Two - Atlantic Challenge - Join Our Adventure!


WHO ARE THE TEMPEST TWO?
James Whittle & Tom Caulfield are two regular 25 year olds attempting to achieve something extraordinary. Together they make up The Tempest Two, one of around 20 teams aiming to row the Atlantic Ocean in December 2015. The challenge ahead is widely regarded as the hardest-race-on-earth, and would seemingly only be attempted by the toughest, most seasoned athletes this planet has to offer, the rugged expedition-hardened individuals that only seem to exist in fiction and film. However, like in any tale of adventure, there is often an underdog.

Watch our second film below, Follow us on Facebook, Twitter & Instagram.
@thetempesttwo | The Tempest Two



THE ATLANTIC CROSSING

The Tempest Two will be taking part in the 2015 Talisker Whiskey Challenge, a 3000 mile rowing race from La Gomera in the Canary Islands, to the Caribbean island of Antigua. The gruelling voyage is widely known as the toughest-race-on-earth, and is guaranteed to push participants to their absolute limits both mentally and physically.

The pair aim to join an elite group of 500 who have completed the crossing, a far smaller number than Everest Summiteers and North Pole Expeditionists.

                                      

Once the race begins, James and Tom will row 24 hours a day in shifts of 2 hours-on, 2 hours-off for up to 60 days straight.

Alongside the punishing physical regime, the boys will face some very sizable obstacles in order to reach their destination. Unfortunately, the Atlantic isn't an environment renown for 'Plain Sailing', and the threat of hurricane strength storms and swells in excess of 50 foot are a likely adversary. 

Sharks and Whales are also an innate fear that could become a reality, the majority of crossings to date have had close shaves with curious predators, with one boat being repeatedly rammed by a hungry shark and others escaping the unassuming power of a tail-fin by a whisker.

The crossing itself could last over 2 months, but the journey has already begun. For the next 365 days, the boys will try their best to prepare themselves for the task, and gain as much knowledge from others to build their confidence and know-how heading into the race. Having no rowing experience whatsoever places an even greater emphasis on preparation, and becoming comfortable and able on-the-sea.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?
In order for the dream to become a reality, the Tempest Two must raise an initial £120,000 to reach the start line. This cost covers everything from building a sea-ready boat, to the food packs that will give them energy they need to reach Antigua. 
Once the initial money is raised, then the true magic happens, as every penny will be split between the pairs chosen charities; Make-A-Wish Foundation & Brain Tumour Research. 
The boys aim to raise a staggering £200,000 to split between the two, which would make an enormous impact on the lives of those who need it most.


THE PERKS
Any donation is hugely appreciated, and there are a number of perks available in exchange for a certain amount of money. If you simply want to make a donation above £10 but don't want any of the more expensive perks, then just donate your amount and send us as many Join The Voyage images that you like. Below is a brief explanation of each of them:

Join The Voyage - £10


Ticket to The Tempest Two Launch Party + Join The Voyage Entry - £30
Before the voyage begins in December 2015, the Tempest Two will be holding a farewell launch party in London. Drinks, a raffle, music and a final farewell. Please do grab a group of friends and join the boys for a drink before they set off into the unknown. Details of venue and date will be disclosed nearer the time.

Ltd. Edition 'The Tempest Two' Photo Journal + Join The Voyage Entry - £65


The 500 Club - £500


A Day On The Water With The Tempest Two + A Join The Voyage Entry = £265pp
Join The Tempest Two for a days rowing off the coast of the UK. Get to grips with the everyday routine of an ocean rower, and spend some time with the boys who will reveal what a day at sea is like. A fantastic chance to get out on the sea and get your hands dirty. Maximum groups of 3 at one time, with dates being organised to fit the participants diary.

The Tempest Two Signed Rowing Oars - £1200

FAQ's
What happens if you raise more than the £50,000 target?
If the Indiegogo campaign goes really well, which is a real possibility, then there is no ceiling on what can be donated. If you see the target has been hit, you are not too late, as there is no limit to what can be raised.
Will there be more perks if the existing ones sell out?
There are a number of additional perks that will be added along the way, so keep your eyes peeled and keep checking back in.
What if I forget to donate during the 60 days?
Once the Indiegogo campaign runs out, please do head to thetempesttwo.com and click on the 'Support' tab for more details on how to help the pair.

story:
National Game Day at Norfolk Public Library

Armis in conjunction with the Norfolk Initiative for Chess Excellence (NICE) are co-sponsoring National Game Day at all 12 of the City of Norfolk Public Libraries in Norfolk Virginia.

Our goal is to supply all 12 libraries with 5 chess sets each, at a wholesale rate of only $8 per chess set, resulting in a campaign goal of $480. The minimum goal for indiegogo is $500

NICE is coordinating the National Game Day Initiative and ultimately responsible for providing games, photos, and video production. 

Armis will share the responsibility of providing games to the extent of providing premiums for this campaign, and all of the funding (up to $200) not secured by this campaign. 

Norfolk State University, and Old Dominion University will be providing Chess teachers.

If we exceed our goal all of the proceeds will go to the Norfolk Library system.

This is a very short campaign, please contribute and tell others about the campaign.  

To know more about Armis visit www.ArmisGame.com
To know more about NICE visit www.NiceChess.com
To know more about Norfork Game Day Events visit: www.NPL.lib.va.us

thanks

story:
Who is FobTi interactive?

FobTi interactive is a small independent video game development studio based in the Slovakia and founded by Tibor Fobel. The core team is composed of 3 peoples. 

What is Obludia?

Obludia is an old-school arcade arena action inspired by classics such as Robotron or Smash-TV with RPG elements!  Obludia will be released as a Windows PC game initially, hopefully on Desura or Steam.

You can test the Beta version very soon. Check regularly or follow us on Twitter to get the latest updates!

Full Game Features

  • 50 levels full of thrilling action!
  • Old-School arcade gameplay!
  • Destroy Hordes of monsters like: Zombies, Skeletons, Spiders and more.
  • Fight with 5 powerful Bosses.
  • Level up your little Necromancer - collect more powerful spells, weapons and armor.
  • AND MUCH MORE!

Begin your quest to slay the horde of monsters! The evil awaits...

 

Why we need your help?

We are working on the game in our free time and our goal at $3 000 is minimal needed to enable for some of us to work full time. With this money, we will be able to pay some legal fees and our music composer.

 

What happens if you get over-funded?

If we get more than 5 000$, we will make an Android version of the game! \o/

 

Any other way of support?

Please help spread the word! Share this campaign with your friends on Facebook, or Twitter. Any good word helps.

 

Thanks for supporting!

story:
Community Ad Fund Goals

Here is our mission for this funding:

  • Two slots on MMORPG.com Forums (Square & Top Leader)
  • 30 days of consecutive "live" advertising
  • 1.5+ Million Impressions
  • Increased Google Adwords reach

The Dollars Broken Down

Here's how the funding is working:

  • $1500 to MMORPG (30 days + 1.5 Million Impressions)
  • $100 for Graphic Design
  • $1400 to Adwords (280 Days of new countries reach)

The Impact

By accomplishing this funding, we see a dramatic growth of players entering the game and subscribing to the game. All of these new areas hit increase a large outcome of needed gamers.

  • Hundreds (if not thousands) of new accounts
  • Higher conversion rates
  • Increased opportunity for long-term advertising funds

 

Spread the word

Let your squad mates and fellow gamers know about this funding project, it will do wonders for the game.

PayPal Contributors

When you go through the process of contributing via PayPal, "Knight Airsoft LLC" will be the donation area you see. This is XOOM's business account, and is all going to the actual funding process of this initiative.

Surplus Funds (Beyond the Goal)

Will all be contributed to Marketing efforts, primarily our Google Adwords campaign which delivers 30-40 new accounts per day right now, we will double or triple that number with what is left over.

story:
Survive The Living Dead

During a test failure on bio-genetics at LA's General Lab Research Center the virus called V113 escaped captivity and infected its first human host, the virus then infected almost everyone causing them to turn aggressive and people called this the "EarthQuake", the world fell apart and humanity only had a few living souls left, this is the time where survival is key, having friends is best and staying away from the dead is almost impossible. 
This is the "AfterShock"... 

What We Need & What You Get

Why Make A IndieGoGo?:

  • We Need Money to build the project and to hire modelers and other coders to help make the game more unique.
  • We have many different perks which you can get based on how much you input!
  • The funds will go towards buying assets and hiring modelers/animators

The Game

  • Parkour
  • Base building
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Dynamic Weather
  • Loot spawns
  • Food System
  • + More

Risks & Challenges

We Will Face Many Troubles On The Way.

  • This project is big, it will very difficult to replicate our dreams/goals for the game but with your support we can reach these goals!

story:
Thank you for supporting our game! We are planning on rebooting our campaign in the future. Please check out our company page at www.whimindie.com/home/games/selatria for more information. Thanks!

 

 

Check out our free playable demo!

 

View our Pitch

 

Take a look at screenshots and media in our gallery! 

 

FAQ

 

"Like" us on Facebook

 

One hundred years ago, the continents of Faylien and Dakk’rund were in the midst of a global conflict. In a last ditch effort, the forces of Faylien proposed an end-all solution to the Dakk’rian invasion: destroy its selactic source, the vessel containing the sum of the continents magical energies.


Although the Dakk’rians were repelled and the war was brought to an end, there were some irreversible damages to the Dakk’rian continent due to the destruction of the selactic source. The people stopped aging. The environment began to rot. Lush trees and forests became gray brush and dusty barren valleys.

 

The Dakk'rians never forgot the humiliation and pain they suffered due to Faylien's daring and reckless strategy. Even though it took one hundred years, they were finally ready to bring about their revenge. Peaceful days in Faylien are coming to an abrupt end, and it is up to you as Mage and his friends to end the enemy invasion and take back your home!

 

 

Pictured left to right: Paul Vela, Grover Wimberly IV, Matthew Estrada, and Jonathan Dishaw

 

Whim Independent Studios is a new independent game development company formed in late 2012 by Grover Wimberly IV, Matthew Estrada, and Paul Vela.


Our aim is to create fun games of many different genres in order to appeal to a wide variety of audiences. Along with Selatria, the development studio is working on an upcoming mobile game coded in ActionScript3 and another action game which is currently in the conceptual stages.

 

Full Team Bio Link

 

Full Team Roster Link

 

 

 

Up until this point, we have been developing Selatria for free with with relatively limited resources. We would use your support to completely fulfill the game’s vision. This includes commissioning artists, sound designers, composers, and game designers and programmers to make sure the development of Selatria can see completion. We would like to use the development funds to make the current assets consistent with each other.

 

After evaluating startup costs and commissioning the team, we have deduced that in order to complete the main story in our project, we would need at least $5000 for the fundraising campaign. We also have ideas for stretch goals if we can gather enough support!

 

Not everyone can donate, we know times are tough. But if you like what we are doing, please, tell your friends and family. Anything you can do helps: watch our trailers, "like" us on Facebook, "like" this campaign, gives us a shoutout on Google+, hashtag Selatria, whatever helps spread the word.

 


 

Game Production: 29.05%

 

Sound: 16.5%

 

Voice Actors: 18.8%

 

Administration: 5%

 

Art Team: 29.7%

 

 

4-9% - Indiegogo’s Share (4 if goal is reached, 9 if it isn’t.)

 

10% - Studio Fees (Studio-related Bills, Business Internet, Initial game engine investments)

 

 

71%-78% - Distributed among the team in the form of commission payments. 

 

  

 

 

Selatria (Sel’-ə-tri”-ə) is the collective name of the free-flowing magical energy that flows throughout the world. The essence is released freely through openings called Selactic Sources, and those who can feel/sense the essence are allowed to harness its power and use magic.

 

 

 

Selatria can be found in many forms. In a solid rocky state, it can be obtained in the form of active or dormant Selactite. It can also be found in a misty state, which supplies rich magical energy to those who can sense it.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Like previously stated, it is developed using RPG Maker VX. We have also heavily modified theTankentai battle system framework, giving the characters more presence during combat.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Team Attack Battle System – A spin on the traditional turn-based battle system that allows compatible party members to chain extra attacks off of team members’ special abilities known as “Triggers”.

 

 


Full Character Bio Link 

Face Art by Jonathan Flynn

 

Chapter 1 Protagonists

(click on their names for a voiced self-introduction)

 

 

Mage: Voiced by Jabari Lewis-Smith

Melanie: Voiced by Vikki Ceballos

 

 Luis: Voiced by River Kanoff

 

Number 016: Voiced by Kristyn Mass

 

 

Chapter 1 Antagonists:

Of course, it wouldn’t be much of a story without determined and hard-headed foes. Here are a couple you’ll run into as you start your journey...

Commander Shaw: Voiced by Jonathan Dishaw

 

Number 015: Voiced by Anthony Hintzen

 

 

Chapter 1 Side Characters:

Hat: Voiced by Bowie Alexander

 

 

Talker: Voiced by Bowie Alexander
story_txt:
Thank you for supporting our game! We are planning on rebooting our campaign in the future. Please check out our company page at www.whimindie.com/home/games/selatria for more information. Thanks!
 

 
Check out our free playable demo!
 
View our Pitch
 
Take a look at screenshots and media in our gallery!  
 
FAQ
 
"Like" us on Facebook
 

One hundred years ago, the continents of Faylien and Dakk’rund were in the midst of a global conflict. In a last ditch effort, the forces of Faylien proposed an end-all solution to the Dakk’rian invasion: destroy its selactic source, the vessel containing the sum of the continents magical energies.
Although the Dakk’rians were repelled and the war was brought to an end, there were some irreversible damages to the Dakk’rian continent due to the destruction of the selactic source. The people stopped aging. The environment began to rot. Lush trees and forests became gray brush and dusty barren valleys. 
 
The Dakk'rians never forgot the humiliation and pain they suffered due to Faylien's daring and reckless strategy. Even though it took one hundred years, they were finally ready to bring about their revenge. Peaceful days in Faylien are coming to an abrupt end, and it is up to you as Mage and his friends to end the enemy invasion and take back your home!
 

 

Pictured left to right: Paul Vela, Grover Wimberly IV, Matthew Estrada, and Jonathan Dishaw
 
Whim Independent Studios is a new independent game development company formed in late 2012 by Grover Wimberly IV, Matthew Estrada, and Paul Vela. 
Our aim is to create fun games of many different genres in order to appeal to a wide variety of audiences. Along with Selatria, the development studio is working on an upcoming mobile game coded in ActionScript3 and another action game which is currently in the conceptual stages.
 
Full Team Bio Link
 
Full Team Roster Link
 
 

 
Up until this point, we have been developing Selatria for free with with relatively limited resources. We would use your support to completely fulfill the game’s vision. This includes commissioning artists, sound designers, composers, and game designers and programmers to make sure the development of Selatria can see completion. We would like to use the development funds to make the current assets consistent with each other. 
 
After evaluating startup costs and commissioning the team, we have deduced that in order to complete the main story in our project, we would need at least $5000 for the fundraising campaign. We also have ideas for stretch goals if we can gather enough support! 
 
Not everyone can donate, we know times are tough. But if you like what we are doing, please, tell your friends and family. Anything you can do helps: watch our trailers, "like" us on Facebook, "like" this campaign, gives us a shoutout on Google+, hashtag Selatria, whatever helps spread the word.
 

  

Game Production: 29.05%
 
Sound: 16.5%
 
Voice Actors: 18.8%
 
Administration: 5%
 
Art Team: 29.7%
 

 
4-9% - Indiegogo’s Share (4 if goal is reached, 9 if it isn’t.) 
 
10% - Studio Fees (Studio-related Bills, Business Internet, Initial game engine investments)
 
 
71%-78% - Distributed among the team in the form of commission payments. 
 
  
 

 
Selatria (Sel’-ə-tri”-ə) is the collective name of the free-flowing magical energy that flows throughout the world. The essence is released freely through openings called Selactic Sources, and those who can feel/sense the essence are allowed to harness its power and use magic.
 
 
 
Selatria can be found in many forms. In a solid rocky state, it can be obtained in the form of active or dormant Selactite. It can also be found in a misty state, which supplies rich magical energy to those who can sense it.
 
 
 
 
 

 
Like previously stated, it is developed using RPG Maker VX. We have also heavily modified theTankentai battle system framework, giving the characters more presence during combat.
 
 
 
 
 

 
Team Attack Battle System – A spin on the traditional turn-based battle system that allows compatible party members to chain extra attacks off of team members’ special abilities known as “Triggers”.

story:
Let's say hello first ...

Hello and thanks for stopping by. Maybe you just stumbled across this little campaign and you were wondering what it may be about. I'll tell you in a minute. 

But first something about myself: I am the guy behind the scenes of Wooden Floor, pheenix93 or Fabian (my real name) , buliding the game so far. My brother helps me out a bit if I need some better sounds or music, that Freesound can't give me (what is the case pretty often) 

Maybe you already played one of my games before. Anyway I am creating games for a few years now and I want to do something better now. My earlier games were okay but when I now look back on them I see so much that needs improvement. But let's talk about Wooden Floor now.

The game

Wooden Floor is something unique in my eyes. Something I don't think of that it exists yet and that I have ever played before. 

Wooden Floor is a horror game with a totally maze-like design. 

You start in a normally seeming house, but by progressing you start to realize that rooms change or whole corridors appear out of nowhere if you close a door or turn around. Yes even a whole forest seems to fit in the house somehow.

Ways to help

What I would like to achieve is simple. Creating a good game. With your help I could:

  • Implement more and also better models
  • Implement better sounds
  • Implement better textures
  • Maybe also a character model may be affordable
  • It is hard to do everything nearly on your own - work could be handed over
  • Simply everything would become better and easier for me :D

You don't even have to donate some money. Simply spread the word if you think it is worth it! I would really appreciate it. It means, and it also helps a lot. 

You may also want to check out the IndieDB site of Wooden Floor for more Info and content, like videos, music and pictures.

Also you may vote for the game on Steam Greenlight.

Leave some feedback!

Thanks, Fabian

story:
A futuristic world, where humans face extinction as a result of a mysterious reason.

Wars and new ideologies divided mankind, but most of those new societies succumbed. One of the successful ones is a robotic city, where humanity lives through technology. No humans, just their minds controlling machines, the only way they found to keep humanity alive.

And just in the middle of this sci fi city, you wake up as a woman with no memories, trying to understand her strange powers, why everything is trying to kill her and how the world came to that.


Solve puzzles, stay alive, unravel the mysteries.. enjoy the freedom of this adventure playing just the way you want. Of course, there will be a surprise gift for good scores.

You will never keep doing the same thing over and over in this game. Every level contain new surprises, new ways to play and new challenges to face.

And with freedom, comes consequences.. this game has multiple endings and you are the only one who can decide the fate of this world.

Clear Mind Software is a recently created game developer, formed by the experienced developer Xyuan Xiao. If you want more details, you'll be welcome in our facebook page.

The money is needed to pay for Unreal Engine license, Apple Developer license, to buy ios device for testing (since its an Unreal Engine 3 based game being created for iOS smartphones and tablets) and for legal and development expenses.

Anything that goes beyond the 3 thousand dollars goal will help speed up the development and make the game even better.


Every contributor will be known and remembered, but it's your choice to decide how would you like it to happen =)

Take a look at our perks >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

*Full Beta Experience: anyone with any perk will be advised via e-mail when the beta is available for download. All of you will be able to contact the developer personally to give your suggestions and impressions over the beta.

*Being a producer, co-producer or any other title does not give you ownership over the rights of the game or project. The game is property of its developer only.


Money is not the only way to help this campaign. If you liked the game but don't have cash or just don't want to give it, or even if you contributed but also want to help spread the campaign, sharing it in any social network will help it a lot!

Thank you! ;)

Some extra images of the Rule 16 development.. enjoy it!

LEVEL 1:

LEVEL 2:

LEVEL 3:

_______________________________________________________________________

Have a question or just want to give your opinion on the project? Discuss Rule 16 Game at the Crowdfundforum.com!
