story:
Human Nature

A meteorite crashed into earth, releasing a strange airborn mutagen that affects simple lifeforms, creating huge mutated insects and plant life. Regular life has been disrupted and life has turned into survival of the fittest.

Besides making sure you get enough nutrients and supplies, you have to fight off mutated creatures and figure out if other people (players) can be trusted. Human nature, can you control it?

 

Survive in a 256km2 or 159.07 square miles area in any way you want!

All the areas have been designed with several playing styles or combinations of them in mind. For example, you can get into a city in numerous ways. You can sneak through the woodlands to the outskirts of the city, hide behind cars, obstacles and plants or you could simply walk up the road with your weapon ready or even jump from rooftop to rooftop!

Some of the things you can do:

Play "loner' style or in groups or any combination.

Trade with other players, help other players, rob or kill them. But remember, they might fight back!

Forage for food, water and supplies in the forest or cities, hunt  insects for food or simply get it from another player.

Explore several cities, industrial zones, woodlands and even a military base!

 

Some features of the game:

A well balanced weapons system with realistic damage.

A day and night system

Numerous mutated insects in all shapes and sizes that want a piece of you.

"Safe zones" that are safe from mutated insects (not other players). Some of these zones can be defended by one player and some can only be defended by a bigger group of players. This is done to give loners and groups both a fair chance.

Food and water system, you will need to eat and drink or suffer the consequences. You can't run dehydrated and your aim gets shaky without enough food. Without nutrients you will die.

There are no lives or respawns. Once you die it's over, you lose all your stuff you had to fight so hard for. You will have to start over.

 

 

So what is this about?

This is about a realistic online multiplayer game that i have been wanting to make for a very long time. Recently i found some free time and i have started to create my dream game in my free time. The world map is about 90% done, except for little details (grass, random clutter and world dressing) that will be implemented after you, the supporter, have play tested the alpha game and found it good enough to go into beta stage.

Help me create an online game experience that has never been seen before and be part of it!

 

What have i done so far?

I am creating the game world- 90% done (check the gallery!)

I am modeling  the mutated insects- 30% done (check the gallery!)

I have designed the weapon system.

I am doing the sound design- 60% done

I have done the weapon concept art.

 

 

What will i use the money for?

It will only be used to get the game ready for alpha testing by you. I do not want to spend money on perks that could be used to develop the game, hence why all the perks are in-game only. I set the 20000 goal because i believe it is realistic and should be achievable. Yes it is a low amount and i would be thrilled if it went way over that 20000, but i am prepared to do a lot of bootstrapping. Any funds raised will help cut down development time and with enough i could even implement more features. The game will be available for PC and MAC, with more funding we could get it on consoles too.

I will use the money for:

  • 3d engine license
  • professional dynamic lighting
  • an animator to make the creatures come alive
  • a 3d modeler to model the weapons and misc. objects
  • a programmer to make sure everythings runs smooth and gets implemented perfectly
  • a server for the supporters / alpha and beta testers
  • a better machine to run the creation tools on to speed up the workflow
  • more funds means cutting down development time and more implemented features

 

 

Other ways you could help me a great deal:

I know not every has money to just give away, but even if you don't you can still help me a lot! Spread the world about this game and this campain to raise money. Share it on twitter, facebook, your website / blog or any other type of outlet you have, it will help me so much. THANK YOU!

 

Be sure to check out the gallery for in-game screenhots and models (except the concept art weapons)!! I will upload a video of myself talking about the game shortly.

story:
Shantek Studios has been developing self published and third party games and applications for both Windows Phone and Windows 8 for the last 2 years. Over this time our biggest game Wheel of Wealth has seen great success, with the game currently being in the top 1% of the Windows Phone marketplace.

We have had a huge demand for our games to be available on other platforms, including iPad, iPhone and Android. As we are currently only equiped for Windows Phone And Windows 8 development, this project will allow us to broaden out our platforms we publish to, and to publish further games to these other platforms moving forward.

 

Existing app

Wheel of Wealth is a turn based game that allows up to 3 players from all around the world to compete in solving the puzzles. The current game available on the Windows platforms also has a solo play mode & a pass and play mode available, and is free for all players ad-supported with the option to remove ad's with an in-app purchase.

 

Our plans with funding

If we raise under 50% ($20,000-)

Development will progress at a slower pace with less resources available, with development beginning initially on iOS first. The game will be to a similar spec as the existing Windows Phone version, adapted to the iOS platform to feel native.

If we raise over 75% of the target ($30,000+)

We will direct more resources in to the project with faster development time and Android will then be an included platform after the iOS version finishes development. The games will be to a similar spec as the existing Windows Phone & Windows 8 version. At 75%, all platforms published to will include a real-time live multiplayer mode for cross platform real-time play!

If we raise over 100% of the target ($40,000+)

The game will be re-developed to use the unity engine allowing us to develop the existing game in to a much richer 3d experience for the user. This will include a total rewrite of the game with a large investment in the visual design. at 100%+ we will publish to all unity platforms, including BlackBerry. As above, this will also include the real-time play across platforms as well as the turn based and solo modes.

 

Please note:

If it hit's 75% this will then also include the Android version. However under 50% will mean the iOS version will be just turn based multiplayer initially (and not a unity based project). 

Reaching 100% of our target goal will allow us to bring on an additional developer to speed up the development process dramatically. If the project is to receive under 50%, we will be doing out best to get the iOS version under development with the resources available based on the funds raised.

 

What We Need & What You Get

As we are very limited on resources for platforms outside of our current portfolio, the funding will allow us to bring the game to as many platforms as possible, and to offer a much larger user-base for all our players. 

Should we not reach our 100% goal, funds will be distributed in a way that will best allow us to develop the iOS version as soon as practical.

Be sure to check out the perks to the right to get on board with your support and be rewarded!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute personally? Never fear, you can still help. Be sure to spread the word as much as possible! Are you an existing Windows Phone or Windows 8 player of Wheel of Wealth and want to be able to play ANY of your friends? Spread the word to help raise awareness of this funding project!

Thanks for your support!

 

 

Links:

Considerable coverage during the last 2 years on the largest Windows Phone news website: http://www.wpcentral.com/tags/wheel-wealth

Average 4/5 star rating on the US marketplace: http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/wheel-of-wealth/26955190-2959-4f8b-a055-39b8724a43a0

story:
Thanks to everyone who helped.

Funding will help to buy Apple developer licnese and for the monthly payments of the mac cloud services.

Check out the site for more WIP updates.

http://www.ufo-patrol.com/p/videos.html

..................................................................................................

Short Summary

In India where Game Developing is not considered a Career. Where there is still no real game institute like the western gaming institutes, a child played Mario in 1989 and dreams to become a Game Designer. This is a dream project of that child who is now an award winning graphic designer, publisher and owner of Learndesignanimate.com. Help us to complete this dream.

 

What exactly will we do?

 Goal $3000 for Publishing on Windows, Mac & iOS

We will develop this game further creating more levels, enemies, fighter planes which can be unlocked by buying coins in store or playing and collecting coins. The goal is to publish on Windows, Mac and iOS.

Here are the current graphics and Video ready. The graphics are designed in 3D.

 

 

 

 

Game Video:

http://youtu.be/8Co8-9OTAGw

 

We are a small game studio located in Kolkata, India, brimming with Video & Board Game ideas, we need to buy a mini-mac, game engine module and Apple Developer License to create our game for Mac & iOS, so we are seeking your help.

Free Video Game

Board Game, Dice Set 

Limited Edition Card Game

Miniatures

Your Gold Plated Miniature 

Art Poster

T-Shirts

Advertising Space

Color Comic Book based on you and your life events

and more once we reach our first goal.

We have explained everything in our perks. Everyone who funds us will get the Windows game free, that is the minimum.

N.B.: 10% of our raised funds will go to the WWF for Animal Welfare

 

 

The funds will be used in developing graphics and animations for the games, more maps, more enemies, more effects and for purchasing software and hardware required for completing game.

 

 

 Some funds will go in buying Apple licenses required and a mini-mac to convert the game from Windows to Mac and iOS platform. Game engine module for iOS will be bought. Remaining funds will be used to provide as many advantages, miniatures, merchandise and game features we can provide to you in form of perks.

 

 

If we cannot achieve the first goal, money raised will be used for completing the game atleast on Windows platform and given to all those who funded. iOS and Mac will be out of reach because of the large number of hardware and software requirements. We will also say thanks by fullfilling and shipping the merchandise items for all those who funded us. So its a win-win situation for you, as you will still get the Free Windows game as well as Merchandise.

For now shipping =  $5 in US , $15 all other countries. Please add these while paying the perks.

For Miniatures and Board Game shipping = $15 flat rate for all countries.

 

Why Paypal is not used to pay perks?

We will start shipping merchandise by October while Paypal allows only 30 days for shipping. 

Also Reserve Bank of India has stopped all personal payment to India. Hence Paypal cannot be used.

http://indiegogo.zendesk.com/entries/20918603-international-paypal-restrictions

 

So this is it...

We hope you are as excited as we are about the possible emergence of UFO PATROL into a full fledged video game as well as a board game in near future. Thanks in advance for all your help. Don't forget everything from a link on a blog to a share on Facebook will help us reach this goal. If you like what you see and want to help you can use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word and do follow us on twitter.

For any info contact us here, on our site or twitter.

Our site has more detailed info and images about the merchandise.

www.ufo-patrol.com

@UFOPATROLCOM

@wickedsunny
story_txt:
Thanks to everyone who helped.
Funding will help to buy Apple developer licnese and for the monthly payments of the mac cloud services.
Check out the site for more WIP updates.
http://www.ufo-patrol.com/p/videos.html
..................................................................................................
Short Summary

In India where Game Developing is not considered a Career. Where there is still no real game institute like the western gaming institutes, a child played Mario in 1989 and dreams to become a Game Designer. This is a dream project of that child who is now an award winning graphic designer, publisher and owner of Learndesignanimate.com. Help us to complete this dream.





 
What exactly will we do?


 Goal $3000 for Publishing on Windows, Mac & iOS


We will develop this game further creating more levels, enemies, fighter planes which can be unlocked by buying coins in store or playing and collecting coins. The goal is to publish on Windows, Mac and iOS.



Here are the current graphics and Video ready. The graphics are designed in 3D.
 



 

 

 


Game Video:


http://youtu.be/8Co8-9OTAGw


 





We are a small game studio located in Kolkata, India, brimming with Video & Board Game ideas, we need to buy a mini-mac, game engine module and Apple Developer License to create our game for Mac & iOS, so we are seeking your help.



Free Video Game
Board Game, Dice Set 
Limited Edition Card Game
Miniatures
Your Gold Plated Miniature 
Art Poster
T-Shirts
 Advertising Space
Color Comic Book based on you and your life events
and more once we reach our first goal.
We have explained everything in our perks. Everyone who funds us will get the Windows game free, that is the minimum.
N.B.: 10% of our raised funds will go to the WWF for Animal Welfare
 

 
The funds will be used in developing graphics and animations for the games, more maps, more enemies, more effects and for purchasing software and hardware required for completing game.

Remaining funds will be used to provide as many advantages, miniatures, merchandise and game features we can provide to you in form of perks.

We will also say thanks by fullfilling and shipping the merchandise items for all those who funded us. So its a win-win situation for you, as you will still get the Free Windows game as well as Merchandise.

story:
AVAILABLE NOW ON STEAM



A 2D, turn-based Role-Playing Game with the depth and challenge of old-school classics and a modern, intuitive interface.

Available in English and Spanish for PC, MAC & Linux.


Our Vision

In Lords of Xulima, we have set out to make a challenging, turn-based RPG in the vein of the old school classics. We're making a game filled with character development, puzzles and often difficult strategic combat. Our goal is to create an immersive environment and a challenging combat system; how you choose to play it will be entirely up to you.

Lords of Xulima is an isometric, turn-based, single-player, 2D role-playing game. It is set on a mythical lost continent called Xulima, where the world makers lived in ancient times. The game features a vast, challenging world where you will lead Gaulen the Explorer and five of his companions on an epic journey filled with the struggles of Gods and Men.

 

Inspiration

We draw our gameplay inspiration from the old school classics. We do enjoy some of the amenities and graphics of today’s RPGs, but too often they lack the depth and challenge of the games of the past. Our goal is to capture the complexity of past RPGs and deliver them in a modern game. The elements of RPGs that we find most intriguing are the following:

  • An epic story: We love stories that are original and not afraid of being fully immersed in a fantasy world.  It’s an element that seems to be missing from games recently with the exception of some Japanese productions. Lords of Xulima tells just one part of an expansive mythology that chronicles the world from its creation until its ultimate end. We have no intention of being limited to themes like “political conspiracies” or “faction struggles”.
  • A game system that rewards intelligence, imagination, and strategy: We believe a good game should depend on these skills, instead of relying on the player's reflexes, or ability to hit a complicated combinations of buttons in a few milliseconds.
  • A challenging environment: Yes, we love challenges.  We love feeling small and vulnerable in a vast, dangerous world.  We want our “stupid” actions to have negative consequences, and we want our accomplishments to feel like our own, because we've earned them. We don’t want to feel like success in a game is simply the result of a programmed script or tutorial that wants to convince us that we are heroes.  When you succeed in Lords of Xulima, it will be because you have played carefully, fought hard and earned your victory.

 

  • More than 60 hours of true role playing experience.
  • Create your party with up to six characters, choosing between 9 classes and more than 100 unique skills.
  • Strategic turn-based combat in first person view: Battle more than 100 enemies with unique skills and powers.
  • A vast continent to explore, with different environments and climates: You are free to go anywhere you want from the beginning of the game, but take care; the lands of Xulima are extremely dangerous.
  • More than 30 dungeons: Castles, towers and temples await for you to discover their secrets.
  • The depth and challenge of old school RPG classics, but with a modern, intuitive interface.  
  • Enchanting hand-drawn 2D graphics for landscapes and maps, mixed with 3D, pre-rendered models to bring smooth animations for characters and creatures.
  • Available for Windows, MAC and Linux.
  • Languages: English, Spanish.

 

 

Legends tell us that when the earth was young and void of life, the nine Xulnari, known as Gods by the men of old, took form and descended to the land. In the beginning the earth had only one great continent, Rodina. Over the grand ocean of Mirovia, the Xulnari raised a new continent where they would dwell and they called it Xulima, which means ‘Home of the Xulnari’.

From there, they began their grand work to create life to inhabit the great continent of Rodina. There were many attempts, over many years, but each new form of life was kept confined on Xulima, because none was deemed worthy to inherit the land of Rodina.

Finally, humans were created and the Lords of Xulima, proud of their work, sent them to Rodina. There the humans settled and created many kingdoms and cultures. With the passage of years, the remote continent of Xulima was largely forgotten by the humans, who only mentioned it in their oldest legends.

Time passed, and the kingdoms of the humans grew large and powerful; soon they also became proud and ambitious. Conflicts broke out between the great kingdoms and the continent was plunged into war, dragging every village and community into devastating strife that showed no signs of ending.

It is told that the Lords of Xulima, grieved by the conflict, wanted to intercede. However, not all were in agreement. A new war erupted, this one between the nine Lords themselves. Soon they left the world in order to move their conflict beyond the stars in an attempt to protect the land from their wrath.

But they did not abandon mankind entirely. Golot, the master of dreams, chose a herald among men to end the conflict that devastated Rodina. This Herald was Gaulen the Explorer. Guided by the dreams of Golot, Gaulen sailed east, crossing the great sea of Mirovia to reach the land of legend.

Gaulen and his group will be the first humans from the grand continent to walk on the sacred lands of Xulima.




We are passionate gamers who love the look and feel of 2D games because they allow developers to give their games a more personal touch, making them more original and unique. 

To create Lords of Xulima we have custom-built our own graphics and game engine with supporting tools that enable us to create visually stunning environments. Here is a demonstration for you to enjoy:


In developing a game as complex as Lords of Xulima, we needed to make a lot of decisions about what aspects to include and which ones to exclude. Even though we would like to be able to do everything to make Lords of Xulima the best game possible, unfortunately we need to adjust our vision to match our budget. For this reason, we have decided to launch this campaign and ask you to contribute to improving Lords of Xulima.

When finished, the game will be about 60 hours long and it is currently about 60% complete. It will be available in early 2014 on PC, Mac and Linux. At a future date, we would also like to make it available on Android and iOS tablets.

 

Why fund Lords of Xulima?

Big budget studios today are stuck in cycles of producing one entry after another in the same franchises, each iteration designed to appeal to a wider audience. With a few exceptions, each game is simpler than the last, with the same story lines we have played through a hundred times before, and the same monsters we have killed thousands of times before. Lords of Xulima will be a wholly original game with unique gameplay. If you also miss the complexity and challenge of the old school RPG classics and want to take part in the new era of Role Playing Games, this is your chance to contribute.

We want to make the best new RPG we can, and for that we need you to participate in our campaign.

To thank you for your contributions we have also created some special items for this campaign, like the book “Bestiary and Mythology of Xulima”, which contains descriptions and statistics for all of the 100+ creatures that populate Xulima, as well as a history that begins with the Creation of the World and the 9 Gods.

 

A successful campaign will let us do many things to improve the game.  This is the list of goals we consider most important in making Lords of Xulima a much better, more well-rounded game.

All the money we are able to raise here will be exclusively dedicated towards implementing these improvements, and your donations will be what makes them possible.

 

Here is the list of rewards. Each level, up to the $80 level (Beta Access Key), includes the rewards from all of the previous levels.

Steam Key

If Lords of Xulima is launched on Steam, we will include a Steam Key with the digital copies of the game

You can also support us by voting for Lords of Xulima at Steam Greenlight

Numantian games is a new studio and Lords of Xulima will be our first game. We are based in Madrid, Spain but we have contributors in United States and Poland. We are a small group of people who are passionate about gaming and we are very excited about our first game: Lords of Xulima.

From Numantian Games you have our heartfelt gratitude for your collaboration. This is our first project, made with our vision and passion and with your help you can make it all possible. 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Don’t Kill Her is a very peculiar game and I’m dying to share its secrets with you in great detail. Unfortunately I can’t, She won’t allow it.


According to Her, the story is of no importance as you have already heard the tale in some form or fashion. Nevermind! The truth lies elsewhere, which is specifically where She yearns to lead you.

This is where the fun begins, where She and I reach a common ground. No spoilers! Don't Kill Her is a delicate game. In order live its experience to the fullest one must tread lightly.

Ok to be fair I‘ll admit that She’s also secretly looking forward to seeing you frown.

You alone will be able to answer this tricky question… She is the master of this world into which you are invited, this is all you need to know in the beginning.

Whether it be woods carved in the memories of olden days or great steppes shaped by the darkness above, the areas you are about to explore are the fruit of Her very own creation.

A world conceived especially for you, it’s sole purpose being for you to find answers to the questions it raises.


That’s ok, don’t worry. The important thing here is that Don’t Kill Her isn’t your typical kind of game. Its deviant aesthetics, storytelling, gameplay and music, all of these peculiar elements fit into a great design …  The true challenge lies in unraveling the mystery surrounding the game itself.

If nevertheless, you find yourself assailed by terrible doubts, check out the source of inspiration below. The .gif of a bird of ill omen expiating.











 


















Estimated delivery of physical rewards : June 2016

I have been working on Don’t Kill Her since more than two years now, struggling to balance the time required for developing this project and the financial survival of my human condition. But now the time has come to move up a gear. I believe that the most difficult part is over and I want to be able to dedicate myself fully to the game in its final stages. 

Part of the funds will allow to cover my modest income but not only! Indeed even if this is kind of a solo project, I’m lucky enough to be able to count on the valuable contribution of other passionate artists.





Siddhartha Barnhoorn, inspired composer and multi-talented musician. The unbelievable array of instruments found in his quiver give life to the most exquisite sounds. See for yourself on soundcloud!





Julien Matthey is a seasoned sound designer with super muscular eardrums.  Always on the lookout for new sound effects, his will to capture the most original and whimsical sounds is a more than valuable asset for Don't Kill Her. With Julien, this whacky world has met its creative match.




Lara Ausensi lent us Her voice.  I hope this highly qualified singer and her enchanting lyricism won’t carry Her scars.




And last but not least me, Wuthrer, the twisted brain behind Don’t Kill Her (and Her obviously, constantly looking over my shoulder).


That’s an easy one. Whatever the outcome of this campaign, my heart is set on finalizing Don’t kill Her, I have already poured far too much time and energy into this game, there is no going back now. If the goal isn’t achieved I will continue developing it in my own spare time, which will unfortunately DRAMA…TICALLY delay the release date. Not to mention that I will have to sacrifice some of this valuable time to raise the funds necessary to pay the talented artists working with me.

In a nutshell, if the goal isn’t fully met at least the funds that I will have managed to gather will go to pay the fabulous work of these artists.

The budget above is only an estimate and is subject to change (although fairly accurate, according to the budget penguin).

If sufficant funds are raised, the game will be released in Fall 2016.



Don't Kill Her is a facinating project that I’ve been longing to share with you guys. This is not your average kind of game. Its true intention lies in the mystery surrounding the game itself, in the secrets and surprises in store for the player. The few people in the know are unanimous: I’m just about as stark raving mad as the game is awesome.
